Equipped weapons determine your available attacks. Each weapon has a basic attack (<Attack1>) and two special attacks (<Attack2> and <Attack3>). Special attacks are powerful but have short cooldowns.

Victor Vran will execute attacks in the direction of the mouse cursor and will target foes directly under the mouse cursor.

Level 4 unlocks a second weapon slot. You can switch between your weapons with <SwitchWeapon>.

Each weapon offers a different play style to master. To learn more about the specific weapons and their attacks, check out the Weapons category in the Codex.
Old Text:
Equipped weapons determine your available attacks. Each weapon has a basic attack (<Attack1>) and two special attacks (<Attack2> and <Attack3>). Special attacks are powerful but have short cooldowns.

Victor Vran will execute attacks in the direction of the mouse cursor and will target foes directly under the mouse cursor.

Level 3 unlocks a second weapon slot. You can switch between your weapons with <SwitchWeapon>.

Each weapon offers a different play style to master. To learn more about the specific weapons and their attacks, check out the Weapons category in the Codex.
Old Translation:
Equipped weapons determine your available attacks. Each weapon has a basic attack (<Attack1>) and two special attacks (<Attack2> and <Attack3>). Special attacks are powerful but have short cooldowns.

Victor Vran will execute attacks in the direction of the mouse cursor and will target foes directly under the mouse cursor.

Level 3 unlocks a second weapon slot. You can switch between your weapons with <SwitchWeapon>.

Each weapon offers a different play style to master. To learn more about the specific weapons and their attacks, check out the Weapons category in the Codex.
New Translation:
裝備的武器決定了你可以進行的攻擊方式。每種武器都有一個基本攻擊（<Attack1>）和兩個招式（<Attack2>和<Attack3>）。招式的威力更強，但需要短暫的冷卻。

維克多．弗蘭會向游標方向進行攻擊，並會將游標指著的敵人作為目標。

等級4時會解鎖第二欄武器。你可以按<SwitchWeapon>切換武器。

每種武器都能帶來不同的玩法。想深入了解特定武器和攻擊方式，請查閱百科全書中的武器章節。

Text:
Equipped weapons determine your available attacks. Each weapon has a basic attack (<Attack1>) and two special attacks (<Attack2> and <Attack3>). Special attacks are powerful but have short cooldowns. Hold <ForceAttack> to attack at your current position.

Level 4 unlocks a second weapon slot. You can switch between your weapons with <SwitchWeapon>.

Each weapon offers a different play style to master. To learn more about the specific weapons and their attacks, check out the Weapons category in the Codex.

Each weapon offers a different play style to master. To learn more about the specific weapons and their attacks, check out the Weapons category in the Codex.

Text:
Legendary weapons are some of the most powerful tools of the hunter's trade. Their stats are not randomized and they have unique effects and attacks that can't be found on any other weapon.

The damage of all Legendary weapons scales as you level up.
Old Text:
Legendary weapons are some of the most powerful tools of the hunter's trade. Their stats are not randomized and they have unique effects and attacks that can't be found on any other weapon.

The damage of all Legendary weapons scales as you level up.

Legendary weapons are some of the most powerful tools of the hunter's trade. Their stats are not randomized and they have unique effects and attacks that can't be found on any other weapon.

The damage of all Legendary weapons scales as you level up.
New Translation:
傳奇武器是獵人世界裡最強大的武器。它們的數據不是隨機的，每一把傳奇武器都有別於其它武器的獨特效果和攻擊方式。

所有傳奇武器的傷害都會隨你的等級提升。

Text:
You can equip two stacks of Consumables that can be activated with <UseConsumable1> and <UseConsumable2>.

Potions heal and grant beneficial effects. Bombs deal damage and apply different effects to all foes in a large area around the hero. Bombs have long cooldowns, so use them wisely.

New Translation:
你可以裝備兩組消耗品，分別按<UseConsumable1>和<UseConsumable2>使用。

藥劑可以治癒傷勢、強化能力。炸彈可以對玩家周圍大範圍的敵人造成傷害以及施加不同效果。炸彈的冷卻時間很長，請謹慎使用。

Text:
You can equip two stacks of Consumables that can be activated with <DPadLeft> and <DPadRight>.

Potions heal and grant beneficial effects. Bombs deal damage and apply different effects to all foes in a large area around the hero. Bombs have long cooldowns, so use them wisely.
Old Text:
You can equip two stacks of Consumables that can be activated with <DPadLeft> and <DPadRight>.

Potions heal and grant beneficial effects. Bombs deal damage and apply different effects to all foes in a large area around the hero. Bombs have long cooldowns, so use them wisely.
Old Translation:
You can equip two stacks of Consumables that can be activated with <DPadLeft> and <DPadRight>.

Potions heal and grant beneficial effects. Bombs deal damage and apply different effects to all foes in a large area around the hero. Bombs have long cooldowns, so use them wisely.
New Translation:
你可以裝備兩組消耗品，分別按<DPadLeft>和<DPadRight>使用。

藥劑可以治癒傷勢、強化能力。炸彈可以對玩家周圍大範圍的敵人造成傷害以及施加不同效果。炸彈的冷卻時間很長，請謹慎使用。

Text:
You gain Overdrive when attacking and killing monsters. Overdrive is indicated by the yellow bar next to your health. The more damage an attack makes, the more Overdrive it provides.

Overdrive is spent to activate supernatural attacks called Demon Powers (<UseRune1> and <UseRune2>). You can hold the buttons to aim and target where the attack will land precisely.

Outfits modify the way Victor Vran gains or spends Overdrive. For example the starting Hunter's Outfit provides additional Overdrive when you take damage.
Old Text:
You gain Overdrive when attacking and killing monsters. Overdrive is indicated by the yellow bar next to your health. The more damage an attack makes, the more Overdrive it provides.

Overdrive is spent to activate supernatural attacks called Demon Powers (<UseRune1> and <UseRune2>). You can hold the buttons to aim and target where the attack will land precisely.

Outfits modify the way Victor Vran gains or spends Overdrive. For example the starting Hunter's Outfit provides additional Overdrive when you take damage.

You gain Overdrive when attacking and killing monsters. Overdrive is indicated by the yellow bar next to your health. The more damage an attack makes, the more Overdrive it provides.

Overdrive is spent to activate supernatural attacks called Demon Powers (<UseRune1> and <UseRune2>). You can hold the buttons to aim and target where the attack will land precisely.

Outfits modify the way Victor Vran gains or spends Overdrive. For example the starting Hunter's Outfit provides additional Overdrive when you take damage.
New Translation:
你在攻擊和殺死怪物時會凝聚超能。超能以黃色條顯示在生命的右邊。攻擊造成的傷害越高，凝聚的超能越多。

超能可以用來施展惡魔之力（<UseRune1>和<UseRune2>）。按住按鍵可以精確瞄準攻擊位置。

服裝也會改變維克多．弗蘭凝聚或使用超能的方式。例如：初始的獵人服裝能使你在受到傷害時凝聚額外的超能。

Text: Released 21 August 1977<newline>Recorded 27–29 April 1977<newline>Escape Studios, Kent, England<newline><newline>  Motörhead's debut album. „On Parole“ was recorded earlier, in 1975, but was not an official release

Released 24 March 1979<newline>Recorded December 1978–January 1979<newline>Roundhouse Studios and Sound Development Studios, London<newline><newline>Kerrang! magazine listed the album at #46 among the "100 Greatest Heavy Metal Albums of All Time"

Released 27 October 1979<newline>Recorded 7 July–31 August 1979<newline>Roundhouse Studios and Olympic Studios, London<newline><newline>Released just half a year after “Overkill” this was another masterpiece, containing “Dead men tell no tales”, “Stone Dead Forever” and the classic title track “Bomber”

Released 8 November 1980<newline>Recorded 4 August–15 September 1980<newline>Jackson's Studios, Rickmansworth, England<newline><newline>Motörhead’s debut release in the US. By many regarded as their finest work

Released 17 April 1982<newline>Recorded 26–28 January and 1-30 February 1982<newline>Ramport Studios and Morgan Studios, London<newline><newline>This album’s creation was surrounded by quite a bit of trouble which had its peak in guitarist Fast Eddie Clarke leaving the band in May 1982

Released 4 June 1983<newline>Recorded February–March 1983<newline>Studio Olympic Studios and Eel Pie Studios, London<newline><newline>“Another Perfect Day” sticks out from the discography: it sounds different and Brian Robertson, who played the guitars only on this album, surely looked different. Many fans couldn’t identify, but should give this masterpiece another try

Released 9 August 1986<newline>Recorded 1986<newline>Master Rock Studios, London<newline><newline>One of the most iconic album covers of all time, no question about that. And surely one of their strongest: “Doctor Rock”, “Mean Machine” and “Orgasmatron” – one classic after another

Released August 1987<newline>Recorded 1987<newline>Master Rock Studios and Redwood Studios, London<newline><newline>“Eat the Rich”, which was also an extremely fun movie starring Lemmy, and Monty Python’s Michael Palin speaking the intro of “The Wolf” made this another classic must-have in Motörhead’s catalogue

Released 26 February 1991<newline>Recorded 1990<newline><newline>After a long legal battle that prevented the band from releasing anything for nearly 4 years, this masterpiece with the astonishing title track was finally released in 1990

Released 14 August 1992<newline>Recorded 1991–1992<newline>Music Grinder Studios, Los Angeles, California<newline><newline>Motörhead’s most commercial album, containing “Hellraiser”, a collaboration with Ozzy and a Ted Nugent cover

Released 29 November 1993<newline>Recorded 1992–1993<newline>A&M Studios and Prime Time Studios, Hollywood, California<newline><newline>Back to former glory with the 4 man line-up: “Born to raise hell”, “Don’t let daddy kiss me”, “Lost in the Ozone”... almost every track can be regarded as a Motörhead classic

Released 11 July 1995<newline>Recorded 1995<newline>Cherokee Studios, Hollywood, California<newline><newline>The title track is heavily used by Troma Entertainment and it appeared in “Tromeo & Juliet” which featured Lemmy, as many of Lloyd Kaufman’s movies did

Released 15 October 1996<newline>Recorded 1996<newline>Ocean Studio and Track House Recording Studio<newline><newline>The album with no Snaggletooth on the cover. The 3 man line-up really kicks in here and the album features a nice mix of different styles and speeds

Released 10 March 1998<newline>Recorded 1998<newline>The Valley Studio<newline><newline>Another kick ass album. According to the booklet featuring "The Artist Frequently Seen at the Liquor Store". Guess who made that joke

Released 16 May 2000<newline>Recorded June 1999–August 1999<newline>December 1999–March 2000<newline>Karo Studios, Brackel, Germany<newline>American Recorders, Calabasas, California<newline><newline> 
The first time Snaggletooth is shown from a different perspective. Re-releases and compilations all over the place did not help this album’s sales

Released 9 April 2002<newline>Recorded 2001<newline>Henson Studios and Chuck Reed's House<newline><newline>“I'm kind of ambivalent, it's up and down. There's some good tracks on it and there's some crap on it”, Lemmy said about “Hammered” in “The guts and the glory” documentary

Released 22 June 2004<newline>Recorded 2004<newline>NRG Studios, Paramount Studios & Maple Studios<newline><newline>A new era starts with the great Cameron Webb producing for the first time. Many regard “Inferno” as the best album that Motörhead have ever released

Released 29 August 2006<newline>Recorded 2006<newline>Paramount Studios and NRG Studios, Hollywood, California<newline>Maple Studios, Costa Mesa, California<newline><newline>This one went up to #4 in the German charts, and deservedly so. Featuring “Trigger” with its unique sound, “God was never on your side”, one of Lemmy’s strongest ballads and “Sword of Glory” among other classics

Released 26 August 2008<newline>Recorded Late 2007–early 2008<newline>Studio 606 and Sage & Sound<newline><newline>The album cover represents the band by featuring the Royal Arms of England (Lemmy), the Y Ddraig Goch of Wales (Phil), the Tre Kronor of Sweden (Mikkey) and Snaggletooth, standing for the band as a whole

Released 14 December 2010<newline>Recorded 2010<newline>Studio NRG Studios, Maple Studios<newline>Sage and Sound Studios<newline><newline> 
“I know how to die”, “Get back in line” that the band played on various late night shows incl. Conan, and “I know what you need” make this another strong entry

Released 18 October 2013<newline>Recorded 2013<newline>NRG Studios, Hollywood, California<newline>Sound Factory & Sunset Sound, Hollywood, California<newline>Maple Studios, Santa Ana, California<newline><newline>An extremely strong album. “Aftershock” was delayed and the recording sessions had to be divided into two parts with a long break between them. Perhaps one the reasons this features so many strong tracks and no fillers

Released 28 August 2015<newline>Recorded 2015<newline>Studio NRG Studio, Hollywood, California<newline>Maple Studios, Santa Ana, California<newline>Grandmaster Studios<newline><newline>The final album – and it couldn’t have been any better. “Bad Magic” surely casts a spell on the listener, with memorable songs like “Electricity”, “Thunder & Lightning” and “Till the end” and so many more. Rest in peace, Motörhead – you will forever be missed
“If we moved in next door, your lawn would die.”
“Every future drum roll, every hit of the snare for the rest of my life will be to honour Lemmy.”
“It’s a natural thing that me and Lemmy are doing the promotion of the band. … Probably me, most of the time. I talk the most.”
“I want a suite with a piano and a sheep.”

Champion foes are some of the more powerful monsters you'll face. They are tougher then other members of their kin and may have additional attributes. In addition each Champion monster will use a specific Demon Power against you. Slaying Champions gives you a chance to acquire their Demon Powers.
Old Text: Champion foes are some of the more powerful monsters you'll face. They are tougher then other members of their kin and may have additional attributes. In addition each Champion monster will use a specific Demon Power against you. Slaying Champions gives you a chance to acquire their Demon Powers.
Old Translation: Champion foes are some of the more powerful monsters you'll face. They are tougher then other members of their kin and may have additional attributes. In addition each Champion monster will use a specific Demon Power against you. Slaying Champions gives you a chance to acquire their Demon Powers.
New Translation: 悍將是你會遇見的強大怪物。牠們比同類的普通怪物更加棘手，可能還有額外的屬性。除此之外，每個悍將都會使用獨特的惡魔之力，殺了牠們可讓你有機會獲得其惡魔之力。

Text:
Outfits are items that change your outlook and the way you use Demon Powers and Overdrive. Some Outfits provide Armor and other bonuses.

You may customize the color of your Outfit by transmuting it together with Dyes.
Old Text:
Outfits are items that change your outlook and the way you use Demon Powers and Overdrive. Some Outfits provide Armor and other bonuses.

You may be unable to equip some Outfits the moment you pick them up, as they have requirements you have to fulfill.
Old Translation:
Outfits are items that change your outlook and the way you use Demon Powers and Overdrive. Some Outfits provide Armor and other bonuses.

You may be unable to equip some Outfits the moment you pick them up, as they have requirements you have to fulfill.
New Translation:
服裝是能改變你的外觀和改變惡魔之力與超能運用方式的物品。有些服裝會提供防禦和其它加成。

將服裝和染料一同合成，可自訂服裝的顏色。

Text:
You can equip Destiny Cards to receive a variety of different passive abilities. To equip a card you'll need to both have a free slot and enough free Destiny Points. If a card is Unique you can never equip more than one copy of it.

You begin the game with two slots for Destiny Cards and 4 Destiny Points. You will gain additional slots and points as you level up.

The majority of Destiny Card effects stack, either adding their bonuses together or allowing the effect to trigger several times during the cooldown period.

You begin the game with two slots for Destiny Cards and 4 Destiny Points. You will gain additional slots and points as you level up.

The majority of Destiny Card effects stack, either adding their bonuses together or allowing the effect to trigger several times during the cooldown period.

New Translation:
你可以裝備命運牌來獲得各式各樣的被動能力。要裝備命運牌，你需要有空的牌槽和足夠的命運點。如果牌是獨特的，那同類的牌你只能裝備一張。

開始遊戲時你會有2格命運牌槽和4點命運點，隨著等級提升你會獲得更多的牌槽和點數。

大多數命運牌的效果會疊加，不是提升整體加成，就是在冷卻期間能發動效果數次。

Text:
Hexes are special items that allow you to challenge yourself and increase the difficulty of the game. You can activate Hexes from your inventory or the map screen.

You will gain a 10% bonus to XP and you will find 5% more items for each active Hex. In addition each Hex tracks the number of monsters you've slain while under its effect and shows a star rating based on that number.
Old Text:

You will gain a 10% bonus to XP for each active Hex. In addition each Hex tracks the number of monsters you've slain while under its effect and shows a star rating based on that number.

Hexes are special items that allow you to challenge yourself and increase the difficulty of the game. You can activate Hexes from your inventory or the map screen.

You will gain a 10% bonus to XP for each active Hex. In addition each Hex tracks the number of monsters you've slain while under its effect and shows a star rating based on that number.
New Translation:
禁咒是讓你挑戰自己，提高遊戲難度的特殊物品。你可以從物品欄或地圖介面啟用禁咒。

每啟用一個禁咒都會提升10%經驗獲得量和5%物品掉落數。除此之外，每個禁咒都會記錄在它的作用下被殺死的怪物數量，並依據其數量顯示星級排名。

Text:
Use the <Move_CameraForward>, <Move_CameraLeft>, <Move_CameraBackward>, <Move_CameraRight> keys to move.

Double tap a direction key or press <Dodge> while moving to dodge away from attacks. You can disable double tap to dodge from the Options (Gameplay).
Old Text:
Use the <Move_CameraForward>, <Move_CameraLeft>, <Move_CameraBackward>, <Move_CameraRight> keys to move.

Double tap a direction key or press <Dodge> while moving to dodge away from attacks. You can disable double tap to dodge from the Options (Gameplay).
Old Translation:
Use the <Move_CameraForward>, <Move_CameraLeft>, <Move_CameraBackward>, <Move_CameraRight> keys to move.

Double tap a direction key or press <Dodge> while moving to dodge away from attacks. You can disable double tap to dodge from the Options (Gameplay).
New Translation:
按<Move_CameraForward>、<Move_CameraLeft>、<Move_CameraBackward>、<Move_CameraRight>移動。

雙擊方向鍵或在移動時按<Dodge>以翻滾來閃避攻擊。你可以在選項（操作）中關閉雙擊翻滾。

Text:
Point and press <Attack1> to move to that point. Use <Goto> to force the character to move to a point even if there's a monster there.

Use <Dodge_CursorForward> to dodge to pointer. Use <Dodge_CameraForward> to dodge forward (camera relative). Use <Dodge_CameraBackward> to dodge back (camera relative). Use dodge to avoid enemy attacks.
Old Text:
Point and press <Attack1> to move to that point. Use <Goto> to force the character to move to a point even if there's a monster there.

Use <Dodge_CameraForward> to dodge forward (camera relative). Use <Dodge_CameraBackward> to dodge back (camera relative). Use dodge to avoid enemy attacks.
Old Translation:
Point and press <Attack1> to move to that point. Use <Goto> to force the character to move to a point even if there's a monster there.

Use <Dodge_CameraForward> to dodge forward (camera relative). Use <Dodge_CameraBackward> to dodge back (camera relative). Use dodge to avoid enemy attacks.
New Translation:
指向某點並按<Attack1>移動到該處。使用<Goto>強制讓角色移動到某點，即使那裡有怪物。

使用<Dodge_CursorForward>向游標方向翻滾。使用<Dodge_CameraForward>向前翻滾（相對於鏡頭）。使用<Dodge_CameraBackward>向後翻滾（相對於鏡頭）。利用翻滾來避開敵人的攻擊吧。

Text:
Use <LS> to move.

Press <LB> while moving to dodge and avoid attacks.
Old Text:
Use <LS> to move.

Press <LB> while moving to dodge and avoid attacks.
Old Translation:
Use <LS> to move.

Press <LB> while moving to dodge and avoid attacks.
New Translation:
使用<LS>移動。

移動時按<LB>以翻滾來閃避攻擊。

Text:
Press <Jump> to jump.

You can rebound off a wall by pressing <Jump> again. You can perform up to two wall jumps. Use wall jumping to climb up obstacles and discover hidden paths and secrets.
Old Text:
Press <Jump> to jump.

You can rebound off a wall by pressing <Jump> again. You can perform up to two wall jumps. Use wall jumping to climb up obstacles and discover hidden paths and secrets.
Old Translation:
Press <Jump> to jump.

You can rebound off a wall by pressing <Jump> again. You can perform up to two wall jumps. Use wall jumping to climb up obstacles and discover hidden paths and secrets.
New Translation:
按<Jump>跳躍。

你可以再按一次<Jump>進行蹬牆跳，最多能進行兩次。利用蹬牆跳來翻越障礙、找出隱藏的小路和祕密吧。

Text:
Press <JumpCursor> to jump towards the mouse pointer. Use <Attack1> to move in mid-air.

You can rebound off a wall by pressing <JumpCursor> again. You can perform up to two wall jumps. Use wall jumping to climb up obstacles and discover hidden paths and secrets.

Press <JumpCursor> to jump towards the mouse pointer

You can rebound off a wall by pressing <JumpCursor> again. You can perform up to two wall jumps. Use wall jumping to climb up obstacles and discover hidden paths and secrets.

你可以再按一次<JumpCursor>進行蹬牆跳，最多能進行兩次。利用蹬牆跳來翻越障礙、找出隱藏的小路和祕密吧。

Text:
Press <A>  to jump.

You can rebound off a wall by pressing <A> again. You can perform up to two wall jumps. Use wall jumping to climb up obstacles and discover hidden paths and secrets.

Text:
Checkpoints preserve your progress for the current play session. If you die, you will be able to revive at the last activated checkpoint or at the start of the zone if you haven't activated a Checkpoint yet.

Returning to the HUB or exiting the game resets checkpoints, monsters and challenges in progress.
Old Text:
Checkpoints preserve your progress for the current play session. If you die, you will be able to revive at the last activated checkpoint or at the start of the zone if you haven't activated a Checkpoint yet.

Returning to the HUB or exiting the game resets checkpoints, monsters and challenges in progress.
Old Translation:
Checkpoints preserve your progress for the current play session. If you die, you will be able to revive at the last activated checkpoint or at the start of the zone if you haven't activated a Checkpoint yet.

Returning to the HUB or exiting the game resets checkpoints, monsters and challenges in progress.
New Translation:
紀錄點可以儲存你目前的遊戲進度。如果你死了，你可以在最後啟動的紀錄點重生；如果你尚未啟動紀錄點，你可以在地圖入口處重生。

返回主選單或離開遊戲會重置進度中的紀錄點、怪物和挑戰。

Text:
Damage (<imagescale 40><image UI/Common/damage.tga>) - The range of damage this item or skill does

Critical Chance (<imagescale 40><image UI/Common/critical_chance.tga>) - The chance that an attack will score a critical hit. Each weapon has its own Critical Chance

Critical Damage (<imagescale 40><image UI/Common/critical_bonus.tga>) - The bonus damage that critical hits deal (based on weapon damage)

Health (<imagescale 40><image UI/Common/Health.tga>) - The bonus to max health provided by the item

Armor (<imagescale 40><image UI/Common/armor.tga>) - Provides a chance to reduce incoming damage from an attack (but not any additional effects). Bombs and Demon Powers ignore Armor

Armor Penetration (<imagescale 40><image UI/Common/armor_penalty.tga>) - Allows you to ignore some of the enemy Armor

Cooldown (<imagescale 40><image UI/Common/cooldown.tga>) - The duration of the skill's cooldown

New Translation:
傷害（<imagescale 40><image UI/Common/damage.tga>）：物品或招式造成的傷害大小。

暴擊率（<imagescale 40><image UI/Common/critical_chance.tga>）：攻擊造成暴擊的機率。每種武器的暴擊率各不相同。

暴擊傷害（<imagescale 40><image UI/Common/critical_bonus.tga>）：暴擊造成的傷害（基於武器傷害）。

生命（<imagescale 40><image UI/Common/Health.tga>）：物品提供的最大生命加成。

防禦（<imagescale 40><image UI/Common/armor.tga>）：可降低受到攻擊的傷害（但無法抵抗附加狀態）。炸彈和惡魔之力能無視防禦。

護甲穿透（<imagescale 40><image UI/Common/armor_penalty.tga>）：無視敵人部分防禦。

冷卻時間（<imagescale 40><image UI/Common/cooldown.tga>）：招式冷卻需要的時間。

Text: To overkill a monster inflict massive damage to it with the killing blow. Overkill is more likely to happen when a strong attack is used against a monster at low health.
New Translation: 想打出絕殺必須對怪物最後一擊時給予極大的傷害。在怪物的生命低下時使用強力攻擊更有機會打出絕殺。

Text:
Bounties and treasure hunts are special items that you can share with other hunters using their unique Treasure Codes. Each offers a list of locations that you must visit and explore. You can find them in the "Other" section of your inventory.

Bounties are completed by slaying powerful Epic Monsters while Treasure Hunts require discovering Clues in each of the specified locations. There is one Epic Monster or Treasure Clue in each location, indicated by a special icon on your radar when you are close by. When you have accomplished your task in each location, you will be rewarded.

You can destroy completed or expired bounties to free up space in your inventory.
You can redeem shared treasure codes from the Options menu while playing Online.
New Translation:
懸賞令與尋寶圖都是特殊物品，你可以與其他獵人通過使用獨特的密碼進行分享。每一件物品都會提供幾處你必須拜訪與探索的地點。你可以在物品欄的「其它」項中找到這些物品。

懸賞是藉由殺死強大的史詩怪物來完成，尋寶則需要在每個特定地點尋找線索。每個地點都只有一隻史詩怪物或尋寶線索，當你就在附近時，小地圖上會用特殊標記顯示。當完成每個地點的任務後，你將會獲得獎勵。

你可以銷毀已完成或過期的懸賞令，以清出物品欄空間。
當進行連線時，你可以在選項選單中兌換分享的密碼。

Text:
I was walking to my grave.

Or so I thought after I crawled out of the remains of the carriage that brought me to the outskirts of Zagoravia. Just before we entered the city it was crushed by a pile of rocks that fell upon us. My reflexes saved me so I was standing there, trying to catch my breath and planning my next move.

From where I was standing the city seemed too quiet. But the accident that just happened proved the carriage-drivers were right to refuse even hearing about my offer to pay them drive me here. I was no fool, either - if it wasn't for Adrian's summons I would have never ventured into the beast's maw.

What was done was done. I could only hope to survive Zagoravia long enough to find Adrian.
Old Text:
I was walking to my grave.

Or so I thought after I crawled out of the remains of the carriage that brought me to the outskirts of Zagoravia. Just before we entered the city it was crushed by a pile of rocks that fell upon us. My reflexes saved me so I was standing there, trying to catch my breath and planning my next move.

From where I was standing the city seemed too quiet. But the accident that just happened proved the carriage-drivers were right to refuse even hearing about my offer to pay them drive me here. I was no fool, either - if it wasn't for Adrian's summons I would have never ventured into the beast's maw.

What was done was done. I could only hope to survive Zagoravia long enough to find Adrian.
New Translation:
我正邁入自己的墳墓。

至少在我爬出了帶我來到扎戈拉維亞郊區的馬車殘骸後，我就這樣認為了。就在剛才進城前，我們被從天而降的石堆砸爛了。我的反應救了我，所以我還站在這裡，喘口氣，計劃我的下一步。

從我所站的地方看去，這座城市太過安靜了。但剛剛發生的事故說明馬車伕是對的，一聽到要來這裡，他就立刻拒絕我。我也不是笨蛋──要不是因為艾德里安的召喚，我永遠也不會冒險進入這野獸的巢穴。

事已至此，我只能希望在扎戈拉維亞能活得夠久，讓我找到艾德里安。

Text:
This was no ordinary demon manifestation.

I never saw a settlement this big completely deserted. I wished the citizens had the chance to flee but I knew that they were all dead. A few steps further down the street and I found what killed them. Spider demons. But they weren't the problem that made me feel shivers up my spine. It was the voice in my head.

The owner of the voice was clearly of the worst kind of monster - one that talks. Nothing good could come out from conversing with such a creature, so I decided to keep my mouth shut and ignore its taunts.
Old Text:
This was no ordinary demon manifestation.

I never saw a settlement this big completely deserted. I wished the citizens had the chance to flee but I knew that they were all dead. A few steps further down the street and I found what killed them. Spider demons. But they weren't the problem that made me feel shivers up my spine. It was the voice in my head.

The owner of the voice was clearly of the worst kind of monster - one that talks. Nothing good could come out from conversing with such a creature, so I decided to keep my mouth shut and ignore its taunts.
New Translation:
這不是單純的惡魔顯威。

我從未見過居住區被摧毀的如此徹底。我希望居民們有機會能逃跑，但我知道他們全都死了。沿著街道走了幾步，我找到了兇手──蜘蛛惡魔。但讓我感到背脊發涼的不是牠們，而是我腦海中的聲音。

聲音的主人顯然是怪物中最棘手的那種──會說話的傢伙。與這種傢伙交談絕不會有什麼好事，所以我決定閉緊嘴巴，無視它的嘲諷。

Text:
The queen had lost her mind.

She still believed that she can win her impossible fight and that help is on the way. Poor soul. She was in a complete denial. The survivors gathered around her in the castle weren't doing her any favour, fuelling her confidence with the loyalty they expressed - the only reason any of them remained in Zagoravia, no matter whether they realized it or not.

But that didn't concern me. According to her words there were still surviving hunters in the city. I hoped that Adrian is among them. Dead or alive, I was going to find you, my friend.
Old Text:
The queen had lost her mind.

She still believed that she can win her impossible fight and that help is on the way. Poor soul. She was in a complete denial. The survivors gathered around her in the castle weren't doing her any favour, fuelling her confidence with the loyalty they expressed - the only reason any of them remained in Zagoravia, no matter whether they realized it or not.

But that didn't concern me. According to her words there were still surviving hunters in the city. I hoped that Adrian is among them. Dead or alive, I was going to find you, my friend.
New Translation:
女王已經瘋了。

她還相信她能打贏這場毫無勝算的戰爭，相信援軍就在路上。可憐的人啊，她完全不能接受現實。城堡裡聚集在她身邊的倖存者，既無力幫她任何的忙，也無法用他們的忠誠激起她的信心。不管他們有沒有意識到，忠誠是他們仍留在扎戈拉維亞的唯一理由。

但那不關我的事。據她所說，城裡還有倖存的獵人。希望艾德里安是其中一人。不管是死是活，我都會找到你的，我的朋友。

Text:
I still have nightmares about thrusting my blade through Adrian's chest.

I knew I gave him what he craved - a release from his imprisonment. I saw it in his eyes - for a brief moment he was my friend again. As his body turned to ashes I felt overwhelmed with grief and anger.

But it wasn't the time for desperation. Adrian was used to lure me into Zagoravia. He was a mere puppet for the one who wanted me dead. Very well - I decided to satisfy the mastermind's desire and stay to make sure Adrian is avenged. But for this I needed help. Irene.
Old Text:
I still have nightmares about trusting my blade through Adrian's chest.

I knew I gave him what he craved - a release from his imprisonment. I saw it in his eyes - for a brief moment he was my friend again. As his body turned to ashes I felt overwhelmed with grief and anger.

But it wasn't the time for desperation. Adrian was used to lure me into Zagoravia. He was a mere puppet for the one who wanted me dead. Very well - I decided to satisfy the mastermind's desire and stay to make sure Adrian is avenged. But for this I needed help. Irene.
Old Translation:
I still have nightmares about trusting my blade through Adrian's chest.

I knew I gave him what he craved - a release from his imprisonment. I saw it in his eyes - for a brief moment he was my friend again. As his body turned to ashes I felt overwhelmed with grief and anger.

But it wasn't the time for desperation. Adrian was used to lure me into Zagoravia. He was a mere puppet for the one who wanted me dead. Very well - I decided to satisfy the mastermind's desire and stay to make sure Adrian is avenged. But for this I needed help. Irene.
New Translation:
我還做著噩夢，夢見我的劍刺穿了艾德里安的胸膛。

我知道我給了他渴望的東西──從禁錮中解脫。在他眼中我看見──有那麼一瞬間，他又成了我的朋友。在他的身體化成灰時，我感到無盡的悲痛和憤怒。

但現在不是絕望的時候。艾德里安被利用來引誘我進到扎戈拉維亞，他只是向我索命的人所操控的傀儡。很好，我決定滿足這個幕後黑手的願望，留在這裡，為艾德里安報仇。但為此我需要找艾琳幫我。

Text:
Another kingdom, same story. People dying because of their sovereign's hubris.

It seems that the Queen's guilt was waiting all this time below the surface of a mask of self-destructive denial. When Irene and I cornered her, she confessed everything. A dark pact between her and an unknown demon sealed Zagoravia's fate.

When fighting otherworldly forces you often have to follow the paths of the supernatural laws. The ghost of Tzar Borimir knew about the pact signed by the queen. I had to find his resting place and try to converse with him, hoping to discover the Gordian knot, the crux of the curse that befell Zagoravia.
Old Text:
Another kingdom, same story. People dying because of their sovereign's hubris.

It seems that the Queen's guilt was waiting all this time below the surface of a mask of self-destructive denial. When Irene and I cornered her, she confessed everything. A dark pact between her and an unknown demon sealed Zagoravia's fate.

When fighting otherworldly forces you often have to follow the paths of the supernatural laws. The ghost of Tzar Borimir knew about the pact signed by the queen. I had to find his resting place and try to converse with him, hoping to discover the Gordian knot, the crux of the curse that befell Zagoravia.
New Translation:
不同的王國，相同的故事。人民因君主的傲慢而死。

看來女王的罪行就是一直不願接受自我毀滅的現實。當我和艾琳把女王逼入絕境，她坦承了一切。她與一個未知惡魔之間的黑暗契約，決定了扎戈拉維亞的命運。

與非自然力量戰鬥時，你常常不得不循著超自然法則的道路前進。波利密爾沙皇的鬼魂知道女王簽訂的契約內容。我得找到他的逝世之地，試著與他交談，祈求能解開這個降臨於扎戈拉維亞的詛咒癥結。

Text:
Fate had finally revealed the purpose it had in store for me.

Years ago I obtained terrific demon powers through my own dark pact. I remembered how quickly the feeling of triumph they brought me was replaced by grief when the people I loved began paying the price for my bargain with their lives. I fled into exile and tried to atone my mistakes by fighting the very demons that cursed me. During all my life I viewed my unusual abilities as a taint.

But the ghost of Tzar Borimir showed me the way. It was my destiny to follow his legacy for he was the First Hunter who built the Order and this city to protect the Well of Worlds - the portal that connects our world and the countless alien dimensions where demons reside.
Old Text:
Fate had finally revealed the purpose it had in store for me.

Years ago I obtained terrific demon powers through my own dark pact. I remembered how quickly the feeling of triumph they brought me was replaced by grief when the people I loved began paying the price for my bargain with their lives. I fled into exile and tried to atone my mistakes by fighting the very demons that cursed me. During all my life I viewed my unusual abilities as a taint.

But the ghost of Tzar Borimir showed me the way. It was my destiny to follow his legacy for he was the First Hunter who built the Order and this city to protect the Well of Worlds - the portal that connects our world and the countless alien dimensions where demons reside.
New Translation:
命運終於揭露我即將面臨的使命。

幾年前，我簽下了黑暗契約，獲得了強大的惡魔之力。我記得，當我愛的人們，用生命為我的契約付出代價時，力量所帶來勝利的感覺是如何迅速地被悲傷取代。我到處流亡，並與那些詛咒我的惡魔奮戰，以彌補我的過錯。在我的一生中，我都把我的惡魔之力視作是污點。

但波利密爾沙皇的鬼魂給我指引了一條明路。我的命運是按照他的遺願行進的，因為祂是初代獵人，一手建立了獵魔組織和這座城市來保衛異界之井──那是一個連結我們世界和無數惡魔棲息的異界的傳送門。

Text:
I was going to hell.

To undo the curse that befell Zagoravia I had to physically destroy the contract that bound the word of Queen Katarina. The contract itself was within the possession of a powerful demon called The Solicitor, who happened to be of the worst kind - one that talks. I had to walk through the Well of Worlds and into the demon realm.

Was I afraid? Only a fool wouldn't be. But I was more than determined to make sure that Adrian and all those unfortunate hunters didn't die in vain.
Old Text:
I was going to hell.

To undo the curse that befell Zagoravia I had to physically destroy the contract that bound the word of Queen Katarina. The contract itself was within the possession of a powerful demon called The Solicitor, who happened to be of the worst kind - one that talks. I had to walk through the Well of Worlds and into the demon realm.

Was I afraid? Only a fool wouldn't be. But I was more than determined to make sure that Adrian and all those unfortunate hunters didn't die in vain.
New Translation:
我正邁向地獄。

為了解除降臨於扎戈拉維亞的詛咒，我必須摧毀卡特蓮娜女王的契約。契約被一個稱為誘魂者的強大惡魔占有，牠碰巧也是那種最棘手的惡魔──會說話的傢伙。我必須穿過異界之井，進入惡魔的領土。

我害怕嗎？只有傻子才不怕。但我已決心不讓艾德里安，還有那些不幸的獵人白白死去。

Text:
Gabriel had to die.

Malevolently tricking the young, dying Katarina into signing a dark pact, he promised to hide her from retribution with a cloaking spell. It was all part of his plan to ensure that the dark bargain can never be fulfilled. This allowed the demon forces to invade Zagoravia in search of the life that was promised to them. Assured in the success of his grand scheme he bargained his soul for control over the events, creating one big, elaborate trap with the sole purpose of destroying any hunter who ventured inside. Unfortunately too many of my brethren answered the call of the desperate queen who feared for her kingdom.

But Gabriel had to answer for one more crime. He was the one who pushed me towards accepting the demon taint as a gift, dooming my beloved family. My father had always supported the hunters' cause and so the vampire saw him as a threat. I bet Gabriel was laughing while watching me cry by his deathbed as he withered and died before my eyes.

It is ironic that Gabriel made me become what he fears the most. Calling me into the city was a mistake that was going to cost him.
Old Text:
Gabriel had to die.

Malevolently tricking the young, dying Katarina into signing a dark pact, he assured that the bargain would never be fulfilled, allowing the demon forces to invade Zagoravia. Assured in the success of his grand scheme he bargained his soul for control over the events, creating one big, elaborate trap with the sole purpose of destroying any hunter who ventured inside. Unfortunately too many of my brethren answered the call of the desperate queen who feared for her kingdom.

But Gabriel had to answer for one more crime. He was the one who pushed me towards accepting the demon taint as a gift, dooming my beloved family. My father had always supported the hunters' cause and so the vampire saw him as a threat. I bet Gabriel was laughing while watching me cry by his deathbed as he withered and died before my eyes.

It is ironic that Gabriel made me become what he fears the most. Calling me into the city was a mistake that was going to cost him.
New Translation:
加百列必須死。

惡意誘騙年輕、垂死的卡特蓮娜簽訂了黑暗契約，並承諾用屏障法術讓她躲過代價索求。但讓黑暗契約無法履行也是他計畫中的一環。這讓惡魔得以入侵扎戈拉維亞，以尋找被承諾屬於牠們的生命。為了確保這龐大的計畫成功，加百列拿自己的靈髓作為交易，將一切握在掌中，他建立了一個巨大複雜的陷阱，唯一的目的就是殺掉所有冒險進入的獵人。不幸的是，太多我的兄弟回應了絕望的女王為憂心王國安危而發出的號召。

但加百列還得對另一樁罪行付出代價。他也是誘惑我接受惡魔之力作為禮物的人，給我摯愛的家人帶來了死亡。我的父親一直在援助獵魔組織，所以這個吸血鬼一直視他為眼中釘。我打賭，在我親眼看著父親死去而哭喊時，加百列一定笑的很開心。

諷刺的是，加百列讓我成為了他最恐懼的東西。召喚我來這座城市是個錯誤，他一定會為此付出代價。

Text:
A different picture was unfolding.

Hidden behind the constant smoke screen from the Steam Quarter, it was hard to tell exactly how overwhelmingly grand Gabriel's mansion was. But once I traversed up the black hills that deceitfully revealed as little as possible of the manor, its full splendour became relevant. Indeed, menacing in its size, the luxurious and unorthodox facades painted an entirely different picture of the power stage here in Zagoravia. 

Obviously expanded time and again over the years, the entire design of the mansion revolved around revealing as little as possible of its grandness to the city below, masterfully making use of the rough hills that lied beneath it.

But once I got closer than any outsider was ever meant to, there was no longer hiding the absurd wealth and power that the owner, Gabriel, obviously wielded over Zagoravia. Of course, I was expected and none too soon did the ambushes begin.

Vampires flocking to their death one after another, countless meaningless deaths, paving the way to the one that matters - Gabriel. He knew I was coming for him.

Hidden behind the constant smoke screen from the Industrial Quarter, it was hard to tell exactly how overwhelmingly grand Gabriel's mansion was. But once I traversed up the black hills that deceitfully revealed as little as possible of the manor, its full splendour became relevant. Indeed, menacing in its size, the luxurious and unorthodox facades painted an entirely different picture of the power stage here in Zagoravia. 

Obviously expanded time and again over the years, the entire design of the mansion revolved around revealing as little as possible of its grandness to the city below, masterfully making use of the rough hills that lied beneath it.

But once I got closer than any outsider was ever meant to, there was no longer hiding the absurd wealth and power that the owner, Gabriel, obviously wielded over Zagoravia. Of course, I was expected and none too soon did the ambushes begin.

Vampires flocking to their death one after another, countless meaningless deaths, paving the way to the one that matters - Gabriel. He knew I was coming for him.
New Translation:
一幅截然不同的情景正在展開。

藏於蒸汽區的終年迷霧後面，無法看清加百列府邸的壯闊。但當我爬上那遮掩莊園身形的黑山之後，才看清莊園的幅員遼闊。確實，除了大得嚇人的壓迫感，其奢華和奇特的外牆也描繪出扎戈拉維亞權力舞台的另一面。

很明顯地，雖經持續擴建，但建築巧妙地運用腳下的粗獷山脈，將莊園盡可能地隱藏起來，不讓山下的人看出建築的宏偉。

但當我接近這個從未有人想接近的莊園，那個無疑操弄扎戈拉維亞的加百列所掌控的金錢與權力都無所遁形了。當然了，我預期的伏擊也正巧開始。

吸血鬼們一擁而上，卻一個個倒下，無數沒有意義的死亡，舖出了通往目標的道路──加百列。他知道我是來取他的命的。

Text:
Can evil ever be truly defeated? Or is it eternal, like a dark seed, always finding new ways to sprout and corrupt the world?

The soul of the elder vampire now belongs to the Solicitor, bound by the pact signed with his own unholy blood. In the end, he fell victim to his own plot. Poetic justice, maybe? Some kind of justice, to be sure.

Queen Katarina's pact was destroyed in the final fight. A difficult task lied ahead of her - rebuilding Zagoravia and dealing with the aftermath of all bad decisions in the past.

She was not the only one who has to rebuild. Even in death, Gabriel accomplished his goals, tilting the balance of powers in the world for the worse. The Family, our order of hunters, was all but vanquished. Bearing my curse, I was not the person to restore it.

I knew the right hunter for the job, but this is a different story...
Old Text:

The soul of the elder vampire now belongs to the Solicitor, bound by the pact signed with his own unholy blood. In the end, he fell victim to his own plot. Poetic justice, maybe? Some kind of justice, to be sure.

Queen Katarina's pact was destroyed in the final fight. A difficult task lied ahead of her - rebuilding Zagoravia and dealing with the aftermath of all bad decisions in the past.

She was not the only one who has to rebuild. Even in death, Gabriel accomplished his goals, tilting the balance of powers in the world for the worse. The Family, our order of hunters, was all but vanquished. Bearing my curse, I was not the person to restore it.

I knew the right hunter for the job, but this is a different story...
New Translation:
邪惡能被徹底打敗嗎？或者它是永恆的，就像一顆黑暗的種子，總能找到新的土壤發芽，然後腐化這個世界？

這個古老吸血鬼的靈髓現在屬於誘魂者的了，被自己不淨之血所簽訂的契約束縛。最終，他淪為了自己計畫的犧牲品。是惡有惡報嗎？也算是某種報應吧。

卡特蓮娜女王的契約在決戰中被摧毀了。她面臨一項艱巨的任務──重建扎戈拉維亞，設法彌補她過去的決定所帶來的後果。

她並不是唯一一個必須去重建的人。即使死了，加百列還是完成了他的目標，把世界力量的平衡向不好的方向傾斜。我們的家、獵魔組織被擊垮了。背負詛咒的我，並不是適合去恢復組織的人。

我知道適合這份工作的獵人，但這又是另一個故事了……

Text:
When I stepped through the portal I was expecting to see a world torn by the ravages of war but I was not prepared for what was to come before my eyes. Ruins upon ruins, scorched earth and dark smoke reached to the horizon. What weapons could inflict such devastation? And more importantly, why the people of this world did this to themselves? Why didn’t they stop?

In my long line of work I have fought demons and spirits, but I have never fought madness. How was I going to fight against this? I felt desperate and beaten even before my fight began. But when I was ready to give up and go back I heard it.

Rock music.

Lemmy left for good. I knew he wasn't coming back. Without him the pub felt as a void, as if someone deprived the place of its meaning and warmth. Lloyd was trying to hide it but the emptiness was there, in his eyes, even that he wasn't expressing it.

I had the feeling that Lemmy was meant to leave even before I came here, but he was waiting for me, waiting to look me in the eye and see what my worth is. The knowledge that I carry the burden of duty could have scared someone else, but I felt honored and this feeling gave me strength.

As long as there is rock and people who want to rock and roll, the fight is not lost.

Warpig was the apotheosis of the cruelty and ruination war brings, but the true evil of this world was the Führer. Not because he misguided his desperate people and pushed them over the edge. Every petty dictator does that. He was evil for another reason - because he refused to step down from power when fate demanded that he dies, perverting the way the world works.

The Warpig and the Führer are no more, but the fight goes on. This is a fight against the lying politician, against those who want to crush you and reform your mind and soul to serve as a tool for their egoistical goals.

Freedom has to be fought for.
The Death of a False God

I was watching at the lifeless body of the Preacher buried beneath the smoking rubble of the Orgasmatron and I started to wonder - why did he do all of this? Was he really a homicidal sociopath who purged the population of the Wild West for his own goals? Or he really believed that he was serving the will of his deity, pursuing non-existent sins?

I knew that my questions will remain unanswered, but the evil was done. The Wild West was never going to be the same - only because its people were forced to abandon their reason and blindly follow, becoming the play-things of a twisted god. I could only hope that the survivors, if any are left, would learn their lesson.

Only those who have lost faith need priests and temples to guide them.
Born to Lose. Live to Win

I witnessed enough death and cruelty for a lifetime. Three worlds drenched in the blood of the innocents, left lifeless and silent. I felt sick.

This is what happens when enough people fear the burden of responsibility and instead turn to the one who promises them the brave new world. The lies of the politician, the zeal of the fanatic, the greed of the rich - all of them empowered by the people who lost their integrity, who chose not to fight the establishment.

I will never forget that I am the one who forges his own destiny. The only thing that draws the line between good and evil is me. And you.

Rock'n'Roll

Increase Damage - Combine a weapon with 3 Weapons of the same or better rarity.

Increase Critical Chance - Combine a weapon with 3 Destiny Cards of the same or better rarity.

Add a Property - Combine a rare or uncommon weapon with a specific combination of 3 legendary Demon Powers to add a Property the weapon does not have yet. Note: This will replace any Property added in a previous transmutation.

Improve a Property - Combine a weapon with the combination of three Demon Powers associated with the Property. The Demon Powers do not have to be legendary, but the effect will be stronger when legendary Demon Powers are used.
Old Text:
Increase Damage - Combine a weapon with 3 Weapons of the same or better rarity.

Increase Critical Chance - Combine a weapon with 3 Destiny Cards of the same or better rarity.

Add a Property - Combine a rare weapon with a specific combination of 3 legendary Demon Powers to add a Property the weapon does not have yet. Experiment to discover the combinations that create different Properties. Note: This will replace any Property added in a previous transmutation.

Improve a Property - Combine a weapon with the combination of three Demon Powers associated with the Property. The Demon Powers do not have to be legendary, but the effect will be stronger when legendary Demon Powers are used.

Increase Damage - Combine a weapon with 3 Weapons of the same or better rarity.

Increase Critical Chance - Combine a weapon with 3 Destiny Cards of the same or better rarity.

Add a Property - Combine a rare weapon with a specific combination of 3 legendary Demon Powers to add a Property the weapon does not have yet. Experiment to discover the combinations that create different Properties. Note: This will replace any Property added in a previous transmutation.

Improve a Property - Combine a weapon with the combination of three Demon Powers associated with the Property. The Demon Powers do not have to be legendary, but the effect will be stronger when legendary Demon Powers are used.
New Translation:
提升傷害：將1把武器與3把相同或更高稀有度的武器合成。

提升暴擊率：將1把武器與3張相同或更高稀有度的命運牌合成。

附加屬性：將1把稀有或罕見的武器與特定的3個傳奇惡魔之力合成，可給武器附加沒有的屬性。注意：這會取代任何先前合成所附加的屬性。

提升屬性：將1把武器與3個屬性相關的惡魔之力合成。惡魔之力不必是傳奇的，但使用傳奇的惡魔之力效果更強。

Text:
Transmute 3 common (white) weapons to create a new random uncommon (green) weapon.

Transmute 3 uncommon (green) weapons to create a new random uncommon (green) or rare (yellow) weapon.

Transmute 3 rare (yellow) weapons to create a new random rare (yellow) or a very small chance for a legendary (purple) weapon.

Three weapons of a given type always create a new weapon of the same type, except legendary weapons which are always of a random type. For example 3 common swords will transmute into a new uncommon sword.
Old Text:
Transmute 3 common (white) weapons to create a new random uncommon (green) weapon.

Transmute 3 uncommon (green) weapons to create a new random uncommon (green) or rare (yellow) weapon.

Transmute 3 rare (yellow) weapons to create a new random rare (yellow) or a very small chance for a legendary (purple) weapon.

Three weapons of a given type always create a new weapon of the same type. For example 3 common swords will transmute into a new uncommon sword.
Old Translation:
Transmute 3 common (white) weapons to create a new random uncommon (green) weapon.

Transmute 3 uncommon (green) weapons to create a new random uncommon (green) or rare (yellow) weapon.

Transmute 3 rare (yellow) weapons to create a new random rare (yellow) or a very small chance for a legendary (purple) weapon.

Three weapons of a given type always create a new weapon of the same type. For example 3 common swords will transmute into a new uncommon sword.
New Translation:
將3把普通（白色）武器合成會得到新的隨機罕見（綠色）武器。

將3把罕見（綠色）武器合成會得到新的隨機罕見（綠色）或稀有（黃色）武器。

將3把稀有（黃色）武器合成會得到新的隨機稀有（黃色）武器，有極小機率得到傳奇（紫色）武器。

3把同種武器進行合成時，得到的新武器也會是同一種，只有傳奇武器得到的種類是隨機的。例如：3把普通長劍會合成為1把罕見長劍。

Text:
Colorization - combine an outfit with a Dye or combination of Dyes. Not all Dye combinations are possible.

Improve Armor - combine an Outfit with a legendary Demon Power.

Improve special Property - combine an Outfit with a legendary Destiny Card.
New Translation:
染色：將1件服裝與1種染料或多種染料合成。並非所有染料的組合都行得通。

提升防禦：將1件服裝與1個傳奇惡魔之力合成。

提升特殊屬性：將1件服裝與1張傳奇命運牌合成。

Text:
Improve base Property - combine a Demon Power with three Demon Powers of the same type with the same or better rarity.

Improve secondary Property - combine a Demon Power with three Demon Powers of other types with the same or better rarity.

Create a random Demon Power - combine 3 Demon Powers to create a random Demon Power of the same rarity.
Old Text:
Improve base Property - combine a Demon Power with three Demon Powers of the same type with the same or better rarity.

Improve secondary Property - combine a Demon Power with three Demon Powers of other types with the same or better rarity.

Create a random Demon Power - combine 3 different Demon Powers to create a random Demon Power of the same rarity.
Old Translation:
Improve base Property - combine a Demon Power with three Demon Powers of the same type with the same or better rarity.

Improve secondary Property - combine a Demon Power with three Demon Powers of other types with the same or better rarity.

Create a random Demon Power - combine 3 different Demon Powers to create a random Demon Power of the same rarity.
New Translation:
提升基本屬性：將1個惡魔之力與3個同類且具有相同或更高稀有度的惡魔之力合成。

提升第二屬性：將1個惡魔之力與3個不同類且具有相同或更高稀有度的惡魔之力合成。

創造隨機的惡魔之力：將3個惡魔之力合成，可隨機創造1個相同稀有度的惡魔之力。

Text:
Improve Rarity - three cards of the same rarity and type produce one card of the higher rarity, if it exists. If all cards are Divine or Wicked, the resulting card will also be Divine or Wicked.

Make a card Divine or Wicked - combine a normal card with 3 Divine or 3 Wicked cards of the same or better rarity.

Improve Divine Property - combine a Divine card with 3 Divine cards.

Improve Wicked Property - combine a Wicked card with 3 Wicked cards.
Old Text:
Improve Rarity - three cards of the same rarity and type produce one card of the higher rarity, if it exists. If all cards are Divine or Wicked, the resulting card will also be Divine or Wicked.

Make a card Divine or Wicked - combine a normal card with 3 Divine or 3 Wicked cards of the same or better rarity.

Improve Divine Property - combine a Divine card with 3 Divine cards of the same or better rarity.

Improve Wicked Property - combine a Wicked card with 3 Wicked cards of the same or better rarity.
Old Translation:
Improve Rarity - three cards of the same rarity and type produce one card of the higher rarity, if it exists. If all cards are Divine or Wicked, the resulting card will also be Divine or Wicked.

Make a card Divine or Wicked - combine a normal card with 3 Divine or 3 Wicked cards of the same or better rarity.

Improve Divine Property - combine a Divine card with 3 Divine cards of the same or better rarity.

Improve Wicked Property - combine a Wicked card with 3 Wicked cards of the same or better rarity.
New Translation:
提高稀有度：3張同類且同稀有度的牌可以生成1張更高稀有度的牌（如果有的話）。如果所有牌都是神聖牌或邪惡牌，生成的牌也會是神聖牌或邪惡牌。

製作神聖牌或邪惡牌：將1張普通牌與3張相同或更高稀有度的神聖牌或邪惡牌合成。

提升神聖屬性：將1張神聖牌與3張神聖牌合成。

提升邪惡屬性：將1張邪惡牌與3張邪惡牌合成。

Text:
Power Stones are used to directly upgrade an item. 

Each Power Stone has a description of what the upgrade will be and what item is required as a base. 

Only one Power Stone can be used per transmutation.
New Translation:
能量石是用來直接升級物品的。

每顆能量石都有描述升級的項目和需要滿足的條件。

每次合成只能使用一顆能量石。

Castle Zagore is the only remaining beacon of hope in this god-forsaken city. There are survivors here - tough, grim and desperate. I wonder for how long I can use this place as my base of operations before the forces of darkness sniff the living souls hidden behind its thick walls.
Old Text: Castle Zagore is the only remaining beacon of hope in this god-forsaken city. There are survivors here - tough, grim and desperate. I wonder for how long I can use this place as my base of operations before the forces of darkness sniff the living souls hidden behind its thick walls.
Old Translation: Castle Zagore is the only remaining beacon of hope in this god-forsaken city. There are survivors here - tough, grim and desperate. I wonder for how long I can use this place as my base of operations before the forces of darkness sniff the living souls hidden behind its thick walls.
New Translation: 扎戈爾城是這個被上帝遺棄之地僅存的最後希望。這裡仍有些倖存者──艱苦、沮喪又絕望。在黑暗勢力嗅出高牆背後還躲著活人前，不知道我還可以將這個地方作為作戰基地多久。

Text: I released the Guards from the cruel fate of the undead and took whatever I could from the Fallen Keep. I can see the imposing silhouette of Castle Zagore, standing proud like the tallest headstone in this graveyard of a city. I think I can make out lights on the upper floors. Perhaps there are survivors behind the tall walls of the castle.
Old Text: I released the Guards from the cruel fate of the undeath and took whatever I could from the Fallen Keep. I can see the imposing silhouette of Castle Zagore, standing proud like the tallest headstone in this graveyard of a city. I think I can make out lights on the upper floors. Perhaps there are survivors behind the tall walls of the castle.
Old Translation: I released the Guards from the cruel fate of the undeath and took whatever I could from the Fallen Keep. I can see the imposing silhouette of Castle Zagore, standing proud like the tallest headstone in this graveyard of a city. I think I can make out lights on the upper floors. Perhaps there are survivors behind the tall walls of the castle.
New Translation: 我把守衛從不死的殘酷命運中解放了出來，並搜括了淪陷的堡壘。從這裡能看到扎戈爾城的宏偉輪廓傲然挺立，仿佛這墓園中最高聳的墓碑一樣。我依稀能看到上層有微弱的燈光，也許在那厚厚的高牆背後還有倖存者。

Text: I have persuaded GebaN, the demon broker, to grant me access to a mysterious void-world known as the Bottomless Pit. An experienced merchant's gamble no doubt. The lower I descend into this starry hell, tougher demons increase the odds that GebaN will have new stock to sell after he loots it from my dead body.
Old Text: I have persuaded Geban, the demon broker, to grant me access to a mysterious void-world known as the Bottomless Pit. An experienced merchant's gamble no doubt. The lower I descend into this starry hell, tougher demons increase the odds that Gaben will have new stock to sell after he loots it from my dead body.
Old Translation: I have persuaded GebaN, the demon broker, to grant me access to a mysterious void-world known as the Bottomless Pit. An experienced merchant's gamble no doubt. The lower I descend into this starry hell, tougher demons increase the odds that GebaN will have new stock to sell after he loots it from my dead body.
New Translation: 我已經說服了惡魔仲介商．Ｇ瘦，讓我進入名為無底深淵的神祕虛空世界。毫無疑問，這一定是老奸商的一場賭博。我在這地獄中走得越深，惡魔就越強，Ｇ瘦從我屍體上搜括貨品來轉售的機會就越大。

Text: The gates of the keep are shut tight. I found an alternative route through a broken sewer grate. By the looks of it, something else passed through before me. The place reeks of death and I am beginning to doubt that there are any survivors here.
Old Text: The gates of the keep are shut tight. I found an alternative route through a broken sewer grate. By the looks of it, something else passed through before me. The place reeks of death and I am beginning to doubt that there are any survivors here.
Old Translation: The gates of the keep are shut tight. I found an alternative route through a broken sewer grate. By the looks of it, something else passed through before me. The place reeks of death and I am beginning to doubt that there are any survivors here.
New Translation: 堡壘的大門緊閉著。我找到了另一條經由破損的下水道柵欄進去的路。看樣子，有什麼東西在我之前就通過了。到處瀰漫著死亡的氣息，我開始懷疑這裡是否還有倖存者了。

Text: The pavilion was drunk in the abnormality of the supernatural. I somehow knew that I was walking into a cursed place that defied the twisted, yet familiar, ways of darkness. But I wasn't prepared to find not monsters but hunters who attacked me with ferocious savagery. Who were they, creations of the demon energies or wanderers from across the endless Void? I didn't know for certain rest for the elation of the arena itself, as if it was a creature feeding on the pain of the dying and the triumph of the victors.
New Translation: 帳篷由於超自然的力量變得畸形了。不知怎麼，我知道自己正走進一個扭曲、卻又熟悉的詛咒之地、黑暗之道。但我沒想到攻擊我的不是怪物，而是狂暴且凶殘的獵人。他們是什麼？惡魔之力的創造物？還是無盡虛空的流浪者？我不知道為什麼舞台顯得興高采烈，仿佛它是以死亡的痛苦和勝利的喜悅為食的生物一般。

Text: The descent into the depths is a harrowing experience. Every step makes me feel even more frail and mortal, as if my soul is descending into the Underworld only to be lost forever. For the first time since I laid step upon the soil of Zagoravia I feel utter fear of the future - the Howling Abyss and its secret may prove to be a bite too large even for me. I can only clench the handle of my trusted weapon and try to shake the uneasy feeling that the shrieking wails coming from beneath are calling for my death.

For the first time since I laid step upon the soil of Zagoravia I feel utter fear of the future - the Howling Abyss and its secret may prove to be a bite too large even for me. I can only clench the handle of my trusted weapon and try to shake the uneasy feeling that the shrieking wails coming from beneath are calling for my death.
New Translation: 深入下層是十分痛苦的經驗。每一步都讓我感覺自己更加的虛弱與不堪，仿佛我的靈魂會永遠迷失在冥界一樣。自踏入扎戈拉維亞以來，我第一次對未來感到恐懼──即使是我也可能無法承受哀嚎深淵和它的祕密。我現在只能握緊武器，盡力把腳下傳來向我索命的尖嘯和這種不安拋在腦後了。

Text: The Pub at the End of Time

The Pub at the End of Time stands here, as it has always been. The power of Rock keeps it whole and with purpose, a place where the rebellious misfit who wanders the worlds can get lost in the anarchic revolt of the music, brave trying one of the hazardous concoctions mixed by Llloyd and listen to a story about the time when the universe was a far different, much better place.

The corridor of the abandoned shelter leads to a vertical shaft. I feel a faint vibration when I touch the rusted metal ladder that leads up. Now I hear something. It's distant and unintelligible but I can swear it resembles rock music. What could dare sing in this death-ridden place?

It appears that something huge carved its path through the thick wall of the abandoned house and dug in below the ground. I have no choice but to follow through and hope that whatever did this is no longer there.
The Führer quickly took over this world and its people, but that was not enough to satisfy his craving for power. He plunged it into a never-ending war until nothing remained but total destruction.

“The one that you know oh so well, the woman to send you to hell 
Claws that are sharp, she'll tear you apart, make you into food for the crows”

The Queen of the Damned knew that they craved to have the world at their feet. And she took it all - what they offered and more. Now all the riches in this world are hers and all the souls are her damned slaves.

When the Preacher first came about, nobody could guess this shambling man possessed such lust for violence. His words galvanized the simple folk and turned them into unquestionable lynch mob driven by lies, manipulation and "enlightenment".

This is the only place of relative stability in the ever-shifting chaos of the Fractured Worlds. Every minute I spend here I trust my life in the hands of the untold powers which prevent the Locus from disintegrating into the cold void beyond.

Defeat the Queen of the Damned
Slay the Queen of the Damned
Defeat the Queen of the Damned
Slay the Queen of the Damned
It is in moments of decision that one's fate is shaped.
I sealed mine long ago, bargaining power from the demon world.
But it brought me nothing but pain and grief and cast me into exile, a wanderer with no safe haven.
Ever since I've craved to break my demon contract and undo my wrongs.
Until recently it was but a naive dream. Then I heard of the Astrolabe.
The legend said it could lead me to the one thing my heart desired the most.
And there was only one who could tell me how to find it.
You do not know this, but you’ve come to the right demon. The Astrolabe is my creation, my masterpiece. It is powerful enough to change one’s destiny!
In an unfortunate turn of events it shattered into pieces. The cataclysm threw an entire plane of existence into chaos. It is now infested with mindless creatures of immense power and malice.
No one dares enter the fractured worlds. For millenia they was out of my reach but are you willing to go?

"The answer to life's mystery is simple and direct: Sex and Death!"
(Sex and Death)

"Speed don't kill and I'm the proof - just call me Snaggletooth."
(Snaggletooth)

"Easy to be cruel, hard to be kind."
(Over your shoulder)

"Sword and shield, bone and steel, rictus grin -  deaf forever to the battles din."
(Deaf forever)

"I am the one, Orgasmatron, the outstretched grasping hand. My image is of agony, my servants rape the land."
(Orgasmatron)

"Born in pain, end in grief, remember this and die."
(Dust and Glass)

"We are Motörhead. And we play rock and roll."
(Lemmy Kilmister)

"I don’t do regrets. Regrets are pointless. It’s too late for regrets. You’ve already done it, haven’t you?"
(Lemmy Kilmister)

"Lloyd “woops-a-daisy” Kaufman is a fine, upstanding loony, as everybody knows!"
(Lemmy Kilmister)
When asked what it was like to be immortalized in film, Lemmy famously replied: "Immortalized is one thing, Troma is another. I don’t know if they’re going to last."
DID YOU KNOW THAT... Lemmy was a Troma movie regular, appearing in 6 of Lloyd Kaufman's movies?
DID YOU KNOW THAT... the song "You better run" was rerecorded as "You better swim" for the Spongebob movie?
DID YOU KNOW THAT... there was only one album cover that did not feature Snaggletooth? (Overnight Sensation)
DID YOU KNOW THAT... the amazing Alan Burridge, author of the best books about the band, created the first fanzine way back in 1980?
DID YOU KNOW THAT... Motörhead have recorded more than 250 songs in their 40 year history?
DID YOU KNOW THAT... Motörhead toured relentlessly, doing way over 2.500 shows?

Text: Step right up! Enter the Freakshow Arena where you may resolve who is the top hunter - by a fight to the bitter end! You may now enter the Freakshow PvP Arena to duel your fellow hunters through the world map.

Text: The way down the Bottomless Pit has now been revealed to you - a loathsome journey into an unknown void consisting of demon infested arenas. No one knows the true origin and purpose of this ethereal place. Find it on the world map.
New Translation: 無底深淵的入口現在已經開放──那裡是由群魔盤踞的競技場所構成的未知虛空，是一段令人厭惡的旅程。沒有人知道這個地方的起源和建造目的。你可以在世界地圖上找到它。

Text:
Select this outfit if you favor a balanced playstyle or you like to be at your strongest in dire circumstances.

The Hunter's Outfit's grants additional Overdrive when you suffer damage which allows you to use your demon powers more often in tough encounters. It offers a balanced playstyle and will serve you well in every situation.
Old Text:
Select this outfit if you favor a balanced playstyle or you like to be at your strongest in dire circumstances.

The Hunter's Outfit's grants additional Overdrive when you suffer damage which allows you to use your demonic powers more often in tough encounters. It offers a balanced playstyle and will serve you well in every situation.
Old Translation:
Select this outfit if you favor a balanced playstyle or you like to be at your strongest in dire circumstances.

The Hunter's Outfit's grants additional Overdrive when you suffer damage which allows you to use your demon powers more often in tough encounters. It offers a balanced playstyle and will serve you well in every situation.
New Translation:
如果你偏好平衡的遊戲風格或希望在危難時能保持最佳狀態，那就選擇這套服裝吧。

獵人服裝會在承受傷害時凝聚額外超能，可讓你在遭遇勁敵時更頻繁地施展惡魔之力。它提供一種平衡的遊戲風格，讓你能很好地應付各種狀況。

Text:
This outfit offers the same stats as the Cavalier's Outfit. It is our special gift to everyone who supported us!

The Wanderer's Outfit grants Overdrive automatically over time, but your weapon attacks will not generate Overdrive. It will allow you to use Demon Powers reliably and start encounters at full Overdrive.
Old Text:
This outfit offers the same stats as the Cavalier's Outfit. It is our special gift to everyone who supported us during Early Access!

The Wanderer's Outfit grants Overdrive automatically over time, but your weapon attacks will not generate Overdrive. It will allow you to use Demon Powers reliably and start encounters at full Overdrive.
Old Translation:
This outfit offers the same stats as the Cavalier's Outfit. It is our special gift to everyone who supported us during Early Access!

The Wanderer's Outfit grants Overdrive automatically over time, but your weapon attacks will not generate Overdrive. It will allow you to use Demon Powers reliably and start encounters at full Overdrive.
New Translation:
這套服裝與紳士服裝的效果相同，是我們贈與所有支持者的小禮物！

浪人服裝會隨時間自動凝聚超能，但武器攻擊將不會凝聚超能。它讓你能穩定地運用惡魔之力，而且在開始戰鬥時超能會聚滿。

Text:
Select this outfit if you want to create a specialized build focused on precision and critical strikes.

The Vigilante's Outfit grants Overdrive only when you score critical hits against your enemies. The Armor provided by the outfit will reduce the damage of some of the attacks that you suffer.
New Translation:
如果你想創造一個專精於精準和暴擊的角色，那就選擇這套服裝吧。

警探服裝只會在對敵人造成暴擊時凝聚超能。服裝提供的防禦也會降低你所受的一些攻擊傷害。

Text:
Select this outfit if you favor playing a 'caster' hero.

The Cavalier's Outfit grants Overdrive automatically over time, but your weapon attacks will not generate Overdrive. It will allow you to use Demon Powers reliably and start encounters at full Overdrive.
New Translation:
如果你偏好「法師系」角色，那就選擇這套服裝吧。

紳士服裝會隨時間自動凝聚超能，但武器攻擊將不會凝聚超能。它讓你能穩定地運用惡魔之力，而且在開始戰鬥時超能會聚滿。

Damage per Bomb: <lightgreen><damage></lightgreen>
Burning Duration: <lightgreen><duration_s>.<duration_d></lightgreen> sec

Summon a giant fist from the skies to smash an area ahead of you. The fist hits the ground several times dealing high damage and inflicting <lightgreen2><condition_name></lightgreen2> to all enemies in its radius.

Damage per Smash: <lightgreen><damage></lightgreen>
Smash Radius: <lightgreen><radius_m>.<radius_cm></lightgreen> m<condition_description>

Summon a magical lightning rod that beams out waves of pure electricity. Each wave inflicts <lightgreen2><condition1_name></lightgreen2> and <lightgreen2><condition2_name></lightgreen2> to all enemies on its path. Multiple rods are linked with beams of lightning which damages crossing enemies.

Lightning Beam Damage: <lightgreen><damage></lightgreen>
Lightning Rod Duration: <lightgreen><duration_s>.<duration_d> sec</lightgreen><condition1_description><condition2_description>

Damage per Wave: <lightgreen><damage></lightgreen>
Number of Pulses: <lightgreen><pulses></lightgreen>

Release your inner demon pushing back all enemies in front of you and inflicting the <lightgreen2><condition_name></lightgreen2> condition in a larger area.

<condition_name> Radius: <lightgreen><radius2_m>.<radius2_cm></lightgreen> m<condition_description>

Duration: <lightgreen><duration1_s>.<duration1_d></lightgreen> sec
<condition2_name> Duration: <lightgreen><duration2_s>.<duration2_d></lightgreen> sec<condition1_description><condition2_description>

Spawn Loudspeaker from Hell, which inflicts <lightgreen2><condition_name></lightgreen2> to all nearby enemies. Affected enemies start headbanging until they take damage. After several seconds, the Loudspeaker explodes dealing damage. Bosses, champions and heroes are immune to headbanging. The loudspeaker can be attacked and destroyed.

Duration: <lightgreen><duration_s>.<duration_d></lightgreen> sec

Text:

Text:
The standard game difficulty, recommended for players that have some experience with aRPGs.

Note: You will be able to adjust the game difficulty later, by switching Hexes on and off.

標準遊戲難度，推薦給有玩過動作角色扮演遊戲的玩家。

注意：你之後可以通過啟用或停用禁咒來調整遊戲難度。

Text:
Select this option if you want to test yourself against the most challenging enemies and encounters. Selecting this mode will make all monsters stronger and activate five Hexes that raise the difficulty of the game. You will not be able to turn Hexes off while playing on Hard Mode.

Note: Playing in Hard Mode is not recommended for your first character.

Text:
Transmutation allows you to create new items and improve your existing items.

To improve an existing item put it in the top slot and combine it with up to 3 ingredients in the bottom slots.

To create a new item, combine the ingredients in the bottom slots and leave the top slot empty.

Check your Codex to see the standard recipes. Some recipes are secret and will not be shown in the Codex.

Transmutation allows you to create new items and improve your existing items.

To improve an existing item put in the top slot and combine it with up to 3 ingredients in the bottom slots.

Check your Codex to see the standard recipes. Some recipes are secret and will not be shown in the Codex.

合成讓你能創造新物品，或強化已有物品。

若要強化已有物品，將其放入上方欄位，並在下方欄位加入最多3個原料以進行合成。

若要創造新物品，在下方欄位加入原料，並將上方欄位留空以進行合成。

在百科全書中可以查看普通配方。某些配方祕而不宣，未被收錄在百科全書內。

Text: As Apocalypse fell into oblivion, I realized that I survived death itself. I fought War, Conquest, Famine and Pestilence and somehow I live past that day. But I know that I shouldn't let my hubris take over me, for I have destroyed a mere shard of the essence of Apocalypse. Priests tell of the End Day when his true form would manifest and bring the end of everything. I now have the faith that if this day ever comes, humanity would be able to fight him and win.
Old Text: As Apocalypse fell into oblivion, I realized that I survived death itself. I fought War, Conquest, Famine and Pestilence and somehow I live past that day. But I know that I shouldn't let my hubris take over me, for I have destroyed a mere shard of the essence of Apocalypse. Priests tell of the End Day when his true form would manifest and bring the end of everything. I now have the faith that if this day ever comes, humanity would be able to fight him and win.
Old Translation: As Apocalypse fell into oblivion, I realized that I survived death itself. I fought War, Conquest, Famine and Pestilence and somehow I live past that day. But I know that I shouldn't let my hubris take over me, for I have destroyed a mere shard of the essence of Apocalypse. Priests tell of the End Day when his true form would manifest and bring the end of everything. I now have the faith that if this day ever comes, humanity would be able to fight him and win.
New Translation: 當天啟墜落到湮沒之地後，我才發現我逃過了一劫。我對抗戰爭、征服、饑荒和死亡，我都挺過來了。但我知道不能狂妄自大，因為我消滅的僅僅是天啟的一小部分。司鐸們都提及天啟降臨之日，祂的真身將會化現並摧毀一切。我現在堅信，如果這一天真的到來，我們人類會有能力戰勝祂的。

Text: Slay the aspects of Apocalypse to make him vulnerable
Old Text: Slay the aspects of Apocalypse to make him vulnerable
Old Translation: Slay the aspects of Apocalypse to make him vulnerable
New Translation: 殺死天啟的化身讓祂失去行動能力。
天啟目前已失去行動能力。

Text: The unique sinister trait of the Ravenous Souls is that they actively seek their prey. Unlike other Wraiths they do not haunt a location or a person - instead they hunt their quarry, most usually unwary travelers, quickly devouring their life force and then rushing to find another victim.
Old Text: The unique sinister trait of the Ravenous Souls is that they actively seek their prey. Unlike other Wraiths they do not haunt a location or a person - instead they hunt their quarry, most usually unwary travelers, quickly devouring their life force and then rushing to find another victim.
Old Translation: The unique sinister trait of the Ravenous Souls is that they actively seek their prey. Unlike other Wraiths they do not haunt a location or a person - instead they hunt their quarry, most usually unwary travelers, quickly devouring their life force and then rushing to find another victim.
New Translation: 餓鬼唯一的邪惡之處就是會主動地尋找獵物。不同於其它怨靈，祂們並不會死守一地或死纏一人，祂們獵食的，反倒通常是粗心的過路者，迅速吞噬他們的生命後立即尋找下一位受害者。

Text: Spectral Binders are heinous Wraiths which usurp the souls of mortals they devour. With ages passing, a Spectral Binder would accumulate a swarm of bound souls which it would use as living weapons for the subdual of its prey.
Old Text: Spectral Binders are heinous Wraiths which usurp the souls of mortals they devour. With ages passing, a Spectral Binder would accumulate a swarm of bound souls which it would use as living weapons for the subdual of its prey.
Old Translation: Spectral Binders are heinous Wraiths which usurp the souls of mortals they devour. With ages passing, a Spectral Binder would accumulate a swarm of bound souls which it would use as living weapons for the subdual of its prey.
New Translation: 聚魂者是極度邪惡的怨靈，祂們會吞噬強奪而來的人類靈魂。隨著歲月流逝，聚魂者會累積到一大群的靈魂，而這些靈魂將會被當成生命武器來對付祂的獵物。

Text: Seeking Projectiles - Zone of Crippling on Death
Old Text: Seeking Projectiles - Zone of Crippling on Death
Old Translation: Seeking Projectiles - Zone of Crippling on Death

Text: It was a common practice among ancient sovereigns to seek a way to cheat death with the use of a dark ritual that bound their souls to conjured Wraiths. This ritual draws the attention of the Wraith towards its mortal host and usually resulted in a quick death. Then the unified essence of host and Wraith would be reborn as a Forgotten King gifted with ancient lore of arcane destruction.
Old Text: It was a common practice among ancient sovereigns to seek a way to cheat death with the use of a dark ritual that bound their souls to conjured Wraiths. This ritual draws the attention of the Wraith towards its mortal host and usually resulted in a quick death. Then the unified essence of host and Wraith would be reborn as a Forgotten King gifted with ancient lore of arcane destruction.
Old Translation: It was a common practice among ancient sovereigns to seek a way to cheat death with the use of a dark ritual that bound their souls to conjured Wraiths. This ritual draws the attention of the Wraith towards its mortal host and usually resulted in a quick death. Then the unified essence of host and Wraith would be reborn as a Forgotten King gifted with ancient lore of arcane destruction.
New Translation: 這在古代君王中很常見，他們尋求一種欺騙死神的方法，利用一種黑暗儀式將自己的靈魂與召喚出來的怨靈綁在一起。這個儀式會引起怨靈對宿主的注意，通常會導致宿主快速死亡。然後宿主與怨靈會融為一體，成為忘卻之王，並擁有毀滅性祕術的古老知識。

Text: Reapers are Wraiths that enjoy the pain of their victims. Once they pick their quarry, they would stalk it, usually hidden inside solid objects or the ground itself, waiting for the perfect moment to fly forward with a piercing shriek. The sudden assault aims to catch the unprepared target off-guard, giving it little chance to avoid the bladed claws of the Reaper. The rest is a tale of bloody, gruesome agony as the Wraith tears its screaming victim apart.
