Old Translation: Reapers are Wraiths that enjoy the pain of their victims. Once they pick their quarry, they would stalk it, usually hidden inside solid objects or the ground itself, waiting for the perfect moment to fly forward with a piercing shriek. The sudden assault aims to catch the unprepared target off-guard, giving it little chance to avoid the bladed claws of the Reaper. The rest is a tale of bloody, gruesome agony as the Wraith tears its screaming victim apart.
New Translation: 收割者是以受害者的痛苦為樂的怨靈。一旦祂們鎖定獵物，就會偷偷跟蹤，平時只會藏在物體或地下等待尖嘯飛出的時機。突然襲擊是為了使目標措手不及，讓他們難以避開收割者的利爪，只留下受害者被怨靈撕碎的血腥傳說和可怕創痛。

Text: Flying Scythes - Zone of Pestilence on Death
Old Text: Flying Scythes - Zone of Pestilence on Death
Old Translation: Flying Scythes - Zone of Pestilence on Death
New Translation: 飛行鐮刀、瘟疫陣（死亡時）

Text: The most ravenous of all Wraiths are called Tortured Souls, not because they suffer the anguish of mortals but because they are the epitomes of accumulated fear, pain and despair. Feeding upon the souls of its doomed victims, the Tortured Soul would eventually collect all sorts of nightmares which it lets out in agonizing wails of anguish.
Old Text: The most ravenous of all Wraiths are called Tortured Souls, not because they suffer the anguish of mortals but because they are the epitomes of accumulated fear, pain and despair. Feeding upon the souls of its doomed victims, the Tortured Soul would eventually collect all sorts of nightmares which it lets out in agonizing wails of anguish.
Old Translation: The most ravenous of all Wraiths are called Tortured Souls, not because they suffer the anguish of mortals but because they are the epitomes of accumulated fear, pain and despair. Feeding upon the souls of its doomed victims, the Tortured Soul would eventually collect all sorts of nightmares which it lets out in agonizing wails of anguish.
New Translation: 所有怨靈中最飢渴的就是受虐魂，不只是因為祂們受過人間之苦，還因為祂們是恐懼、痛苦和絕望的化身。受虐魂以受害者的靈魂為食，最終使祂們積聚了各式各樣的噩夢，讓祂們發出令人難以忍受的痛苦悲鳴。

Text: Ranged - Seeking Arcane Blast - Armor Penetration
New Translation: 遠程、追蹤祕術衝擊、護甲穿透

Text: Beam Attack - Crippling Jump - Armor Penetration
New Translation: 光束攻擊、致癱跳、護甲穿透

Text: Charges - Spawns Minions - Lifesteal Smash - Armor Penetration
New Translation: 衝鋒、召喚爪牙、吸血粉碎擊、護甲穿透

Text: A living anomaly, the Chromatic Essence was a tough and unpredictable opponent that almost caught me off-guard. I had to summon all of my cunning and reflexes to defeat all the aspects of the ever-changing elemental vortex. The destruction of one would bring forth three others until either you or it yields.
Old Text: A living anomaly, the Chromatic Essence was a tough and unpredictable opponent that almost caught me off-guard. I had to summon all of my cunning and reflexes to defeat all the aspects of the ever-changing elemental vortex. The destruction of one would bring forth three others until either you or it yields.
Old Translation: A living anomaly, the Chromatic Essence was a tough and unpredictable opponent that almost caught me off-guard. I had to summon all of my cunning and reflexes to defeat all the aspects of the ever-changing elemental vortex. The destruction of one would bring forth three others until either you or it yields.
New Translation: 一種活生生的異常之物，五彩原質是非常頑強和變化莫測的對手，幾乎讓我措手不及。我必須絞盡腦汁使出渾身解數，才能擊敗所有千變萬化的原質分身。<red></red>一個分身被毀還會分裂成三、四個，直到你死或者它亡為止。

Text: Quite true to the violent nature of fire, this incredibly dangerous weapon of the demons spews out raging flames in an attempt to sear the flesh of its prey. Even after its destruction the smaller fragments will self-annihilate in their last resort attempt to burn you down along with them. Hunters on average agree that no distance is safe enough to tackle this opponent.
Old Text: Quite true to the violent nature of fire, this incredibly dangerous weapon of the demons spews out raging flames in an attempt to sear the flesh of its prey. Even after its destruction the smaller fragments will self-annihilate in their last resort attempt to burn you down along with them. Hunters on average agree that no distance is safe enough to tackle this opponent.
Old Translation: Quite true to the violent nature of fire, this incredibly dangerous weapon of the demons spews out raging flames in an attempt to sear the flesh of its prey. Even after its destruction the smaller fragments will self-annihilate in their last resort attempt to burn you down along with them. Hunters on average agree that no distance is safe enough to tackle this opponent.
New Translation: 就跟炙熱燃燒的火一樣，這個極端危險的惡魔兇器會吐出熊熊烈火以企圖烤熟它的獵物。即使摧毀它，其碎片也會自爆意圖與敵人同歸於盡。獵人們普遍都認同對抗這種敵人在任何距離都很危險。

Text: Using the darkest and most dreaded, detested chapters of Zagoravian history as a foundation for this misery of an opponent, the Plague Essence also doubles as the Essence of Cheap Shots in Hunters' lore. The major form of this living weapon spews out swarms of vile rodents and sows the ground with moats of plague similar to the one carried by its smaller shards.
Old Text: Using the darkest and most dreaded, detested chapters of Zagoravian history as a foundation for this misery of an opponent, the Plague Essence also doubles as the Essence of Cheap Shots in Hunters' lore. The major form of this living weapon spews out swarms of vile rodents and sows the ground with moats of plague similar to the one carried by its smaller shards.
Old Translation: Using the darkest and most dreaded, detested chapters of Zagoravian history as a foundation for this misery of an opponent, the Plague Essence also doubles as the Essence of Cheap Shots in Hunters' lore. The major form of this living weapon spews out swarms of vile rodents and sows the ground with moats of plague similar to the one carried by its smaller shards.
New Translation: 扎戈拉維亞最黑暗可怕的一段歷史，就是這種令人痛苦的對手造成的，在獵人的經驗中，瘟疫原質也比其它幾種原質加倍難纏。這個活體兇器的主要攻擊方式是吐出大群噁心的老鼠，把跟它一樣的瘟疫散播在大地上。

Text: Essences of Lightning manifest in the form of whirling vortices of electricity which they send towards unlucky Hunters that cross their paths. When broken into smaller shards the lightning storm will intensify and cover the ground in randomly flying bolts of electricity. An unaware Hunter could easily find himself in quite the predicament should he attempt to use charged-energy weapons against these volatile enemies.
Old Text: Essences of Lightning manifest in the form of whirling vortices of electricity which they send towards unlucky Hunters that cross their paths. When broken into smaller shards the lightning storm will intensify and cover the ground in randomly flying bolts of electricity. An unaware Hunter could easily find himself in quite the predicament should he attempt to use charged-energy weapons against these volatile enemies.
Old Translation: Essences of Lightning manifest in the form of whirling vortices of electricity which they send towards unlucky Hunters that cross their paths. When broken into smaller shards the lightning storm will intensify and cover the ground in randomly flying bolts of electricity. An unaware Hunter could easily find himself in quite the predicament should he attempt to use charged-energy weapons against these volatile enemies.
New Translation: 閃電原質會以電流漩渦的形式旋轉，電擊一切路徑上倒霉的獵人。擊碎後會裂成較小的閃電風暴碎片，隨機釋放電流覆蓋大片地面。沒有警覺的獵人會發現自己處於困境之中，試著使用帶電武器對付這種變化多端的敵人吧。

Text: The potent and foul magic that accompanied the demons from their world into our own seems to be quite capable to sow malice where there is none to be found. In this particular case - in rocks. Not quite aware, these self-propelled, magical boulders seem hell-bent on smashing anything - both at a distance and close by - that makes the mistake to cross their wandering path.
Old Text: The potent and foul magic that accompanied the demons from their world into our own seems to be quite capable to sow malice where there is none to be found. In this particular case - in rocks. Not quite aware, these self-propelled, magical boulders seem hell-bent on smashing anything - both at a distance and close by - that makes the mistake to cross their wandering path.
Old Translation: The potent and foul magic that accompanied the demons from their world into our own seems to be quite capable to sow malice where there is none to be found. In this particular case - in rocks. Not quite aware, these self-propelled, magical boulders seem hell-bent on smashing anything - both at a distance and close by - that makes the mistake to cross their wandering path.
New Translation: 惡魔從他們的世界帶來的既邪惡又致命的魔法，似乎完全能將惡意散播至荒蕪之地。而岩石，就是其中一例。這些魔法巨石會不顧一切撞爛任何誤闖它們領域的人，不論何種距離。

Text: The epitome of entropy, the Essence of Ice has the sole purpose of draining the energy of the reality around itself until nothing else but a lifeless world is left in its wake. Hunters could only be grateful that its powers are not that great for its chilling touch could sap the strength of even the bravest ones.
Old Text: The epitome of entropy, the Essence of Ice has the sole purpose of draining the energy of the reality around itself until nothing else but a lifeless world is left in its wake. Hunters could only be grateful that its powers are not that great for its chilling touch could sap the strength of even the bravest ones.
Old Translation: The epitome of entropy, the Essence of Ice has the sole purpose of draining the energy of the reality around itself until nothing else but a lifeless world is left in its wake. Hunters could only be grateful that its powers are not that great for its chilling touch could sap the strength of even the bravest ones.
New Translation: 無序的化身，冰凍原質的唯一目的就是不停地吸收周圍的能量，直到整個世界只剩下一片荒蕪。獵人們該慶幸的是它們的力量並不強勁，因為它們的寒冰之觸會削弱甚至是最勇敢的人的活力。

Text: This soulless and highly lethal adversary is the result of demonic magic giving form and hostile intent to magic of our own creation, then turning it against us. Destroying the arcane core of the Essence doesn't truly solve the problem as its wandering smaller shards extend their cursed grasp to their immediate reach. Magic users being spread mostly within the layer of society with a means to elite education, one learns to expect encounters with these essences in the richer districts of Zagoravia.
Old Text: This soulless and highly lethal adversary is the result of demonic magic giving form and hostile intent to magic of our own creation, then turning it against us. Destroying the arcane core of the Essence doesn't truly solve the problem as its wandering smaller shards extend their cursed grasp to their immediate reach. Magic users being spread mostly within the layer of society with a means to elite education, one learns to expect encounters with these essences in the richer districts of Zagoravia.
Old Translation: This soulless and highly lethal adversary is the result of demonic magic giving form and hostile intent to magic of our own creation, then turning it against us. Destroying the arcane core of the Essence doesn't truly solve the problem as its wandering smaller shards extend their cursed grasp to their immediate reach. Magic users being spread mostly within the layer of society with a means to elite education, one learns to expect encounters with these essences in the richer districts of Zagoravia.
New Translation: 這種沒有靈魂又極度致命的對手，是我們自己創造出來的產物，以魔力賦予外形並灌輸敵意產生的，然而卻轉而攻擊我們。摧毀原質的祕術核心也無法徹底解決問題，因為它遊走的碎片反而會擴大其影響範圍。魔法師大多分布在社會上受過精英教育的階層，所以請預期在扎戈拉維亞的貴族區會遇上這種原質。

Text: Chained in place by demonic tethers these Gargoyles are capable of dealing with me in a matter of seconds. Their breath comes forth in the form of dozens of cutting shards of stone-hard ice no less dangerous than a volley of musket fire.
Old Text: Chained in place by demonic tethers these Gargoyles are capable of dealing with me in a matter of seconds. Their breath comes forth in the form of dozens of cutting shards of stone-hard ice no less dangerous than a volley of musket fire.
Old Translation: Chained in place by demonic tethers these Gargoyles are capable of dealing with me in a matter of seconds. Their breath comes forth in the form of dozens of cutting shards of stone-hard ice no less dangerous than a volley of musket fire.
New Translation: 這些被惡魔鎖鏈定在原地的石像鬼，具有在幾秒內把我殺死的能力。它們的吐息會夾帶無數石頭般堅硬的碎冰，跟槍林彈雨一樣危險。

Text: I could only be grateful that these Gargoyles are chained in place for the churning steam inside of their marble cavities could easily burn me alive in a matter of seconds. I curse the fact that I keep encountering these monstrosities only in the most confined spaces where I could do little to avoid their burning breath.
Old Text: I could only be grateful that these Gargoyles are chained in place for the churning steam inside of their marble cavities could easily burn me alive in a matter of seconds. I curse the fact that I keep encountering these monstrosities only in the most confined spaces where I could do little to avoid their burning breath.
Old Translation: I could only be grateful that these Gargoyles are chained in place for the churning steam inside of their marble cavities could easily burn me alive in a matter of seconds. I curse the fact that I keep encountering these monstrosities only in the most confined spaces where I could do little to avoid their burning breath.
New Translation: 我要慶幸這些石像鬼都是被鍊在原地，否則大理石體內的沸騰蒸氣能在幾秒內瞬間把我燒死。討厭的是，這些怪物總是出現在狹窄的地方，讓我很難避開它們的炙熱吐息。
固定、錐形攻擊、石頭形態

Text: Guarding the narrow passages in Zagoravia the Frost Sentinels are bound to their duties by demonic tethers that prevent them from chasing me. The problem is that they really don't need that - their frost breath can easily cripple my movements, keeping me where the monstrosity wants me - within its reach. On the other hand I have no intention to run away...
Old Text: Guarding the narrow passages in Zagoravia the Frost Sentinels are bound to their duties by demonic tethers that prevent them from chasing me. The problem is that they really don't need that - their frost breath can easily cripple my movements, keeping me where the monstrosity wants me - within its reach. On the other hand I have no intention to run away...
Old Translation: Guarding the narrow passages in Zagoravia the Frost Sentinels are bound to their duties by demonic tethers that prevent them from chasing me. The problem is that they really don't need that - their frost breath can easily cripple my movements, keeping me where the monstrosity wants me - within its reach. On the other hand I have no intention to run away...
New Translation: 看守著扎戈拉維亞的狹窄通道，這些冰霜哨兵被惡魔鎖鏈束縛以執行任務，因此它們無法追擊我。但問題是，其實它們也不需要，它們的冰霜吐息能輕易地限制我的移動能力，讓我逃不出它們的手掌心。但另一方面，我也沒打算逃走……

Text: Death has many faces in the cursed city of Zagoravia, but I really loathe when it manifests in the visage of the Dark Knight. A demon engine of destruction this mighty Gargoyle is driven only by its malicious desire to pulp my dead body to a bloody stain on the ground with its powerful charge and devastating shockwave attacks.
Old Text: Death has many faces in the cursed city of Zagoravia, but I really loathe when it manifests in the visage of the Dark Knight. A demon engine of destruction this mighty Gargoyle is driven only by its malicious desire to pulp my dead body to a bloody stain on the ground with its powerful charge and devastating shockwave attacks.
Old Translation: Death has many faces in the cursed city of Zagoravia, but I really loathe when it manifests in the visage of the Dark Knight. A demon engine of destruction this mighty Gargoyle is driven only by its malicious desire to pulp my dead body to a bloody stain on the ground with its powerful charge and devastating shockwave attacks.
New Translation: 被詛咒的扎戈拉維亞到處充斥著死亡危機，但說到我最討厭的莫過於黑暗騎士。這種專搞破壞的石像鬼只被惡意的慾望驅動著，唯一渴望的就是用強力衝鋒和毀滅性的衝擊波將我轟成肉醬，化成地上的一灘血水。

Text: A true menace, the Frostfall combines the unnatural resilience of a marble-built Gargoyle with the unbound power of a raging blizzard. I have to rely on my strong hand and quick reflexes to exploit the short moments when it stops bombarding me with icy shards to find a weak spot in its formidable form.
Old Text: A true menace, the Frostfall combines the unnatural resilience of a marble-built Gargoyle with the unbound power of a raging blizzard. I have to rely on my strong hand and quick reflexes to exploit the short moments when it stops bombarding me with icy shards to find a weak spot in its formidable form.
Old Translation: A true menace, the Frostfall combines the unnatural resilience of a marble-built Gargoyle with the unbound power of a raging blizzard. I have to rely on my strong hand and quick reflexes to exploit the short moments when it stops bombarding me with icy shards to find a weak spot in its formidable form.
New Translation: 真正麻煩的傢伙，霜落同時具備大理石製成的石像鬼的韌性，以及釋放暴風雪的力量。我必須依靠我強壯的雙手和快速的反應力，趁它停止使用冰雹炮轟我的短暫瞬間，找出它驚人身軀下的弱點。

Text: The Lesser Gargoyles are the living proof that this city wants me dead. I was almost caught off-guard when an apparently inanimate statue rose to its feet and flew on its stony wings to carve my flesh with its beak.
Old Text: The Lesser Gargoyles are the living proof that this city wants me dead. I was almost caught off-guard when an apparently inanimate statue rose to its feet and flew on its stony wings to carve my flesh with its beak.
Old Translation: The Lesser Gargoyles are the living proof that this city wants me dead. I was almost caught off-guard when an apparently inanimate statue rose to its feet and flew on its stony wings to carve my flesh with its beak.
New Translation: 小型石像鬼是這座城市想要我死的活生生證據。當一座看似無生命的雕像突然抬起雙腳，並拍動翅膀飛過來用尖嘴攻擊我的那一刻，我真是差點措手不及。

Text: Grotesque seem to be imbued with a bit more of demon power than the lesser Gargoyles. These monsters are capable of emitting a wave of demonic energy from a distance which could prove quite dangerous should I find myself cornered. I've found out that the reverberating energies held inside of their stony bodies make them a tad more fragile than the rest of their accursed kin.
Old Text: Grotesque seem to be imbued with a bit more of demon power than the lesser Gargoyles. These monsters are capable of emitting a wave of demonic energy from a distance which could prove quite dangerous should I find myself cornered. I've found out that the reverberating energies held inside of their stony bodies make them a tad more fragile than the rest of their accursed kin.
Old Translation: Grotesque seem to be imbued with a bit more of demon power than the lesser Gargoyles. These monsters are capable of emitting a wave of demonic energy from a distance which could prove quite dangerous should I find myself cornered. I've found out that the reverberating energies held inside of their stony bodies make them a tad more fragile than the rest of their accursed kin.
New Translation: 怪誕魔似乎比一般的石像鬼擁有更強大的惡魔之力。這些怪物能夠從遠距離釋放惡魔能量波，把我逼至絕境，相當危險。不過我也發現這股在它們體內迴盪的能量，卻也導致它們比一般的石像鬼更加脆弱。

Text: Charges - Buffs Hellhounds - Bonus Armor Penetration

Evolution finds its ways even with the creatures of unnatural origin. The Alphas begin to rend and tear their way to the top of the pack hierarchy from the moment they spawn. Showing their greater size and strength from early on, they dictate the only rule in the packs of demon hounds - kill or be killed. In battle the Alphas push their pawns to acts of fiery onslaught. Even alone, these monsters are more than capable of ending my life in a blaze of blood and fire.

Whenever there's a need for distraction or cannon fodder, Biters are sent to the field. Almost mindless, they possess only enough intelligence to chase down and devour their prey. While easily dispatched they can quickly become a deadly threat if their numbers are left unchecked.

Growing stronger through continuous fighting in their packs, the few Chargers that manage to survive show remarkable increase in their combat prowess. Their superior agility allows them to leap forward, aiming directly for the neck - a killing blow which caught not one or two mortals off-guard.
Ranged - Bonus Armor Penetration - Weakens on Crit

In the chaotic worlds beyond, storms of magic swirl and rage across the void. Perhaps their uncontrolled energies infused these hellhounds to breathe out destructive magic, making them a perfect addition to the demon vanguard.
Ranged - Buffs Hellhounds - Bonus Armor Penetration

Sometimes even Mother Nature cowers in fear when she witnesses what horrors become of her children. Such savagery, mercilessness, and hate for all living things could only be achieved by the foulest corruption. The Alpha is nature's touch in the hellhounds. The Omega is the fiery punishment for everything in existence.

Only a fool would think that defeating Vail the Immortal could banish a creature of such power forever. The world has not seen a true Lich for thousands of years and I should deem myself extremely lucky that I survived this encounter. Truly I have destroyed his phylactery here, in Zagoravia, but the legends tell that Liches used to have hundreds of phylacteries scattered across the world inside long-forgotten places of power. Vail would make no difference - sooner or later he will command his undead minions to drag the new phylactery back to his Mausoleum and he will continue to haunt this cursed land.
Old Text: Only a fool would think that defeating Vail the Immortal could banish a creature of such power forever. The world has not seen a true Lich for thousands of years and I should deem myself extremely lucky that I survived this encounter. Truly I have destroyed his phylactery here, in Zagoravia, but the legends tell that Liches used to have hundreds of phylacteries scattered across the world inside long-forgotten places of power. Vail would make no difference - sooner or later he will command his undead minions to drag the new phylactery back to his Mausoleum and he will continue to haunt this cursed land.

The world has not seen a true Lich for thousands of years and I should deem myself extremely lucky that I survived this encounter. Truly I have destroyed his phylactery here, in Zagoravia, but the legends tell that Liches used to have hundreds of phylacteries scattered across the world inside long-forgotten places of power. Vail would make no difference - sooner or later he will command his undead minions to drag the new phylactery back to his Mausoleum and he will continue to haunt this cursed land.
New Translation: 只有傻子才相信擊敗了不朽者．汎爾就代表永遠消滅了如此強大的怪物。這個世界已經數千年沒見過巫妖了，我真是走運，居然遇到了還能活下來。雖然我<red></red>摧毀了祂在扎戈拉維亞的命匣，但是傳說中巫妖通常擁有數百個命匣，散布在世界各處被遺忘的力量之地。汎爾當然也不例外──祂早晚會叫自己的不死爪<red></red>牙拖個新的命匣到陵墓，好讓祂繼續在這個詛咒之地興風作浪。

Text: Slay the Lich and follow his soul to the Phylactery
Old Text: Slay the Lich and follow his soul to the Phylactery
Old Translation: Slay the Lich and follow his soul to the Phylactery
New Translation: 殺死巫妖並跟蹤祂的魂魄以找到命匣。

Text: Follow the Soul of the Lich to find his Phylactery
Old Text: Follow the Soul of the Lich to find his Phylactery
Old Translation: Follow the Soul of the Lich to find his Phylactery
New Translation: 跟蹤巫妖的魂魄以找到祂的命匣。

Text: Kill the Lich one last time to defeat him forever
Old Text: Kill the Lich one last time to defeat him forever
Old Translation: Kill the Lich one last time to defeat him forever
New Translation: 最後一次殺死巫妖以永久消滅祂。

Text: Seeking Projectiles Cause Frailty - Vampiric Totems

It is said that the first vampires have somehow conjured the vampirism curse in their greed for power and immortality. It was part of his grand plan to trick Katarina into dooming her own people and to create an elaborate trap for hunters, who are the only ones who could harm him. He played dirty tricks with the minds of everybody in the city, goading them to their own deaths. In the end, Gabriel fell victim to his own plot, his immortal essence now belonging to the demon called the Solicitor. It might sound strange, but I am grateful of this lesson of power and fate.

It was part of his grand plan to trick Katarina into dooming her own people and to create an elaborate trap for hunters, who are the only ones who could harm him. He played dirty tricks with the minds of everybody in the city, goading them to their own deaths. In the end, Gabriel fell victim to his own plot, his immortal essence now belonging to the demon called the Solicitor. It might sound strange, but I am grateful of this lesson of power and fate.

It was part of his grand plan to trick Katarina into dooming her own people and to create an elaborate trap for hunters, who are the only ones who could harm him. He played dirty tricks with the minds of everybody in the city, goading them to their own deaths. In the end, Gabriel fell victim to his own plot, his immortal essence now belonging to the demon called the Solicitor. It might sound strange, but I am grateful of this lesson of power and fate.
New Translation: 傳說中，吸血鬼真祖為了追求永生和力量，以某種方式創造出了吸血鬼詛咒。他計畫的一部分就是欺騙卡特蓮娜使她害死自己的子民，並佈下複雜的陷阱來對付唯一有能力傷害他的獵人們。他玩弄整座城市的人，讓他們一步步邁向死亡。最終，加百列自食惡果，他不朽的靈髓落到了一個被稱為誘魂者的惡魔手上。這樣說或許有點奇怪，但我還是很開心上了這權力與命運的一課。

Text: Immobile - High Crit - High Penetration - Exploding Pumpkins - Darkness
New Translation: 固定、高暴擊、高穿透、爆裂南瓜、黑暗
惡魔之力、惡魔種子、瞬移

Text: The worst demons are those who speak. The Solicitor is one of those entities that you could only pray to never encounter. A being of ancient power, he is the one who oversees the fulfilment of demonic contracts signed by various foolish mortals. He has a symbiotic connection to the binding force of those contracts - while he protects them, he can also channel the power they provide. This allows him to call upon them in time of need, making him a resourceful and crafty opponent.
Old Text: The worst demons are those who speak. The Solicitor is one of those entities that you could only pray to never encounter. A being of ancient power, he is the one who oversees the fulfilment of demonic contracts signed by various foolish mortals. He has a symbiotic connection to the binding force of those contracts - while he protects them, he can also channel the power they provide. This allows him to call upon them in time of need, making him a resourceful and crafty opponent.
Old Translation: The worst demons are those who speak. The Solicitor is one of those entities that you could only pray to never encounter. A being of ancient power, he is the one who oversees the fulfilment of demonic contracts signed by various foolish mortals. He has a symbiotic connection to the binding force of those contracts - while he protects them, he can also channel the power they provide. This allows him to call upon them in time of need, making him a resourceful and crafty opponent.
New Translation: 最棘手的惡魔就是會說話的那種。誘魂者就是你祈禱一輩子都不想遇上的存在。遠古力量的化身，牠監管著所有愚蠢凡人所簽訂的惡魔契約的履行。牠以那些契約的約束力與簽約者產生共生關係──雖然牠會保護他們，但也能利用他們提供的力量。這讓牠在需要的時候能夠召喚他們，使牠成為機智和狡猾的對手。

Text: Ranged - Poisonous Trail - Vulnerable From Behind

The vile filth oozed by the monstrous Artillery works its bloody job the same way as the Preacher's words that stick to the mind and poison the body. Changed in ways that nature would never even consider, I'd be wise to keep an eye on the sky if I want to avoid the sticky poison it hurls.

In semblance to the Preacher, this troublesome creature is often hides behind its larger brethren. The incessant barrage of poison and pain it unleashes has the same effect on my body as the words of the Preacher on the souls of his flock.

The extent of the Preacher's corruption throughout this world is troublesome. Such colossal amount of demon power roars in the air that it's able to turn the small desert Scorpions that inhabited it into colossal hulks. Strong as a bull, but fortunately just as smart, the Scorpion Basher would rather pound me into the dust than bother using his venomous tail.
Tough - Poisonous Trail - Vulnerable From Behind

Tireless. Relentless. Deadly. This Scorpion monstrosity resembles the Preacher manifested in bestial form. Leaving only poisonous wasteland in its wake, the Bully spares no effort in the pursuit of the malicious deed to devour the very essence of the land and its people. Fighting it is like trying to defeat the entropy itself - even when I emerge victorious, I cannot shake the feeling that my next encounter with the vile beast would be my last.

The Preacher subdued the people to his will yet he needed something to subdue the very spirit of the land as well. As if an answer to his wish, the abominable energy that poured into this monstrosity gave it the power to shatter the rocks and fracture the ground. Those who try to escape the Preacher's parish are thrown at the mercy of the Earthshaker but the beast has none to spare. The struggling victims are either entombed under the rocks or impaled on earthen spikes to suffer for their sins for eternity.
The Pests are little more than manifestation of the spite in words of the self-proclaimed prophet, a scourge upon those who thread his domain without heeding his words of sins and purging.

Chock full of venom to the brims of its little body, it seems as if the sole purpose of this creature is to poison me even if that would cost its life. Such a true follower would make the Preacher proud if he cared for his instrument-beasts.

I haven't encountered many scorpions in the past, but I am confident they don't usually shoot their targets with poison. The first time I encountered these things they almost caught me off-guard. Fairly small and hardly more than a nuisance when alone, their poison is still potent enough to infect even a seasoned hunter, if enough is applied.

Undead Berserkers are mortals who suffered greatly, before giving up their lives and host the spark of rage and denial. Undead Berserkers swing between their will to die and the curse that binds them to sow destruction upon the world. When it comes to fulfilling their purpose, they are desperately trying to resist the urge to kill, resulting in a crazed whirlwind of bones and weapons.
Old Text: Undead Berserkers are mortals who suffered greatly, before giving up their lives and host the spark of rage and denial. Undead Berserkers swing between their will to die and the curse that binds them to sow destruction upon the world. When it comes to fulfilling their purpose, they are desperately trying to resist the urge to kill, resulting in a crazed whirlwind of bones and weapons.
Old Translation: Undead Berserkers are mortals who suffered greatly, before giving up their lives and host the spark of rage and denial. Undead Berserkers swing between their will to die and the curse that binds them to sow destruction upon the world. When it comes to fulfilling their purpose, they are desperately trying to resist the urge to kill, resulting in a crazed whirlwind of bones and weapons.
New Translation: 不死狂戰士生前是受過極大痛苦的凡人，懷著滿腔怒火和不願接受的心情放棄生命。它們總是在尋死和束縛它們去毀滅世界的詛咒之間搖擺不定。每當它們要完成目標的時候，它們又會拼命地抗拒衝動的殺意，其結果就導致瘋狂的迴旋攻擊。

Text: Not like anything I've ever seen, the Undead Fools are a mockery of life and the Hunters' attempt to save the city. They must be the creation of a dark, distorted entity that enjoys playing with his victims like a cat would play with mice.
Old Text: Not like anything I've ever seen, the Undead Fools are a mockery of life and the Hunters' attempt to save the city. They must be the creation of a dark, distorted entity that enjoys playing with his victims like a cat would play with mice.
Old Translation: Not like anything I've ever seen, the Undead Fools are a mockery of life and the Hunters' attempt to save the city. They must be the creation of a dark, distorted entity that enjoys playing with his victims like a cat would play with mice.
New Translation: 從來沒見過這種傢伙，不死小丑是對生命和想拯救城市的獵人的一種嘲諷。它們肯定是黑暗又扭曲的變態，喜愛玩弄獵物，猶如貓捉老鼠。

Text: Curses - Cures Negative Conditions when Defeated
Old Text: Curses - Cures Negative Conditions when Defeated
Old Translation: Curses - Cures Negative Conditions when Defeated
New Translation: 詛咒、消除負面狀態（擊敗時）

Text: Zagoravia must be under the influence of extremely powerful curse for I find no other explanation for the presence of Pyromancers. The ancient scripts claim that these Undead host the souls of only the most evil-minded mortals who were drawn out of the hellfire of the Underworld. Still bearing the mark of their sins, they are wreathed in a halo of flames that torments them incessantly.
Old Text: Zagoravia must be under the influence of extremely powerful curse for I find no other explanation for the presence of Pyromancers. The ancient scripts claim that these Undead host the souls of only the most evil-minded mortals who were drawn out of the hellfire of the Underworld. Still bearing the mark of their sins, they are wreathed in a halo of flames that torments them incessantly.
Old Translation: Zagoravia must be under the influence of extremely powerful curse for I find no other explanation for the presence of Pyromancers. The ancient scripts claim that these Undead host the souls of only the most evil-minded mortals who were drawn out of the hellfire of the Underworld. Still bearing the mark of their sins, they are wreathed in a halo of flames that torments them incessantly.
New Translation: 扎戈拉維亞肯定是受到非常強大的詛咒，否則無法解釋這些操火者的存在。根據古書記載，這些不死生物寄宿著最惡毒人類的靈魂，全都取自於地獄的業火。它們無時無刻背負著罪惡的烙印，被火焰環繞受著無盡的折磨。

Text: Slaves to the curse that sustains them, those lowly skeletons are the most deprived of them all. Fully aware of their cruel fate but unable to break free, they are driven to a silent madness. I can only end their suffering with a well-placed blow.
Old Text: Slaves to the curse that sustains them, those lowly skeletons are the most deprived of them all. Fully aware of their cruel fate but unable to break free, they are driven to a silent madness. I can only end their suffering with a well-placed blow.
Old Translation: Slaves to the curse that sustains them, those lowly skeletons are the most deprived of them all. Fully aware of their cruel fate but unable to break free, they are driven to a silent madness. I can only end their suffering with a well-placed blow.
New Translation: 被詛咒奴役著，這些低等骷髏被剝奪了它們的一切。它們很清楚自己悲慘的命運卻無力擺脫，被無聲的瘋狂驅使著。我唯一能終結它們痛苦的辦法就是一擊讓它們安息。

Text: I have only heard legends about Undead that are able to control and animate others of their kind. Probably the Gravediggers are the answer to the large hordes of Undead that fill the streets of Zagoravia. So far I haven't found any proof of them possessing the intelligence and free will required to summon and control a horde of that size, yet they remain the harbingers of trouble. Luckily, slaying the Gravedigger makes its minions perish with it.
Old Text: I have only heard legends about Undead that are able to control and animate others of their kind. Probably the Gravediggers are the answer to the large hordes of Undead that fill the streets of Zagoravia. So far I haven't found any proof of them possessing the intelligence and free will required to summon and control a horde of that size, yet they remain the harbingers of trouble. Luckily, slaying the Gravedigger makes its minions perish with it.

Probably the Gravediggers are the answer to the large hordes of Undead that fill the streets of Zagoravia. So far I haven't found any proof of them possessing the intelligence and free will required to summon and control a horde of that size, yet they remain the harbingers of trouble. Luckily, slaying the Gravedigger makes its minions perish with it.
New Translation: 我聽說過不死生物有能力控制和驅使其它同類的傳說。或許掘墓者就是造成扎戈拉維亞滿街都是不死生物的罪魁禍首。至少目前我沒發現它們擁有足夠智慧和自主意識能夠驅使那麼大量的不死生物，但還是留下了不少麻煩。幸運的是，殺死掘墓者會讓它的爪牙和它一起滅亡。

Text: Those Zagoravian soldiers died with guns in their hands and this is how the binding curse found them. Their creator and lord must be a master of the art of necromancy, as it takes more than I have ever witnessed to fuse a soldier with his gun and produce anything other than withered corpse.
Old Text: Those Zagoravian soldiers died with guns in their hands and this is how the binding curse found them. Their creator and lord must be a master of the art of necromancy, as it takes more than I have ever witnessed to fuse a soldier with his gun and produce anything other than withered corpse.
Old Translation: Those Zagoravian soldiers died with guns in their hands and this is how the binding curse found them. Their creator and lord must be a master of the art of necromancy, as it takes more than I have ever witnessed to fuse a soldier with his gun and produce anything other than withered corpse.
New Translation: 這些扎戈拉維亞的士兵死的時候手裡還拿著火槍，這也是詛咒找上它們的原因。創造它們的人肯定是精通死靈術的大師，因為我從沒見過除了召喚乾枯的死屍外，還能召喚出持槍的士兵。

Text: Undead abominations of immense size, the Undead Brutes are some of the toughest opponents a Hunter could encounter. The curse of undeath influenced these unfortunate souls the most, twisting and distorting their forms, until their bodies only resemble hulking humanoids. If I ever underestimate their brutish strength and long reach, I would quickly join their shambling march.
Old Text: Undead abominations of immense size, the Undead Brutes are some of the toughest opponents a Hunter could encounter. The curse of undeath influenced these unfortunate souls the most, twisting and distorting their forms, until their bodies only resemble hulking humanoids. If I ever underestimate their brutish strength and long reach, I would quickly join their shambling march.
Old Translation: Undead abominations of immense size, the Undead Brutes are some of the toughest opponents a Hunter could encounter. The curse of undeath influenced these unfortunate souls the most, twisting and distorting their forms, until their bodies only resemble hulking humanoids. If I ever underestimate their brutish strength and long reach, I would quickly join their shambling march.
New Translation: 體積最龐大的不死生物，不死壯漢是獵人能遇到的最強壯對手之一。不死的詛咒造成這些不幸的大量靈魂，糾結、扭曲了外表，使它們的身體像似笨重的人形。如果低估它們的蠻力和攻擊範圍，那很快就會加入它們的行列了。

Text: Probably the most solid testament to the notion that demons may find inspiration in weapons designed by human hand, these over-bloated arachnids serve as incredibly flexible mobile artilleries. Defenseless once you end up close to them, they will give you and everything around you chemical hell from a distance to make sure you don't. I found out that I can goad the wrath of the Bombardier Spider to make it vanquish its allies.
Old Text: Probably the most solid testament to the notion that demons may find inspiration in weapons designed by human hand, these over-bloated arachnids serve as incredibly flexible mobile artilleries. Defenseless once you end up close to them, they will give you and everything around you chemical hell from a distance to make sure you don't. I found out that I can goad the wrath of the Bombardier Spider to make it vanquish its allies.
Old Translation: Probably the most solid testament to the notion that demons may find inspiration in weapons designed by human hand, these over-bloated arachnids serve as incredibly flexible mobile artilleries. Defenseless once you end up close to them, they will give you and everything around you chemical hell from a distance to make sure you don't. I found out that I can goad the wrath of the Bombardier Spider to make it vanquish its allies.
New Translation: 惡魔會從人類設計的武器中找到靈感，這些作為移動大炮的臃腫蜘蛛也許就是最好的證明。牠們一旦被靠近就毫無反抗之力，所以牠們會從遠處把你周圍變成生化地獄，確保你無法靠近。但我發現我可以激怒投彈蜘蛛，讓牠們誤殺自己的同伴。
致癱彈幕、潛伏上方、遠程

Text: Now that the corpse of Rachnoss, the Host lies before me I begin to wander what kind of wicked pact was broken to allow such a monstrosity to pass the wall between worlds? Rachnoss possessed power, awareness and cunning beyond the capabilities of any demon I have faced so far. I can feel the mark his icy essence imprinted inside my very soul.
Old Text: Now that the corpse of Rachnoss, the Host lies before me I begin to wander what kind of wicked pact was broken to allow such a monstrosity to pass the wall between worlds? Rachnoss possessed power, awareness and cunning beyond the capabilities of any demon I have faced so far. I can feel the mark his icy essence imprinted inside my very soul.
Old Translation: Now that the corpse of Rachnoss, the Host lies before me I begin to wander what kind of wicked pact was broken to allow such a monstrosity to pass the wall between worlds? Rachnoss possessed power, awareness and cunning beyond the capabilities of any demon I have faced so far. I can feel the mark his icy essence imprinted inside my very soul.
New Translation: 看著倒在我面前的宿主．拉諾斯的屍體，我不禁好奇到底是什麼樣的邪惡契約被破壞，讓如此怪物能穿梭兩個世界的屏障？拉諾斯擁有的力量、警覺、以及狡詐遠遠勝過我對抗過的所有惡魔。我甚至能感覺到牠的冷冽氣息印在我的靈魂深處。

Text: Destroy a support column to bring Rachnoss to the ground.
Old Text: Destroy a support column to bring Rachnoss to the ground.
Old Translation: Destroy a support column to bring Rachnoss to the ground.
New Translation: 摧毀石柱讓拉諾斯墜落地面。

Text: Destroy to bring Rachnoss to the ground
Old Text: Destroy to bring Rachnoss to the ground
Old Translation: Destroy to bring Rachnoss to the ground
New Translation: 摧毀以讓拉諾斯墜落地面

Text: Mordra, the Broodmother is an intelligent demon that prefers to send her spider progeny to do her bidding instead of risking it herself. This strategy allowed her to preserve all of her strength for the moment when she would be cornered in her deep lair. She plans to undermine the walls of Castle Zagore and spew her countless progeny into the belly of the ancient corridors to seek the destruction of the few survivors there. I wonder for how long I would be able to keep her at bay.
Old Text: Mordra, the Broodmother is an intelligent demon that prefers to send her spider progeny to do her bidding instead of risking it herself. This strategy allowed her to preserve all of her strength for the moment when she would be cornered in her deep lair. She plans to undermine the walls of Castle Zagore and spew her countless progeny into the belly of the ancient corridors to seek the destruction of the few survivors there. I wonder for how long I would be able to keep her at bay.

This strategy allowed her to preserve all of her strength for the moment when she would be cornered in her deep lair. She plans to undermine the walls of Castle Zagore and spew her countless progeny into the belly of the ancient corridors to seek the destruction of the few survivors there. I wonder for how long I would be able to keep her at bay.
New Translation: 蛛后．莫卓是非常聰明的惡魔，只會命令她的蜘蛛兒女們做事，而不親身犯險。這種戰略讓她在老巢被逼急時能保留實力。她計劃破壞扎戈爾城的城牆根基，並在古老走廊的腹地送入無數的蜘蛛兵，以剷除當地僅存的倖存者。我不知道我還能抵擋她多久。

Text: Far from being thorough in their design, demonic spiders' existences are usually violent and short. That is why, in order to better serve their creators, some remain in their eggs until the need for them arises.
Old Text: Far from being thorough in their design, demonic spiders' existences are usually violent and short. That is why, in order to better serve their creators, some remain in their eggs until the need for them arises.
Old Translation: Far from being thorough in their design, demonic spiders' existences are usually violent and short. That is why, in order to better serve their creators, some remain in their eggs until the need for them arises.
New Translation: 牠們的構造並不完美，惡魔蜘蛛的壽命通常急劇短暫。這也是為什麼有些蜘蛛留在卵裡沒有孵化，以便在需要時為主人效力。

Text: There is no shortage of debate and speculation over what happens when demonic spiders are given the chance to feed for an extended period of time. Some say they have short lifespans meant for quick gains, others are certain they are created with evolving in mind. Whether a new breed or not, nothing changes the reality that these incredibly heavy and powerful spiders are a menace to be reckoned with.
Old Text: There is no shortage of debate and speculation over what happens when demonic spiders are given the chance to feed for an extended period of time. Some say they have short lifespans meant for quick gains, others are certain they are created with evolving in mind. Whether a new breed or not, nothing changes the reality that these incredibly heavy and powerful spiders are a menace to be reckoned with.
Old Translation: There is no shortage of debate and speculation over what happens when demonic spiders are given the chance to feed for an extended period of time. Some say they have short lifespans meant for quick gains, others are certain they are created with evolving in mind. Whether a new breed or not, nothing changes the reality that these incredibly heavy and powerful spiders are a menace to be reckoned with.
New Translation: 當惡魔蜘蛛有機會長期進食時會有什麼變化，一直是個爭論不休，猜測不斷的議題。有的人說牠們的生命短暫所以會快速長大，有的人則認為牠們是為進化而創造的。無論是不是新物種，都不會改變這些重量級的大蜘蛛是個不好對付的敵人的事實。

Text: Always at the forefront of demonic advances, demon spiders are obviously tasked with being the cannon fodder in this war between worlds. This particular breed excels at the role in a most unique manner. Whether the result of intelligent design or that of mixing random unknown chemicals, it's hard to deny how effective these explosive buggers are. I noticed that their explosion slays friend and foe alike and I intend on using this in my favor.
Old Text: Always at the forefront of demonic advances, demon spiders are obviously tasked with being the cannon fodder in this war between worlds. This particular breed excels at the role in a most unique manner. Whether the result of intelligent design or that of mixing random unknown chemicals, it's hard to deny how effective these explosive buggers are. I noticed that their explosion slays friend and foe alike and I intend on using this in my favor.

This particular breed excels at the role in a most unique manner. Whether the result of intelligent design or that of mixing random unknown chemicals, it's hard to deny how effective these explosive buggers are. I noticed that their explosion slays friend and foe alike and I intend on using this in my favor.
New Translation: 永遠是惡魔進軍的前線戰力，惡魔蜘蛛的任務顯然是這場世界之戰的炮灰部隊。這一特殊品種更是善於執行這種獨特任務。無論是精心設計的成果還是不經意的產物，無可否認這種自爆蜘蛛是非常管用的。我也發現牠們的自爆是敵友不分的，我打算利用這一點取得優勢。

Text: Shards of demon power oozed through the walls of the world, these diminutive spiders are little more than chomping mandibles that crave the taste of living flesh and the opportunity to grow and sustain themselves in this reality.
Old Text: Shards of demonic power oozed through the walls of the world, these diminutive spiders are little more than chomping mandibles that crave the taste of living flesh and the opportunity to grow and sustain themselves in this reality.
Old Translation: Shards of demon power oozed through the walls of the world, these diminutive spiders are little more than chomping mandibles that crave the taste of living flesh and the opportunity to grow and sustain themselves in this reality.
New Translation: 穿過世界屏障的惡魔能量碎片形成了這些小蜘蛛，牠們比寄生在皮膚上渴望鮮肉美味的蹣蟲還要細小。

Text: Demon spiders are the stuff of chaos. Bags of bio-chemicals crafted into many-legged horrors, relying on their numbers quite more so than their individual capacity to spread dread into the mortal realm. However, even chaos can give birth to perfection every now and then, and these large, incredibly agile and armored mega-arachnids are indeed the perfect apex predator that no natural environment can spawn.
Old Text: Demonic spiders are the stuff of chaos. Bags of bio-chemicals crafted into many-legged horrors, relying on their numbers quite more so than their individual capacity to spread dread into the mortal realm. However, even chaos can give birth to perfection every now and then, and these large, incredibly agile and armored mega-arachnids are indeed the perfect apex predator that no natural environment can spawn.
Old Translation: Demonic spiders are the stuff of chaos. Bags of bio-chemicals crafted into many-legged horrors, relying on their numbers quite more so than their individual capacity to spread dread into the mortal realm. However, even chaos can give birth to perfection every now and then, and these large, incredibly agile and armored mega-arachnids are indeed the perfect apex predator that no natural environment can spawn.
New Translation: 惡魔蜘蛛是混沌的產物。大量的生化之物造就了多足怪物，牠們依靠數量，而不是個體能力將恐懼蔓延到凡人之地。然而在混沌不時的強化下，這些擁有超凡敏捷和裝甲的巨型蜘蛛，無疑是自然生態無法產生的頂端掠食者。

Text: It is no wonder that the inborn horror and nightmare-fueling hatred humans harbor for spiders has leaked its way to the world of demons. They, on the other hand, readily oblige said fears and raise nature with a sort of ultra-arachnids the size of dogs. A feeble adversary for the experienced hunter, spider hatchlings can still take out an unwary traveler when in greater numbers.
Old Text: It is no wonder that the inborn horror and nightmare-fueling hatred humans harbor for spiders has leaked its way to the world of demons. They, on the other hand, readily oblige said fears and raise nature with a sort of ultra-arachnids the size of dogs. A feeble adversary for the experienced hunter, spider hatchlings can still take out an unwary traveler when in greater numbers.
Old Translation: It is no wonder that the inborn horror and nightmare-fueling hatred humans harbor for spiders has leaked its way to the world of demons. They, on the other hand, readily oblige said fears and raise nature with a sort of ultra-arachnids the size of dogs. A feeble adversary for the experienced hunter, spider hatchlings can still take out an unwary traveler when in greater numbers.
New Translation: 毫不奇怪，人類先天對來自魔界的蜘蛛就懷有引發恐懼和噩夢的憎恨。另一方面，他們對這種長得跟狗一樣大的蜘蛛更容易喚起恐懼的天性。蜘蛛幼雛雖然不是經驗豐富的獵人的對手，不過以蛛海戰術還是能圍死粗心的過路者。

Text: Death is nothing short of a gift for this accursed creation, condemned to ever spawn soulless monstrosities, which then regard it as a god and devour their way through the realm of man with heightened fury.
Old Text: Death is nothing short of a gift for this accursed creation, condemned to ever spawn soulless monstrosities, which then regard it as a god and devour their way through the realm of man with heightened fury.
Old Translation: Death is nothing short of a gift for this accursed creation, condemned to ever spawn soulless monstrosities, which then regard it as a god and devour their way through the realm of man with heightened fury.
New Translation: 死亡對這種可恨的生物是最好的禮物，牠的罪行是不斷產下沒有靈魂的怪物，其孩子們都視牠為神，並憤怒地朝人類世界一路吞噬而來。

Text: Growing like tumors in the midst of a demon infestation, the Nests spread their progeny across the cursed lands of Zagoravia. Scriptures claim that demon Nests could spew out spiders in an uncontrollable stream of flesh until the end of the world. I have found the hard way that the only way to put an end to that is to slay the nest.
Old Text: Growing like tumors in the midst of a demon infestation, the Nests spread their progeny across the cursed lands of Zagoravia. Scriptures claim that demon Nests could spew out spiders in an uncontrollable stream of flesh until the end of the world. I have found the hard way that the only way to put an end to that is to slay the nest.

Scriptures claim that demon Nests could spew out spiders in an uncontrollable stream of flesh until the end of the world. I have found the hard way that the only way to put an end to that is to slay the nest.
New Translation: 在惡魔肆虐期間長出的腫瘤狀之物，巢穴會將蜘蛛散布到整個被詛咒的扎戈拉維亞。根據記載，巢穴會不停地生出蜘蛛，直到淹沒整個世界。我經過教訓才發現：唯一消滅牠們的方法，就是先除掉巢穴。

Text: An elite version of the lesser Frostcrawler, this type of creeping, crawling blasphemy is both tougher and faster and its chilling spit projectile can freeze you in your tracks.
Old Text: An elite version of the lesser Frostcrawler, this type of creeping, crawling blasphemy is both tougher and faster and its chilling spit projectile can freeze you in your tracks.
Old Translation: An elite version of the lesser Frostcrawler, this type of creeping, crawling blasphemy is both tougher and faster and its chilling spit projectile can freeze you in your tracks.
New Translation: 冰霜爬蛛的精英版本，這種變態的爬行生物不但更強壯、更敏捷，吐出的冰彈還能把你凍結。

Text: Oozing a liquid substance not known to any alchemist of this world, these peculiar spiders have evolved to tackle opponents at a distance. The sticky blue chemical sucks the warmth out of anything it hits, causing frostbite and hypothermia.
Old Text: Oozing a liquid substance not known to any alchemist of this world, these peculiar spiders have evolved to tackle opponents at a distance. The sticky blue chemical sucks the warmth out of anything it hits, causing frostbite and hypothermia.
Old Translation: Oozing a liquid substance not known to any alchemist of this world, these peculiar spiders have evolved to tackle opponents at a distance. The sticky blue chemical sucks the warmth out of anything it hits, causing frostbite and hypothermia.
New Translation: 嘴裡分泌著這個世界未曾見過的液體，這些古怪的蜘蛛已經進化成遠距離攻擊對手的怪物。任何被不明藍色黏液擊中的目標都會被吸走溫度，造成凍傷和失溫。

Text: The legend of the Queen unsurprisingly began with a young king. One day he passed through a deserted village. By the road awaited a girl of unnatural beauty. The king hesitated little before taking her to his bed. They didn't leave the room for days until when his worried brother breached inside with a drawn sword. He paid no attention to the king's drained husk - on the bed lied the girl, now a creature of irresistible dark allure. She took the prince in her embrace then moved to his fellow knights, growing more ferocious with every conquest. Soon not a single man was left in the castle, but she still reigns supreme, demanding more and more blood to satisfy her greed.

You can say that a succubus can burn you with her passion. I don't know if it's passion that burns inside the Firestarters, but I sure don't want to find out. The creatures seem to take pleasure in burning and torturing their victims, granting them sadistic delight from every scream they squeeze out.

While exploring the ruins of the World of Wars I've stumbled upon dreadful weapons of war. Most of them lie dormant, crushed by the onslaught rest for the ones used by the Hellraisers. Their peculiar mechanical guns are far superior to my arsenal, unleashing a torrent of fire and while I desperately try to dodge the bullets I can almost sense the wild fervor of the trigger-happy demons.

Those falling to succubi charms have lamentable fates. Some are drained from their life energy until they are nothing more than dry husks, others - used until their bodies could no longer suffer. Those are the lucky ones. The survivors are kept as pets for their Mistresses. Their bodies are transformed into Hellhounds, fitting better the role of hunters for more toys to sate a lust that is never sated.

Meant for charging into bloody and gritty battles, the vanguard of the Succubi legions is no less graceful and seducing than the most extraordinary of mortal maidens. Not so interested in my soul, the soldier-maiden would rather see me skewered, trampled and eradicated.

The champions of the Succubi hosts, the Swordmaidens claim most of the spoils of war by the right of the sword. Like the rest of the warrior-demons, these demon-champions rarely seek to own and exploit slave-souls. Instead the vicious Swordmaidens draw their pleasure from the suffering of their joy-deprived sisters who can only watch their trophies from safe distance. Probably the most dangerous of their kind, these succubi are able to hold their sisters at bay only by displaying their deadly bodies and weapons - a true force to be reckoned with.

The Temptresses appear as beautiful creatures, moving gracefully as if carried by magical wings. Their trick is to enchant men to believe they love them, forcing the unfortunate victims to offer their life for the slightest sign of affection...an offering the Temptress will gladly take. Often luring their victims with their enchanting voices and visage, the packs of female demons would then pounce on the enchanted prey, subduing it completely under their will until boredom forces them to find new prey.

Lemmy used the power of Rock and Roll as a terrifying weapon in the battles against the demons. The cunning fiends bent and corrupted the music, now using it as a tool for their own purposes. The most notorious of all is the infernal Virtuoso, who pulls rage and lust from the strings of her unholy guitar. Pervert and voyeuristic creature, she cheers on the bloodbath unleashed by her sisters, only to watch the gruesome show with twisted joy.

Inviting warmth radiates from the curves of succubi, except for the most ancient ones - the Witches. Only frigid void remaining where lust once existed, the Witch can no longer receive pleasure from mortal slaves. Instead, this creature rains lethal frost on the poor fools who stumble in her path, trying to freeze them forever as eternal idols of her grandeur. Facing her can be fatal for the unprepared hunter, as she can freeze everything around her in seconds.

Unlike their lesser kin, the Thrall Hulks are tough killing machines. They lie in ambush or simply reveal themselves to their chosen prey and throw themselves into battle in cold blood, trying to corner and maul their target. But after a couple of well-placed blows they are thrown in a dark rage and charge with wild abandon, trying to claw their torturer to pieces.
Old Text: Unlike their lesser kin, the Thrall Hulks are tough killing machines. They lie in ambush or simply reveal themselves to their chosen prey and throw themselves into battle in cold blood, trying to corner and maul their target. But after a couple of well-placed blows they are thrown in a dark rage and charge with wild abandon, trying to claw their torturer to pieces.

But after a couple of well-placed blows they are thrown in a dark rage and charge with wild abandon, trying to claw their torturer to pieces.
New Translation: 跟矮小的同類不同，死徒巨人是粗暴的殺人機器。它們會伏擊鎖定的獵物，以殘忍的方式進行攻擊，試圖困逼並重創目標。一旦受到幾次的猛烈反擊，它們會發狂咆哮陷入狂暴，試圖撕碎對方。

Text: Like bloodhounds the Thralls strike from the shadows at their unsuspecting prey. Designed especially to master the hit and run tactics they would hastily retreat to the embrace of darkness should they find their prey to be a bite too large for their fangs.
Old Text: Like bloodhounds the Thralls strike from the shadows at their unsuspecting prey. Designed especially to master the hit and run tactics they would hastily retreat to the embrace of darkness should they find their prey to be a bite too large for their fangs.
Old Translation: Like bloodhounds the Thralls strike from the shadows at their unsuspecting prey. Designed especially to master the hit and run tactics they would hastily retreat to the embrace of darkness should they find their prey to be a bite too large for their fangs.
New Translation: 像獵犬一樣，死徒喜歡從黑暗中偷襲毫無戒心的獵物。它們尤其擅長打游擊，一旦發現獵物太強就會匆忙地退回黑暗之中。

Text: Moves on Rails - Slowed by Wrecked Trolleys - Weapons Destroyed Separately

The Preacher arrived in the midst of black smoke and thunder, carried by the demon train Orgasmatron. The people of the Wild West were faced with a hard choice - to repent for sins they never committed or to die. Those who tried to flee through the desert were pursued and ran down by the Orgasmatron, its arrival heralded by tracks appearing out of nowhere and ominous hissing of steam engines. The ones who followed the blighted words of the Preacher willingly entered the fiery furnace of the demon train, believing they entered the doors of heaven. The fate of both was all the same in the end. Their new master would have them either way.
<color 255 0 0>Destroy the trolleys on the path of the Orgamsatron to slow it down </color>
Moves on rails - Wreckage Slows Down The Orgasmatron - Desintegrates When Hit By Other Trolleys

Acolytes are destructive spellcasters with inhuman resilience and the ability to move unseen through the shadows. Relying purely on their supernatural strength and mastery of the arcane they always employ the same tactics, seeking me with beams of unholy energy. Facing one acolyte is a challenge, but two or more of them spell mortal danger, for their interlocking beams could burn me to cinders in the matter of mere seconds.
Old Text: Acolytes are destructive spellcasters with inhuman resilience and the ability to move unseen through the shadows. Relying purely on their supernatural strength and mastery of the arcane they always employ the same tactics, seeking me with beams of unholy energy. Facing one acolyte is a challenge, but two or more of them spell mortal danger, for their interlocking beams could burn me to cinders in the matter of mere seconds.

Facing one acolyte is a challenge, but two or more of them spell mortal danger, for their interlocking beams could burn me to cinders in the matter of mere seconds.
New Translation: 侍祭是有著異常恢復力和透過影子隱身行動的毀滅施法者。依賴自身的超自然力量以及對祕術的精通，他們總是採用同樣的招數，使用邪惡能量的光束向我攻擊。對付一個侍祭是挑戰，但同時對付兩個以上是自殺，因為他們接連不斷的光束能在幾秒內就把我燒成灰燼。

Text: I curse the moment you stepped on the cursed streets of Zagoravia, Adrian, dear friend. I always knew that ours is a dangerous craft, but I couldn't imagine that I would have to face and best the perverted mockery of your past self in the form of a Vampiric abomination. I know that you never betrayed my secret or the reasons why you summoned me to this cursed place - and I swear that you will be avenged, my friend.
Old Text: I curse the moment you stepped on the cursed streets of Zagoravia, Adrian, dear friend. I always knew that ours is a dangerous craft, but I couldn't imagine that I would have to face and best the perverted mockery of your past self in the form of a Vampiric abomination. I know that you never betrayed my secret or the reasons why you summoned me to this cursed place - and I swear that you will be avenged, my friend.

I know that you never betrayed my secret or the reasons why you summoned me to this cursed place - and I swear that you will be avenged, my friend.
New Translation: 艾德里安，我的老友啊，我詛咒你踏入扎戈拉維亞的那一刻。我知道我們這是非常危險的職業，但我萬萬沒想到我會有這麼一天，必須面對並擊敗變成吸血鬼的你。我知道你沒有洩露我的祕密，不然你就不會召喚我來這鬼地方了──我發誓，我會為你報仇的，老友。

Text: Lurkers carefully plot the way they would engage me. My intuition tells me that they watch me carefully as I carve my path through the streets of the city. Only when they think I have dropped my guard, they strike from the shadows - swiftly and silently. A single well-placed blow from a lurker can easily incapacitate me. Whenever I manage to avoid their treacherous attacks they send out arcane projectiles to seek me while they prepare for their next assault.
Old Text: Lurkers carefully plot the way they would engage me. My intuition tells me that they watch me carefully as I carve my path through the streets of the city. Only when they think I have dropped my guard, they strike from the shadows - swiftly and silently. A single well-placed blow from a lurker can easily incapacitate me. Whenever I manage to avoid their treacherous attacks they send out arcane projectiles to seek me while they prepare for their next assault.

Only when they think I have dropped my guard, they strike from the shadows - swiftly and silently. A single well-placed blow from a lurker can easily incapacitate me. Whenever I manage to avoid their treacherous attacks they send out arcane projectiles to seek me while they prepare for their next assault.
New Translation: 潛伏者會精心策劃攻擊我的方式。我的直覺告訴我，當我經過城鎮的街道時，他們都會很小心地監視著我。只要認為我放鬆戒心，就會從黑暗中偷襲我──迅速且無聲無息。潛伏者的一次偷襲能輕易地將我了結。每當我成功避開他們奸詐的攻擊時，他們就會施放祕術彈追擊我，同時會為下一次偷襲作好準備。

Text: Truly sadistic fiends, the Counts like to play cat and mouse with their prey. The ease with which they rip the life-force out makes me wonder if it is their pervert whim to toss it around instead of absorbing it directly. It could be just my imagination, but I feel their sinister excitement while I run around, trying to collect the blood orbs.
Old Text: Truly sadistic fiends, the Counts like to play cat and mouse with their prey. The ease with which they rip the life-force out makes me wonder if it is their pervert whim to toss it around instead of absorbing it directly. It could be just my imagination, but I feel their sinister excitement while I run around, trying to collect the blood orbs.

The ease with which they rip the life-force out makes me wonder if it is their pervert whim to toss it around instead of absorbing it directly. It could be just my imagination, but I feel their sinister excitement while I run around, trying to collect the blood orbs.
New Translation: 貨真價實的虐待狂，這些伯爵們喜歡玩弄獵物。他們能夠輕易地吸取獵物的生命，卻沒有直接這麼做，讓我懷疑他們是不是一時興起在玩什麼遊戲。或許是我的錯覺，但每當我東奔西跑收集那些生命寶珠時，都能感受到他們變態的快感。

Text: There are little differences between mortal and vampire noblemen, both preferring to send others to do their dirty work. The Vampire King is always trying to goad me with a barrage of arcane bolts while stirring his kindred after me.
Old Text: There are little differences between mortal and vampire noblemen, both preferring to send others to do their dirty work. The Vampire King is always trying to goad me with a barrage of arcane bolts while stirring his kindred after me.
Old Translation: There are little differences between mortal and vampire noblemen, both preferring to send others to do their dirty work. The Vampire King is always trying to goad me with a barrage of arcane bolts while stirring his kindred after me.
New Translation: 人類貴族和吸血鬼貴族其實沒有太大的分別，都愛派小弟當跑腿。吸血鬼君主總是愛用祕術彈幕讓我四處逃竄，同時煽動小弟們追殺我。
遠程、隱形、強化其他吸血鬼

Text: Most vampires tend to avoid being close to me as if the proximity of my blade makes them feel mortal again. The Knights are a nasty exception - tough, methodical killers with little tolerance for games. Their brutish swords can cut a man in two with a single swipe. Maintain a safe distance is always thricky as they use both invisibility and arcane grasping claws to catch me flat-footed.

New Translation: 大多數吸血鬼都會傾向於避免靠近我，因為我的利刃能讓他們再次感受凡人的滋味。但騎士們是個例外──頑強有序，不耍花招。他們的巨劍能夠一刀將人斬成兩半。想與他們保持安全距離都很棘手，因為他們會利用隱形和鈎爪祕術將我拖住。
範圍攻擊、爆裂護盾、隱形

Text: Vulnerable From Front - Charges - Heals Until Damaged

An entire world of burnt ruins was not enough for the Führer. The grand finale of his maniacal plan, the total destruction of everything in existence, needed nothing less but the horror the Warpig Machine was. Built with a singular purpose, the metal beast trampled over countless armies, its core engines roaring with the lust for fiery death. Reducing city after city to burnt ruins, the monstrosity was finally left without sustenance. Undoubtedly if I didn't put an end to this madness, the starved beast would have turned upon its maniacal master.
The Guitar is a multi-target ranged weapon. Split timing - time the rhythm of your attacks to inflict critical hits
Play a Wicked Solo to stun all nearby enemies and gain the Enraged condition. Then use the Bang! attack to deliver a devastating blow to a single enemy

Multiple targets. Plays a powerful riff that sends out 3 electrical sparks.

Time the attacks correctly to inflict critical hits.

Single target. Shoots a powerful lighting at the enemy. If the target dies you and all allies gain the <lightgreen2><condition></lightgreen2> condition. The lightning chains to nearby foes up to 3 times.

<lightgreen2><condition></lightgreen2>: <description>

Text: Those who are unaware of the true nature of demons could easily mistake the giant spiders infesting Zagoravia for beasts of the twisted wilderness. These spiders are nothing more but the material form chosen for the demons unleashed by the curse that holds sway over Zagoravia. While the forms in which they manifest in our world are often chosen arbitrarily, they always share the same traits - wicked cruelty and unquenchable hunger of mortal souls.
Old Text: Those who are unaware of the true nature of demons could easily mistake the giant spiders infesting Zagoravia for beasts of the twisted wilderness. These spiders are nothing more but the material form chosen for the demons unleashed by the curse that holds sway over Zagoravia. While the forms in which they manifest in our world are often chosen arbitrarily, they always share the same traits - wicked cruelty and unquenchable hunger of mortal souls.
Old Translation: Those who are unaware of the true nature of demons could easily mistake the giant spiders infesting Zagoravia for beasts of the twisted wilderness. These spiders are nothing more but the material form chosen for the demons unleashed by the curse that holds sway over Zagoravia. While the forms in which they manifest in our world are often chosen arbitrarily, they always share the same traits - wicked cruelty and unquenchable hunger of mortal souls.
New Translation: 不了解惡魔本質的人很容易誤以為侵襲扎戈拉維亞的巨型蜘蛛是變種的野生動物。這些蜘蛛只不過是被選來作為惡魔的介質，是由支配扎戈拉維亞的詛咒所釋放出來的。雖然牠們在我們世界顯化的方式不盡相同，但牠們總是擁有相同的特徵──殘忍邪惡，強烈渴望人類的靈魂。

Text: The ordinary folk wrongly deem the Wraiths for being the ghosts of the departed. These spectral apparitions are shards of living essence that wander seamlessly between the worlds in the same fashion as parasites in a search of a host. Should a Wraith find a place of power or a mortal soul to haunt, it would anchor itself towards it until it devours its life force. Should the sinister activities of the Wraith be disturbed it would unleash all sorts of arcane mayhem upon its opponent, among which are areas of spectral taint that sap the strength of mortals.
Old Text: The ordinary folk wrongly deem the Wraiths for being the ghosts of the departed. These spectral apparitions are shards of living essence that wander seamlessly between the worlds in the same fashion as parasites in a search of a host. Should a Wraith find a place of power or a mortal soul to haunt, it would anchor itself towards it until it devours its life force. Should the sinister activities of the Wraith are disturbed it would unleash all sorts of arcane mayhem upon its opponent, among which are areas of spectral taint that sap the strength of mortals.
Old Translation: The ordinary folk wrongly deem the Wraiths for being the ghosts of the departed. These spectral apparitions are shards of living essence that wander seamlessly between the worlds in the same fashion as parasites in a search of a host. Should a Wraith find a place of power or a mortal soul to haunt, it would anchor itself towards it until it devours its life force. Should the sinister activities of the Wraith be disturbed it would unleash all sorts of arcane mayhem upon its opponent, among which are areas of spectral taint that sap the strength of mortals.
New Translation: 一般人都錯誤的認為怨靈只是亡者的鬼魂。其實這些鬼魅幻影是在世間徘徊的生命精華碎片，以同樣的方式不斷尋找宿主的寄生蟲。如果怨靈鎖定了力量之地或人類靈魂，祂們就會一直糾纏不休，直到將其生命之力完全吞噬。萬一怨靈的奸險行動受到了妨礙，祂們就會施展各種祕法攻擊對手，尤其是以鬼魅污穢之陣削弱人類的力量。

Text: The only fate worse than death is to become an Undead - a creature bound in the grey fringe between two worlds by dark magic. Anyone without a vast knowledge of the supernatural could only be blessed with the lack of awareness that Undead are no animated puppets or mere constructs of bone bound by their vile masters; the twisted frame of each one of them is sustained into unlife by the imprisonment of the soul of the deceased person. I fail to imagine the tortures upon which the imprisoned soul is condemned. A well-placed blow can destroy their bony case and release the soul for good.
Old Text: The only fate worse than death is to become an Undead - a creature bound in the grey fringe between two worlds by dark magic. Anyone without a vast knowledge of the supernatural could only be blessed with the lack of awareness that Undead are no animated puppets or mere constructs of bone bound by their vile masters - the twisted frame of each one of is sustained into unlife with the imprisonment of the soul of the deceased person. I fail to imagine the tortures upon which the imprisoned soul is condemned. A well-placed blow can destroy their bony case and release the soul for good.
Old Translation: The only fate worse than death is to become an Undead - a creature bound in the grey fringe between two worlds by dark magic. Anyone without a vast knowledge of the supernatural could only be blessed with the lack of awareness that Undead are no animated puppets or mere constructs of bone bound by their vile masters - the twisted frame of each one of is sustained into unlife with the imprisonment of the soul of the deceased person. I fail to imagine the tortures upon which the imprisoned soul is condemned. A well-placed blow can destroy their bony case and release the soul for good.
New Translation: 比死亡還悲慘的命運就是變成不死生物，一種被黑魔法束縛於生死之間的怪物。沒有超自然知識的人們只能慶幸他們的無知：不死生物並不是會動的傀儡，也不單單是被卑鄙主人束縛的骨架，每一個扭曲的骨架中都是被囚禁的亡者靈魂。我無法想像這些被囚禁的靈魂究竟遭受了怎樣的折磨。徹底粉碎它們的骸骨之驅才能永遠釋放其內的靈魂。

Text: Legends tell of a distant past when the mighty Elemental Forces roamed unbound and in their constant struggle shaped the forms of the world as we see it today. The Essences I found in Zagoravia are nothing more than fragments of these forces, enslaved by the demon forces and used as self-aware weapons that manifest to sow destruction upon the world they once created. But the core of elemental force is not even the final form of the Essence - after destroying them they would break apart in lesser shards which would continue to follow their unrelenting path of destruction.
Old Text: Legends tell of a distant past when the mighty Elemental Forces roamed unbound and in their constant struggle shaped the forms of the world as we see it today. The Essences I found in Zagoravia are nothing more than fragments of these forces, enslaved by the demon forces and used as self-aware weapons that manifest to sow destruction upon the world they once created. But the core of elemental force is not even the final form of the Essence - after destroying them they would break apart in lesser shards which would continue to follow their unrelenting path of destruction.
Old Translation: Legends tell of a distant past when the mighty Elemental Forces roamed unbound and in their constant struggle shaped the forms of the world as we see it today. The Essences I found in Zagoravia are nothing more than fragments of these forces, enslaved by the demon forces and used as self-aware weapons that manifest to sow destruction upon the world they once created. But the core of elemental force is not even the final form of the Essence - after destroying them they would break apart in lesser shards which would continue to follow their unrelenting path of destruction.
New Translation: 傳說在遙遠的過去，浩瀚的元素之力隨處漫遊，而在它們不斷地努力下，形成了現今我們所見的世界。我在扎戈拉維亞發現的原質只不過是那些力量的碎片，現被惡魔之力控制，作為有意識的武器，在這個它們曾經所創造的世界散播毀滅。但元素之力的核心甚至並非原質的最終形態──在破壞之後，它們會分裂成更小的碎片，持續不斷地散播毀滅。

Text: The fleeting madness of the curse has taken another wicked form - the stone statues scattered across the city had descended upon the denizens to make sure no one stays alive. Carved from massive stone and imbued with demonic energy, the Gargoyles hold tireless guard on any mortal activity on the streets. Their stone forms make them almost impossible to destroy and allows them to quickly seize the initiative in battle.
Old Text: The fleeting madness of the curse has taken another wicked form - the stone statues scattered across the city had descended upon the denizens to make sure no one stays alive. Carved from massive stone and imbued with demonic energy, the Gargoyles hold tireless guard on any mortal activity on the streets. Their stone forms make them almost impossible to destroy and allows them to quickly seize the initiative in battle.
Old Translation: The fleeting madness of the curse has taken another wicked form - the stone statues scattered across the city had descended upon the denizens to make sure no one stays alive. Carved from massive stone and imbued with demonic energy, the Gargoyles hold tireless guard on any mortal activity on the streets. Their stone forms make them almost impossible to destroy and allows them to quickly seize the initiative in battle.
New Translation: 詛咒的瞬間失控產生了另一種邪惡形態──這些散布在城市各處的石頭雕像突然襲擊居民們，企圖趕盡殺絕。這些石像鬼是由巨大石塊雕刻而成，並被灌注惡魔能量，它們永不疲倦，持續監視街道上人類的一舉一動。它們的石頭形態堅不可摧，也因此讓它們在戰場上能快速取得先機。

Text: The Thralls are mindless slaves of the mysterious vampires. I could only guess what is their role in the dark fate of Zagoravia but now that I have encountered their servants I know that my every step is being watched. I have to be very careful if I want to avoid the fate of Adrian.
Old Text: The Thralls are mindless slaves of the mysterious vampires. I could only guess what is their role in the dark fate of Zagoravia but now that I have encountered their servants I know that my every step is being watched. I have to be very careful if I want to avoid the fate of Adrian.
Old Translation: The Thralls are mindless slaves of the mysterious vampires. I could only guess what is their role in the dark fate of Zagoravia but now that I have encountered their servants I know that my every step is being watched. I have to be very careful if I want to avoid the fate of Adrian.
New Translation: 死徒是神祕吸血鬼所控制的無思維奴隸。我無法猜到吸血鬼和扎戈拉維亞的黑暗命運有著什麼樣的關聯，但如今遇到了他們的奴僕們，我知道自己的一舉一動都在監視之下。如果不想重蹈艾德里安的覆轍，我就必須非常小心。

Text: Vampires are not spawned in any of the demon worlds. Their evil originates here, in our own ancient history. The very fact that I have been confronted by vampires means that a deeper plot is involved here. If I survive Zagoravia my experience could become a valuable weapon for mankind in the clandestine war against the forces of the supernatural.
Old Text: Vampires are not spawned in any of the demon worlds. Their evil originates here, in our own ancient history. The very fact that I have been confronted by vampires means that a deeper plot is involved here. If I survive Zagoravia my experience could become a valuable weapon for mankind in the clandestine war against the forces of the supernatural.
Old Translation: Vampires are not spawned in any of the demon worlds. Their evil originates here, in our own ancient history. The very fact that I have been confronted by vampires means that a deeper plot is involved here. If I survive Zagoravia my experience could become a valuable weapon for mankind in the clandestine war against the forces of the supernatural.
New Translation: 吸血鬼並不是誕生於魔界。他們的邪惡就源自於此，於我們古老的歷史中。我一直遭遇吸血鬼，這一事實就說明有更深的陰謀牽涉其中。如果我能度過扎戈拉維亞的劫難，我的經驗可以成為人類與超自然力量暗中對抗的有力武器。

Text: Creatures spawned in the pits or unfortunate souls transformed into demon beasts? Who could tell? No matter their origin, all hellhounds share the same traits. Deadly jaws capable of puncturing plate armor, lust for flesh, and unquenchable appetite for destruction - all bent on devouring the remains of the worlds infested by their packs.

It's lamentable what happened to the creatures of the land when the evil of the Preacher arrived. Succumbing to his righteous presence, the unfortunate Scorpions became the instrument of his will. Beings no longer from this world, they are driven to pursue the sinners who dare refuse the truth that the Preacher hath brought to the people.

I've killed vampires, undead and demons, but never have I wished to spare the monsters. But the succubi...If only they wouldn't be so beautiful I would strike them down so easier. These female demons emanate auras of fatal desire and magical trickery, stimulation and simulation of feelings that threaten to engulf me and force me to surrender. I'm only grateful that my years of experience have instilled in me one desire above all others. The desire to live.
Some downloadable content requires a game update in order to work.
New Translation: 某些附加下載內容需要更新遊戲才能運作。
