New Translation: 當時我被困在夢境之塔，我無法回應。

Text: Many answered the call, no one returned.
Old Text: Many others did answer the call, but none returned.
Old Translation: Many others did answer the call, but none returned.
New Translation: 許多人回應了號召，卻都有去無回。

Text: I thought Adrian dead until a raven delivered his message.
Old Text: I thought Adrian dead until a raven delivered his message.
Old Translation: I thought Adrian dead until a raven delivered his message.
New Translation: 我以為艾德里安死了，直到烏鴉送來了他的信。

Text: He too summoned me to Zagoravia. He saw what I seek.
Old Text: He summons me to Zagoravia. He saw what I seek.
Old Translation: He too summoned me to Zagoravia. He saw what I seek.
New Translation: 信裡他要我到扎戈拉維亞。他說發現了我所追尋之物。

Text: Adrian is a friend. One of the precious few I have.
Old Text: Adrian is a friend. One of the precious few.
Old Translation: Adrian is a friend. One of the precious few I have.
New Translation: 艾德里安是我的同伴，我極少的知心好友之一。

Text: And the only man who knows of my past.
Old Text: And the only man who knows of my past.
Old Translation: And the only man who knows of my past.
New Translation: 也是唯一瞭解我過去的人。

Text: Of the pact I made, and the demon powers I wield.
Old Text: Of the pact I made and the demon powers I wield.
Old Translation: Of the pact I made, and the demon powers I wield.
New Translation: 知道我曾簽下契約，擁有惡魔之力。
無論這座詛咒之城有什麼鬼怪作祟，

Text: I will face to find my friend.
Old Text: I will face to find my friend.
Old Translation: I will face to find my friend.
New Translation: 我都會對抗，並找到我的朋友的。

Text: Not a human soul in sight.
Old Text: Not a human soul in sight.
Old Translation: Not a human soul in sight.

New Translation: 怪物們占據了大街小巷。

Text: Dim lights shine through the dusty windows.
Old Text: Dim lights shine through the dusty windows.
Old Translation: Dim lights shine through the dusty windows.
New Translation: 布滿灰塵的窗戶透出著黯淡的微光。

Text: I wonder what horrors hide behind them.
Old Text: I wonder what horrors hide behind them.
Old Translation: I wonder what horrors hide behind them
New Translation: 不知道牠們背後隱藏著什麼樣的恐怖。

Text: I sense something hidden, something far more sinister than the monsters.
Old Text: I sense something hidden, something far more sinister than the monsters.
Old Translation: I sense something hidden, something far more sinister than the monsters.
New Translation: 我能感覺到，某種遠比怪物更險惡的東西。

Text: Something faint. Like a whisper in the back of my mind.
Old Text: Something faint. Like a whisper in the back of my mind.
Old Translation: Something faint. Like a whisper in the back of my mind.
New Translation: 幽幽地，像是我腦海中的耳語。

Text: A voice in my head? What else?
Old Text: A voice in my head? What else?
Old Translation: A voice in my head? What else?
New Translation: 腦裡傳出的聲音？還是哪裡的？

Text: If you can hear me jump now!
Old Text: If you can hear me jump now!
Old Translation: If you can hear me jump now!
New Translation: 要是能聽到的話，就跳一下吧！

Text: Come on! Jump, jump, jump, jump...
Old Text: Come on! Jump, jump, jump, jump...
Old Translation: Come on! Jump, jump, jump, jump...

Text: Good boy! Now roll-over... Heh, just kidding!
Old Text: Good boy! Now roll-over... Heh, just kidding!
Old Translation: Good boy! Now roll-over... Heh, just kidding!
New Translation: 乖孩子！接下來翻個滾吧……哈，開玩笑的啦！

Text: You're wondering how to get past that keep?
Old Text: You're wondering how to get past that keep?
Old Translation: You're wondering how to get past that keep?
New Translation: 你想知道怎麼通過那座堡壘嗎？

Text: <sarcastic>I'm sure that NOBODY put a giant, easy to get through sewer grate on the left side of the keep. That would be preposterous!
Old Text: <sarcastic>I'm sure that NOBODY put a giant, easy to get through sewer grate on the left side of the keep. That would be preposterous!
Old Translation: <sarcastic>I'm sure that NOBODY put a giant, easy to get through sewer grate on the left side of the keep. That would be preposterous!
New Translation: <sarcastic>我保證絕不會有人把又大，又可以輕易穿過的下水道柵欄設在堡壘的左邊。那實在太可笑了！

Text: Look, hunter, a treasure chest! Up there on the balcony.
Old Text: Look, hunter, a treasure chest! Up there on the balcony.
Old Translation: Look, hunter, a treasure chest! Up there on the balcony.
New Translation: 看哪，獵人，有個寶箱耶！上去陽台吧。

Text: Come on, go get it. You can use the exercise.
Old Text: Come on, go get it. You can use the exercise.
Old Translation: Come on go get it. You can use the exercise.
New Translation: 快啊，快去開啊。你可以練習練習。

Text: I love these boxes. You never know what you're going to get. So exciting!
Old Text: I love these boxes. You never know what you're going to get. So exciting!
Old Translation: I love these boxes. You never know what you're going to get. So exciting!
New Translation: 我超愛這些寶箱的。你永遠不知道會拿到什麼。超興奮的！

Text: You know there are more of these lovely chests lying around. Can you find them?
Old Text: You know there are more of these lovely chests lying around. Can you find them?
Old Translation: You know there are more of these lovely chests lying around. Can you find them?
New Translation: 你知道附近有很多迷人的寶箱了吧。你能全找出來嗎？

Text: Ooh! Watch out, hunter. Those dummies look tough.
Old Text: Ooh! Watch out, hunter. Those dummies look tough.
Old Translation: Ooh! Watch out, hunter. Those dummies look tough.
New Translation: 哦！小心啊，獵人。那些假人看起來挺棘手的。

Text: They outnumber you. You should consider retreating.<laughter>
Old Text: They outnumber you. You should consider retreating.<laughter>
Old Translation: They outnumber you. You should consider retreating. <laughter>
New Translation: 它們人數比你多。你應該考慮撤退囉。<laughter>

Text: Look at those dummies with their red eyes and long noses.
Old Text: Look at those dummies with their red eyes and long noses.
Old Translation: Look at those dummies with their red eyes and long noses.
New Translation: 你看那些紅眼睛、長鼻子的假人。

Text: They are laughing at you feeble attacks!<laughter>
Old Text: They are laughing at you feeble attacks!<laughter>
Old Translation: They are laughing at you feeble attacks!<laughter>
New Translation: 它們正在笑你的攻擊軟趴趴的！<laughter>

Text: Wait, are you still fighting the dummies?
Old Text: Wait, are you still fighting the dummies?
Old Translation: Wait, are you still fighting the dummies?
New Translation: 等等，你還沒搞定那些假人啊？

Text: Come on! Put your back in to it. Hit harder.
Old Text: Come on! Put your back in to it. Hit harder.
Old Translation: Come on! Put your back in to it. Hit harder.
New Translation: 加油！再加把勁啊。打用力點。

Text: Maybe I should stop wasting my time on you, hunter, and make friends with the dummies instead!
Old Text: Maybe I should stop wasting my time on you, hunter, and make friends with the dummies instead!
Old Translation: Maybe I should stop wasting my time on you, hunter, and make friends with the dummies instead!
New Translation: 也許我不該在你身上浪費時間的，獵人，你乾脆和那些假人做朋友吧！

Text: <surprised>Ooh! A demon power! <impressed>Where did you learn to do that?
Old Text: <surprised>Ooh! A demon power! <impressed>Where did you learn to do that?
Old Translation: <surprised>Ooh! A demon power!<impressed>Where did you learn to do that?
New Translation: <surprised>哦！惡魔之力！<impressed>你是從哪學來的？

Text: <unsecure><cough>Anyway... Come, meet me in the next room!
Old Text: <unsecure><cough>Anyway... Come, meet me in the next room!
Old Translation: <unsecure><cough>Anyway... Come, meet me in the next room!
New Translation: <unsecure><cough>不管了……來吧，我們下個房間見！

Text: I’m trapped in that box. Come on, break it!
Old Text: I’m trapped in that box. Come on, break it!
Old Translation: I’m trapped in that box. Come on, break it!
New Translation: 我被困在那個箱子裡了。快幫我打破它！

Text: Wait. That's not me. Oh well I must be in another dungeon.<laughter>
Old Text: Wait. That's not me. Oh well I must be in another dungeon.<laughter>
Old Translation: Wait. That's not me. Oh well I must be in another dungeon.<laughter>
New Translation: 等等，那個不是我。哦，好吧，我一定是在別的地方。<laughter>
我感覺附近有閃亮亮的玩意！

Text: Let me give you a hint. It's bigger than a spider, but it is also full of treasure and it is sitting on top looking down at you.
Old Text: Let me give you a hint. It's bigger than a spider, but it is also full of treasure and it is sitting on top looking down at you.
Old Translation: Let me give you a hint. It's bigger than a spider, but it is also full of treasure and it is sitting on top looking down at you.
New Translation: 給你點提示吧。那玩意比蜘蛛還大，但滿滿都是寶物，而且正坐在高處俯看著你呢。

Text: Yes you found it, good boy! What did you get? Something shiny?
Old Text: Yay you found it, good boy! What did you get? Something shiny?
Old Translation: Yes you found it, good boy! What did you get? Something shiny?
New Translation: 好耶，你找到了，乖孩子！你拿到了什麼？閃亮亮的玩意嗎？

Text: Seriously, you give up on the treasure?
Old Text: Seriously, you give up on the treasure?
Old Translation: Seriously, you give up on the treasure?
New Translation: 不是吧？你不要寶物了嗎？

Text: Good! I knew your greed would get the better of you.
Old Text: Good! I knew your greed would get the better of you.
Old Translation: Good! I knew your greed would get the better of you.
New Translation: 很好！我就知道你會被貪婪牽著走。

Text: There is something about that voice. Something I can't quite place.
Old Text: There is something about that voice. Something I can't quite place.
Old Translation: There is something about that voice. Something I can't quite place.
New Translation: 那個聲音我有印象，但想不起來。

Text: I've fought and slain many monsters in my line of work.
Old Text: I've fought and slain many monsters in my line of work.
Old Translation: I've fought and slain many monsters in my line of work.
New Translation: 我做獵人以來殺過的怪物不計其數。

Text: The ones that talk are  <emphasis>always the worst.
Old Text: The ones that talk are <emphasis>always the worst.
Old Translation: The ones that talk are  <emphasis>always the worst.
New Translation: 會說話的傢伙，<emphasis>永遠是最棘手的。

Text: <surprised>There are survivors after all this time!
Old Text: <surprised>There are survivors after all this time!
Old Translation: <surprised>There are survivors after all this time!
New Translation: <surprised>過了那麼久竟然還有生還者！

Text: Castle Zagore still stands – a refuge from the horrors outside.
Old Text: Castle Zagore still stands – a refuge from the horrors outside.
Old Translation: Castle Zagore still stands – a refuge from the horrors outside.
New Translation: 扎戈爾城仍聳立著，這座把恐怖隔絕於外的庇護所。

Text:
Welcome to Zagoravia, hunter! Thank you for answering our summons and bringing your sword to our cause.

Soon we will push back the enemy. If you hurry you will be rewarded.
Old Text:
Welcome to Zagoravia, hunter! Thank you for answering our summons and lending your sword to our cause.

Soon, with the help of more hunters, we will push back the enemy. You shall have to hurry if you want to earn your wage.
Old Translation:
Welcome to Zagoravia, hunter! Thank you for answering our summons and bringing your sword to our cause.

Soon we will push back the enemy. If you hurry you will be rewarded.
New Translation:
歡迎來到扎戈拉維亞，獵人！感謝你回應了號召，與我們一起並肩作戰。

我們馬上就要反攻了。如果你動作夠快，你就能獲得獎勵。

Text: Your Majesty, I would gladly see you to safety.
Old Text: Your Majesty, I would gladly see you to safety.
Old Translation: Your Majesty, I would gladly see you to safety.
New Translation: 女王陛下，很高興看到您平安無事。

Text: It is not safety that we want. We are going to win this war and free my kingdom from the demons.
Old Text: It is not safety that we want. We are going to win this war and free my kingdom from the demons.
Old Translation: It is not safety that we want. We are going to win this war and free my kingdom from the demons.
New Translation: 這不是我想要的平安。我們要打贏這場戰爭，從惡魔手中解放我的王國。

Text: No further help is coming, Your Majesty. What brought me here is the fate of a fellow hunter by the name of Adrian.
Old Text: No further help is coming, Your Majesty. What brought me here is the fate of a fellow hunter by the name of Adrian.
Old Translation: No further help is coming, Your Majesty. What brought me here is the fate of a fellow hunter by the name of Adrian.
New Translation: 不會再有援助了，女王陛下。我是為了一個獵人伙伴的生死而來，他名叫艾德里安。

Text: You may believe no help is coming and have given up but we stand strong. <pause> But if it is your friend you seek you must go south - to the Royal Gardens.
Old Text: You have already given up while we still stand strong. <pause>Very well. If it is your friend you seek you must go south - to the Royal Gardens.
Old Translation: You may believe no help is coming and have given up but we stand strong. <pause> But if it is your friend you seek you must go south - to the Royal Gardens.
New Translation: 你也許認為不會再有援助而放棄了，但我們絕不退縮。<pause>如果你找的人是你朋友的話，那你必須往南走──去皇家花園。

Text: The Queen is strong willed. It must be how she got this far.
Old Text: The Queen is strong in will. It must be how she got this far.
Old Translation: The Queen is strong willed. It must be how she got this far.
New Translation: 女王的意志堅強，一路支撐她到現在。

Text: But it changes nothing. The city is overrun.
Old Text: This changes nothing. The city is overrun.
Old Translation: But it changes nothing. The city is overrun.
New Translation: 但這改變不了什麼。城市已經淪陷了。

Text: I'm Damian the Alchemist. I can help you with useful supplies, like potions and bombs, and you can help me with your gold, he-he-he. We Alchemists are said to transmute gold into air, but it is all for the benefits of science! Take a look through my inventory, there’s not much demand from hunters these days.
Old Text: I am Damian the Alchemist. I can help you with useful supplies, like potions and bombs, and you can help me with your gold, he-he-he. We Alchemists are said to transmute gold into air, but it is all for the benefits of science! Take a look through my inventory, there’s not much demand from hunters these days.
Old Translation: I'm Damian the Alchemist. I can help you with useful supplies, like potions and bombs, and you can help me with your gold, he-he-he. We Alchemists are said to transmute gold into air, but it is all for the benefits of science! Take a look through my inventory, there’s not much demand from hunters these days.
New Translation: 我是鍊金術師．戴米恩。我可以提供你一些有用的補給，像是藥劑、炸彈，而你可以提供一些金錢給我，呵呵呵。人們都說我們鍊金術師會把金子變空氣，但這可都是為了科學啊！來看看我的貨吧，這些日子已經沒多少獵人來了。

Text: <sarcastic>Great! Another hunter comes to save the day! Maybe we stand a chance against the countless hordes now! Or maybe you'll die like all the others.
Old Text: <sarcastic>Great! Another hunter comes to save the day! Maybe we stand a chance against the countless hordes now! Or maybe you'll die like all the others.
Old Translation: <sarcastic> Great! Another hunter comes to save the day! Maybe we stand a chance against the countless hordes now! Or maybe you'll die like all the others.
New Translation: <sarcastic>太好了！又一個獵人來扭轉敗局了！或許我們有機會打敗無數大軍了！也或許你只是另一個來送死的。

Text: My name is Victor Vran and I didn't expect this kind of warm welcome in Zagoravia. I am looking for a friend. I won't stay a minute longer after I find him.
Old Text: My name is Victor Vran and I didn't expect this kind of warm welcome in Zagoravia. I am looking for a friend. I won't stay a minute longer after I find him.
Old Translation: My name is Victor Vran and I didn't expect this kind of warm welcome in Zagoravia. I am looking for a friend. I won't stay a minute longer after I find him.
New Translation: 我叫維克多．弗蘭，沒想到會在扎戈拉維亞受到如此熱烈的歡迎。其實我正在找一位朋友。找到他之後，我馬上就會離開的。

Text:
Listen, Vran. I don't care. Just one rule - don't promise the impossible to Her Majesty.

Every day I endeavor to convince her to give up hope of saving this city. With you around, she will become even more determined to stay and die in this cursed castle. If this happens, I'll hold you personally responsible, you hear me?
Old Text:
Listen, Vran. I don't care. Just one rule - don't promise the impossible to Her Majesty.

Every day I endeavor to convince her to give up hope of saving this city. With you around, she will become even more determined to stay and die in this cursed castle. If this happens, I'll hold you personally responsible, you hear me?
Old Translation:
Listen, Vran. I don't care. Just one rule - don't promise the impossible to Her Majesty.

Every day I endeavor to convince her to give up hope of saving this city. With you around, she will become even more determined to stay and die in this cursed castle. If this happens, I'll hold you personally responsible, you hear me?
New Translation:
聽著，弗蘭，你要做什麼我不管。只有一個原則──別對女王陛下許下無法實現的承諾。

每天我都竭盡所能地說服她放棄拯救這座城市的希望。現在有你在，她肯定會更加堅定與這座詛咒之城共存亡的決心。要是發生這種事，我唯你是問，聽清楚了嗎？

Text: I'm back! Did you miss me?
Old Text: I'm back! Did you miss me?
Old Translation: I'm back! Did you miss me?

Text: Now that I think about it we weren't properly introduced.
Old Text: Now that I think about it we weren't properly introduced.
Old Translation: Now that I think about it we weren't properly introduced.
New Translation: 對了，我們還沒互相介紹呢。

Text: You can call me Voice. I'm currently without a body, so this seems to fit.
Old Text: You can call me Voice. I'm currently without a body, so this seems to fit.
Old Translation: You can call me Voice. I'm currently without a body, so this seems to fit.
New Translation: 你可以叫我謎之聲。我目前沒有身體，所以滿貼切的。

Text: Now what should I call you?
Old Text: Now what should I call you?
Old Translation: Now what should I call you?

Text: John... Nah you don't look like a John. Victor... well that's just stupid. Genady... No that doesn't suit you either...
Old Text: John... Nah you don't look like a John. Victor... well that's just stupid. Genady... No that doesn't suit you either...
Old Translation: John... Nah you don't look like a John. Victor... well that's just stupid. Genady... No that doesn't suit you either...
New Translation: 約翰……不好，你看起來不像。維克多……呃，蠢斃了。根納迪……不，也不太適合……

Text: I know! I'll call you Vicky. Yes, that seems to fit perfectly.<laughter>
Old Text: I know! I'll call you Vicky. Yes, that seems to fit perfectly.<laughter>
Old Translation: I know! I'll call you Vicky. Yes, that seems to fit perfectly.<laughter>
New Translation: 有了！就叫你維琪吧。好耶，太適合了。<laughter>

Text: Look, Vicky, a maze. That looks fun, let's go there.
Old Text: Look, Vicky, a maze. That looks fun, let's go there.
Old Translation: Look, Vicky, a maze. That looks fun, let's go there.
New Translation: 看哪，維琪，有迷宮耶。好像挺有趣的，走吧。

Text: Now, can you find your way out?<laughter>
Old Text: Now, can you find your way out?<laughter>
Old Translation: Now, can find your way out?<laughter>

Text: Vicky, this is such a fun place full of ancient things, terrible things, things that go KABOOM!<laughter>
Old Text: Vicky, this is such a fun place full of ancient things, terrible things, things that go KABOOM!<laughter>
Old Translation: Vicky, this is such a fun place full of ancient things, terrible things, things that go KABOOM! <laughter>
New Translation: 維琪，這裡可是充滿樂趣的地方，裡面有一堆古老、可怕，還有會爆炸的傢伙喔！<laughter>

Text: Too bad that you can't go inside. Perhaps when you are a little bit taller.
Old Text: Too bad that you can't go inside. Perhaps when you are a little bit taller.
Old Translation: Too bad that you can't go inside. Perhaps when you are a little bit taller.
New Translation: 可惜你不能進去。也許要等你再長大一點。

Text: Riddle me this, Vicky! What has large fangs, acid breath and 4000 legs?
Old Text: Riddle me this, Vicky! What has large fangs, acid breath and has 4000 legs?
Old Translation: Riddle me this, Vicky! What has large fangs, acid breath and 4000 legs?
New Translation: 猜一猜，維琪！什麼東西有長長的尖牙、酸酸的吐息、還有4000條腿呢？

Text: Go inside and you'll find out!<laughter>
Old Text: Go inside and you'll find out!<laughter>
Old Translation: Go inside and you'll find out!<laughter>

Text: Oh, I sense something young and delicious up ahead.
Old Text: Oh, I sense something young and delicious up ahead.
Old Translation: Oh, I sense something young and delicious up ahead.
New Translation: 哦，我感覺到前方有鮮美的嫩妹。

Text: Don’t be jealous, Vicky! I’ll be back.<laughter>
Old Text: Don’t be jealous, Vicky! I’ll be back.<laughter>
Old Translation: Don’t be jealous, Vicky! I’ll be back.<laughter>
New Translation: 別吃醋嘛，維琪！我馬上回來。<laughter>

Text: The smell hits you right away.
Old Text: The smell hits you right away.
Old Translation: The smell hits you right away.

Text: Not the stale dry smell of a tomb.
Old Text: Not the stale dry smell of a tomb.
Old Translation: Not the stale dry smell of a tomb.

Text: No this is another all too familiar smell.
Old Text: No this is another all too familiar smell.
Old Translation: No this is another all too familiar smell.
New Translation: 是的，這是再熟悉不過的氣味了。

Text: Another dead body. Could that be Adrian?
Old Text: Another dead body. Could that be Adrian?
Old Translation: Another dead body. Could that be Adrian?
New Translation: 又一具死屍。會是艾德里安嗎？

Text: One of ours has fallen here, but it isn’t Adrian.
Old Text: One of ours has fallen here, but it isn’t Adrian.
Old Translation: One of ours has fallen here, but it isn’t Adrian.
New Translation: 我們的一位兄弟在此陣亡了，但並不是艾德里安。

Text: I will cleanse this tomb so you can rest in peace, brother.
Old Text: I will cleanse this tomb so you can rest in peace, brother.
Old Translation: I will cleanse this tomb so you can rest in peace, brother.
New Translation: 我會清理這座墓窖以讓你安息的，兄弟。

Text: The death of a hunter is like the death of a brother or sister.
Old Text: A death of a hunter is often regarded as a death in the family by other hunters.
Old Translation: The death of a hunter is like the death of a brother or sister.
New Translation: 獵人的死如同自己兄弟姊妹的死。

Text: We mourn and raise a toast to celebrate the deeds and lives of those we lose.
Old Text: We mourn and raise a toast to celebrate the deeds and lives of those we lost.
Old Translation: We mourn and raise a toast to celebrate the deeds and lives of those we lose.
New Translation: 我們為失去的兄弟們哀悼，為他們的英勇行為乾杯。

Text: Thank the Gods, you came to save me! I was on patrol with some of the hunters to carry their provisions and trophies. We were attacked and I made a tactical retreat.
Section: Act1 03-11 Meeting Private Stash in Royal Gardens Crypt
Old Text: Thank the Gods, you came to save me! I was on patrol with some of the hunters to carry their provisions and trophies. We were attacked and I made a tactical retreat.
Old Translation: Thank the Gods, you came to save me! I was on patrol with some of the hunters to carry their provisions and trophies. We were attacked and I made a tactical retreat.
New Translation: 感謝上帝，謝謝您來救我！我原本和一些獵人在巡邏，替他們搬運糧食和戰利品。後來我們被襲擊了，我就戰略性撤退了。

Text: You just ran and left the hunters to die?
Section: Act1 03-11 Meeting Private Stash in Royal Gardens Crypt
Old Text: You just ran and left the hunters to die?
Old Translation: You just ran and left the hunters to die?
New Translation: 你丟下他們獨自逃跑了？

Text: Well, you see, I’m a coward and that has kept me alive in this hell. I was sure that someone would come along to rescue me. So, the coast is clear? Can I get back home?
Section: Act1 03-11 Meeting Private Stash in Royal Gardens Crypt
Old Text: Well, you see, I’m a coward and that has kept me alive in this hell. I was sure that someone would come along to rescue me. So is the coast clear? Can I get back home?
Old Translation: Well, you see, I’m a coward and that has kept me alive in this hell. I was sure that someone would come along to rescue me. So is the coast clear? Can I get back home?
New Translation: 唔，如您所見，我、我是個懦夫，我也因此才在這地獄中活了下來。我、我一直確信會有人來救我的。所以，沒有危險了嗎？我能回家了嗎？

Text: Even a coward's life will feed the evil brewing here. I’ve cleared the way to the castle. You can go.
Section: Act1 03-11 Meeting Private Stash in Royal Gardens Crypt
Old Text: Even a coward's life will feed the evil brewing here. I’ve cleared the way to the castle. You can go.
Old Translation: Even a coward's life will feed the evil brewing here. I’ve cleared the way to the castle. You can go.
New Translation: 即使是懦夫的生命也會使邪惡壯大。我已經掃清了通往城堡的路。回去吧。

Text: Oh, thank you, thank you, thank you! I promise I’ll find a way to repay you.
Section: Act1 03-11 Meeting Private Stash in Royal Gardens Crypt
Old Text: Oh, thank you, thank you, thank you! I promise I’ll find a way to repay you.
Old Translation: Oh, thank you, thank you, thank you! I promise I’ll find a way to repay you.
New Translation: 哦！非常、非常感謝您！我會想辦法報答您的。

Text: You know, I used to be a hunter like you until I took an arrow to the knee!
Old Text: You know, I used to be a hunter like you until I took an arrow to the knee!
Old Translation: You know, I used to be a hunter like you until I took an arrow to the knee!
New Translation: 你知道嗎，我以前和你一樣是個獵人，直到我膝蓋中了一箭！

Text: I'm way too witty to be a hunter.
Old Text: I'm way too witty to be a hunter.
Old Translation: I'm way too witty to be a hunter.
New Translation: 我這麼幽默，怎麼會是獵人呢。
等等！<sniffing>我嗅到有東西隱藏著。是寶藏！

Text: Come on, Vicky! Go get it!
Old Text: Come on, Vicky! Go get it!
Old Translation: Come on, Vicky! Go get it!

Text: What did you get, what did you get?
Old Text: What did you get, what did you get?
Old Translation: What did you get, what did you get?
New Translation: 你拿到了什麼？你拿到了什麼！？

Text: I sense it nearby - a treasure chest filled with shiny, shiny loot!
Old Text: I sense it nearby - a treasure chest filled with shiny, shiny loot!
Old Translation: I sense it nearby - a treasure chest filled with shiny, shiny loot!
New Translation: 我感覺到它就在附近，一個裝滿閃亮亮寶物的寶箱！

Text: Come on, search! I know you want it!
Old Text: Come on, search! I know you want it!
Old Translation: Come on, search! I know you want it!
New Translation: 快，認真找！我知道你很想要的！

Text: Ooh, who's that glowing, blue fellow?
Old Text: Ooh, who's that glowing, blue fellow?
Old Translation: Ooh, who's that glowing, blue fellow?
New Translation: 哦，那個發光的藍色傢伙是誰？

Text: The day is done, and the darkness
Old Text: The day is done, and the darkness
Old Translation: The day is done, and the darkness

Text: Falls from the wings of night,
Old Text: Falls from the wings of night,
Old Translation: Falls from the wings of night,

Text: As a feather is wafted downward
Old Text: As a feather is wafted downward
Old Translation: As a feather is wafted downward

Text: From an eagle in his flight.
Old Text: From an eagle in his flight.
Old Translation: From an eagle in his flight.

Text: Wait! Don't go! Was it something I said?
Old Text: Wait! Don't go! Was it something I said?
Old Translation: Wait! Don't go! Was it something I said?
New Translation: 等等！別走！我說錯了什麼嗎？

Text: And here I thought I was the last living hunter in this damned city.
Old Text: And here I thought I was the last living hunter in this damned city.
Old Translation: And here I thought I was the last living hunter in this damned city.
New Translation: 我還以為自己是這座詛咒之城唯一存活的獵人。

Text: Victor Vran. Just arrived. Don't plan on staying long.
Old Text: Victor Vran. Just arrived. Don't plan on staying long.
Old Translation: Victor Vran. Just arrived. Don't plan on staying long.
New Translation: 我是維克多．弗蘭。剛到這裡。但沒打算久待。

Text: That's what I said when I arrived a year ago. Yet here I am, still killing demons and trying to make sense of what happened.
Old Text: That's what I said when I arrived one year ago. Yet here I am, still killing demons and trying to make sense of what happened.
Old Translation: That's what I said when I arrived a year ago. Yet here I am, still killing demons and trying to make sense of what happened.
New Translation: 我一年前剛來的時候也是這麼說。但至今我依然在此獵殺惡魔，試圖弄清到底發生了什麼。

Text: Do you know a hunter by the name of Adrian?
Old Text: Do you know a hunter by the name of Adrian?
Old Translation: Do you know a hunter by the name of Adrian?
New Translation: 妳認識一位叫艾德里安的獵人嗎？

Text: I've heard of him but we never crossed paths. The only hunters I've seen recently lie lifeless.
Old Text: I've heard of him but we never crossed paths. The only hunters I've seen recently lie lifeless.
Old Translation: I've heard of him but we never crossed paths. The only hunters I've seen recently lie lifeless.
New Translation: 聽說過，但我們沒有碰過面。我最近見過的獵人只有倒在地上的。

Text: You could check the crypts. I haven't been down there for a while, but I wouldn't get my hopes up – there are demons everywhere.
Old Text: You can check the crypts. I haven't been down there for a while, but I wouldn't get my hopes up – there are demons everywhere.
Old Translation: You could check the crypts. I haven't been down there for a while, but I wouldn't get my hopes up – there are demons everywhere.
New Translation: 你可以去墓窖找看看。我有一陣子沒去了，但我認為希望不大──那裡到處都是惡魔。

Text: Thank you. I didn't catch your name.
Old Text: Thank you. I did not catch your name.
Old Translation: Thank you. I didn't catch your name.
New Translation: 謝謝妳。我剛剛沒記住妳的名字。

Text: Because I didn't say it. My name is Irene. See you around, Victor Vran.
Old Text: Because I did not say it. My name is Irene. See you around, Victor Vran.
Old Translation: Because I didn't say it. My name is Irene. See you around, Victor Vran.
New Translation: 因為我還沒說。我叫艾琳。後會有期，維克多．弗蘭。

Text: "Trying to make sense of what happened"<pause> She has another reason to stay here this long, I'm certain.
Old Text: "Trying to make sense of what happened"<pause> She has another reason to stay here this long, I am certain.
Old Translation: "Trying to make sense of what happened"<pause> She has another reason to stay here this long, I'm certain.
New Translation: 「試圖弄清到底發生了什麼」<pause>我敢肯定她有別的原因才長期待在這裡。

Text: Irene paints a bleak picture. Zagoravia is lost.
Old Text: Irene paints a bleak picture. Zagoravia is lost.
Old Translation: Irene paints a bleak picture. Zagoravia is lost.
New Translation: 艾琳描繪了慘淡的景象。扎戈拉維亞已經淪陷了。

Text: Adrian is a skilled hunter, but can he survive this place?
Old Text: Adrian is a skilled hunter, but can he survive this place?
Old Translation: Adrian is a skilled hunter, but can he survive this place?
New Translation: 艾德里安雖經驗豐富，但這種地方他能撐下去嗎？

Text: And  why would he keep fighting for a lost cause?
Old Text: And  why would he keep fighting for a lost cause?
Old Translation: And  why would he keep fighting for a lost cause?
New Translation: 而且為什麼他要堅持打一場敗仗？

Text: One less sword on our side, one more life claimed by the void.
Old Text: One less sword on our side, one more life claimed by the void.
Old Translation: One less sword on our side, one more life claimed by the void.
New Translation: 我們又少了一位戰友，虛空又多奪走了一條生命。

Text: Locked! Is it to keep people out or to keep something in?
Old Text: Locked! Is it to keep people out or to keep something in?
Old Translation: Locked! Is it to keep people out or to keep something in?
New Translation: 鎖住了？這是不讓人進去，還是不讓什麼東西出來？

Text: You'll have to talk to that Queen again. She can let you in. She is good at letting things in where they don't belong.<laughter>
Old Text: You'll have to talk to that Queen again. She can let you in. She is good at letting things where they don't belong.<laughter>
Old Translation: You'll have to talk to that Queen again. She can let you in. She is good at letting things in where they don't belong.<laughter>
New Translation: 你得再去找那位女王談談。她能讓你進去。她特別擅長讓東西進去不該進的地方。<laughter>

Text: I rise in the dawn, and I kneel and blow
Old Text: I rise in the dawn, and I kneel and blow
Old Translation: I rise in the dawn, and I kneel and blow

Text: Till the seed of the fire flicker and glow.
Old Text: Till the seed of the fire flicker and glow.
Old Translation: Till the seed of the fire flicker and glow.

Text: This spirit doesn't seem hostile. More like... confused?
Old Text: This spirit doesn't seem hostile. More like... confused?
Old Translation: This spirit doesn't seem hostile. More like... confused?
New Translation: 這鬼魂似乎沒有敵意。反而像是……癡呆了？

Old Translation: <reciting> A handsome young hunter named Vic,
<reciting> Was daring, and fancy, and slick,

Text: <reciting>And his head now resides on a stick.<laughter>
Old Text: <reciting>And his head now resides on a stick.<laughter>
Old Translation: <reciting> And his head now resides on a stick. <laughter>

Text: Victor ran through the dusty corridors of the royal crypt with a singular goal - to find his best friend.
Old Text: Victor ran through the dusty corridors of the royal crypt with a singular goal - to find his best friend.
Old Translation: Victor ran through the dusty corridors of the royal crypt with a singular goal - to find his best friend.
New Translation: 維克多穿過布滿灰塵的皇室陵寢長廊，只為一個目的──尋找他的摯友。

Text: When Victor stepped into the large hall he was presented with a choice.
Old Text: When Victor stepped into the large hall he was presented with a choice.
Old Translation: When Victor stepped into the large hall he was presented with a choice.
New Translation: 當維克多踏入大廳的那一刻起，他面臨了一個抉擇。

Text: Go left or go right, Victor pondered, as the monsters in the hall tried to claw at his flesh.
Old Text: Go left or go right, Victor pondered, as the monsters in the hall tried to claw at his flesh.
Old Translation: Go left or go right, Victor pondered, as the monsters in the hall tried to claw at his flesh.
New Translation: 往左還是往右？在維克多猶豫的同時，大廳裡的怪物們向他伸出了魔爪。

Text: Not bothered by the monsters, Victor ran past them and took the wrong path.
Old Text: Not bothered by the monsters, Victor ran past them and took the wrong path.
Old Translation: Not bothered by the monsters, Victor ran past them and took the wrong path.
New Translation: 無視這些怪物，維克多穿過它們，走進了錯誤的路。

Text: Having slain the last enemy, Victor made a choice and took the wrong path.
Old Text: Having slain the last enemy, Victor made a choice and took the wrong path.
Old Translation: Having slain the last enemy, Victor made a choice and took the wrong path.
New Translation: 在殺了敵人後，維克多作出決定，走進了錯誤的路。

Text: Left or Right? The choice was proving too difficult for Victor.
Old Text: Left or Right? The choice was proving too difficult for Victor.
Old Translation: Left or Right? The choice was proving too difficult for Victor.
New Translation: 往左還是往右？這決定對維克多來說太難了。

Text: Little did he suspect that the choice was meaningless.
Old Text: Little did he suspect that the choice was meaningless.
Old Translation: Little did he suspect that the choice was meaningless.
New Translation: 他絲毫沒有想到決定根本毫無意義。

Text: Trying to be smart, Victor opted for a third choice.
Old Text: Trying to be smart, Victor opted for a third choice.
Old Translation: Trying to be smart, Victor opted for a third choice.
New Translation: 自作聰明的維克多選擇了第三條路。

Text: But that was also wrong. There was nothing back at the entrance.
Old Text: But that was also wrong. There was nothing back at the beginning.
Old Translation: But that was also wrong. There was nothing back at the entrance.
New Translation: 但這也是錯誤的決定。回到入口什麼也沒有。

Text: Moving on, Stanley... I mean - Victor discovered the lifeless corpse of a fellow hunter.
Old Text: Moving on, Stanley... I mean - Victor discovered the lifeless corpse of fellow hunter.
Old Translation: Moving on, Stanley... I mean - Victor discovered the lifeless corpse of a fellow hunter.
New Translation: 繼續前進，史丹利……我是說，維克多發現了一位獵人伙伴的屍體。

Text: "Weakling!" he thought "Dead at the start of the dungeon."
Old Text: "Weakling!" he thought "Dead at the start of the dungeon."
Old Translation: "Weakling!" he thought "Dead at the start of the dungeon."
New Translation: 「弱雞！」他心想「怎麼剛進地城就掛了。」

Text: Running through the corridor, Victor noticed the body of a hunter.
Old Text: Running through the corridor, Victor noticed the body of a hunter.
Old Translation: Running through the corridor, Victor noticed the body of a hunter.
New Translation: 穿過長廊時，維克多發現了一具獵人的屍體。

Text: Victor kept calm and carried on.
Old Text: Victor kept calm and carried on.
Old Translation: Victor kept calm and carried on.
New Translation: 維克多故作鎮定地繼續前進。

Text: Coming up to another intersection, Victor continued forward.
Old Text: Coming up to another intersection, Victor continued forward.
Old Translation: Coming up to another intersection, Victor continued forward.
New Translation: 來到了另一個路口，維克多繼續向前。

Text: Apparently lost, Victor realized that he had taken the wrong turn and decided to go back.
Old Text: Apparently lost, Victor realized that he had taken the wrong turn and decided to go back.
Old Translation: Apparently lost, Victor realized that he had taken the wrong turn and decided to go back.
New Translation: 看來迷路了，維克多發現自己好像走錯了路，決定折回。

Text: Again on the right track, Victor pushed forward.
Old Text: Again on the right track, Victor pushed forward.
Old Translation: Again on the right track, Victor pushed forward.
New Translation: 這次走對路了，維克多奮勇前進。

Text: Going in the wrong direction, Victor miraculously arrived at the entrance to the lower sections of the crypt.
Old Text: Going in the wrong direction, Victor miraculously arrived at the entrance to the lower sections of the crypt.
Old Translation: Going in the wrong direction, Victor miraculously arrived at the entrance to the lower sections of the crypt.
New Translation: 朝著錯誤的方向前進，維克多奇蹟般地到達了下一層墓窖的入口。

Text: Being a good sport, however, Victor decided to stay a bit longer and have some more fun with his friend the Voice.
Old Text: Being a good sport, however, Victor decided to stay a bit longer and have some more fun with his friend the Voice.
Old Translation: Being a good sport, however, Victor decided to stay a bit longer and have some more fun with his friend Azazel.
New Translation: 但為了展現運動家精神，維克多決定再多待一會兒陪他的朋友謎之聲玩玩。

Text: A beautifully arranged trail of blood and guts guided Victor forward.
Old Text: A beautifully arranged trail of blood and guts guided Victor forward.
Old Translation: A beautifully arranged trail of blood and guts guided Victor forward.
New Translation: 布置華麗的血跡和內臟指引著維克多前進。

Text: As the corridor reached its end, Victor noticed the bodies of hunters and soldiers littered around the large hall.
Old Text: As the corridor reached its end, Victor noticed the bodies of hunters and soldiers littered around the large hall.
Old Translation: As the corridor reached its end, Victor noticed the bodies of hunters and soldiers littered around the large hall.
New Translation: 走到走廊的盡頭，維克多發現大廳到處都是獵人和士兵的屍體。

Old Translation: <singing> When danger reared its ugly head,

Text: <singing>He bravely turned his tail and fled.
Old Text: <singing>He bravely turned his tail and fled.
Old Translation: <singing> He bravely turned his tail and fled.
<singing> Bravest of the braaaave, Sir Victor! <laughter>

Text: Coming up to yet another intersection, Victor decided to continue forward.
Old Text: Coming up to yet another intersection, Victor decided to continue forward.
Old Translation: Coming up to yet another intersection, Victor decided to continue forward.
New Translation: 來到了另一個路口，維克多決定繼續向前。

Text: Coming back full circle, Victor realized that the choice he made just minutes ago was meaningless.
Old Text: Coming back full circle, Victor realized that the choice he made just minutes ago was meaningless.
Old Translation: Coming back full circle, Victor realized that the choice he made just minutes ago was meaningless.
New Translation: 繞了一大圈，維克多發現剛剛下的決定根本毫無意義。

Text: As most choices in life often are.
Old Text: As most choices in life often are.
Old Translation: As most choices in life often are.
New Translation: 正如人生中大多數的決定一樣。

Text: Have you changed your mind, hunter? Will you join our fight?
Old Text: Have you changed your mind, hunter? Will you join our fight?
Old Translation: Have you changed your mind, hunter? Will you join our fight?
New Translation: 你改變主意了嗎，獵人？要加入我們的行列了嗎？

Text: The city is lost, Your Majesty. You should find a way to safety.
Old Text: The city is lost, Your Majesty. You should find a way to safety.
Old Translation: The city is lost, Your Majesty. You should find a way to safety.
New Translation: 城市已經淪陷了，女王陛下。您應該想辦法逃生。

Text:
Battles are won by brave and noble men who see beyond their own immediate needs. In time you will realize that we have no other option but victory.

So, what brings you here before me?
Old Text:
Battles are won by brave and noble men who see beyond their own immediate needs. In time you will realize that we have no other option but victory.

What brings you here before me then?
Old Translation:
Battles are won by brave and noble men who see beyond their own immediate needs. In time you will realize that we have no other option but victory.

So, what brings you here before me?
New Translation:
戰爭是靠勇敢、崇高、願意犧牲小我的人打贏的。終有一天你會發現我們除了取勝之外別無選擇。

那麼，你找我是有什麼事嗎？

Text: I seek permission to enter the Royal Crypt, Your Majesty.
Old Text: I seek permission to enter the Royal Crypt, Your Majesty.
Old Translation: I seek permission to enter the Royal Crypt, Your Majesty.
New Translation: 我想請女王陛下恩准，讓我進入皇室陵寢。

Text: These are difficult times and we need every man. <pause> If you report what you find there you have my permission.
Old Text: These are difficult times and we need every man. <pause>Yes, you have my permission but do report back what you find there.
Old Translation: These are difficult times and we need every man. <pause> If you report what you find there you have my permission.
New Translation: 在這艱困的時期，我們需要每一份力量。<pause>我准許你進去，但你要回報那裡的狀況。

Text:
This place is doomed, Victor. I know it. I have seen that same desperate, delusional hope in the past.

Zagoravia is already a lost cause. Yet, there is still money to be made here, so here I am.
Old Text:
This place is doomed, Victor. I know it. I have seen that same desperate, delusional hope in the past.

Zagoravia is already a lost cause. Yet, there is still money to be made here, so here I am.
Old Translation:
This place is doomed, Victor. I know it. I have seen that same desperate, delusional hope in the past.

Zagoravia is already a lost cause. Yet, there is still money to be made here, so here I am.
New Translation:
這個地方已經沒救了，維克多，我很清楚。我過去曾見過同樣的絕望和虛假的希望。

扎戈拉維亞注定要滅亡了。不過，這裡還是有錢可賺的，所以我還在這裡。

Text:
Many hunters came before you, Victor. Many brave men ventured into the night, but only a few returned. I made good money off them, though. My scientific expertise was greatly rewarded. Their absence is a loss but they left a few things with me.

Don't be alarmed, take a look. For science.
Old Text:
Many hunters came before you, Victor. Many brave men ventured into the night, but only a few returned. I made good money off them, though. My scientific expertise was greatly rewarded. Their absence is a loss but they left few things with me.

Don't be alarmed, take a look. For science.
Old Translation:
Many hunters came before you, Victor. Many brave men ventured into the night, but only a few returned. I made good money off them, though. My scientific expertise was greatly rewarded. Their absence is a loss but they left a few things with me.

Don't be alarmed, take a look. For science.
New Translation:
你來之前已經有許多獵人來過了，維克多。不少勇士冒險進入了黑夜，卻沒幾個人再回來。不過我從他們身上賺了不少錢。我的科學知識派上了極大的用處。他們的離開是種損失，但至少留下了一些裝備在我這裡。

別驚慌，隨便看看吧。科學萬歲！

Text:
That fire-headed girl, Irene, she is a good hunter - brave, but not reckless. She brought back some interesting items from her forays.

It's too bad she will die so young and pretty. Demons will have her, no doubt. Care to browse my inventory?
Old Text:
That fire-headed girl, Irene, she is a good hunter - brave, but not reckless. She brought back some interesting items from her forays.

It's too bad she will die so young and pretty. Demons will have her, no doubt. Care to browse my inventory?
Old Translation:
That fire-headed girl, Irene, she is a good hunter - brave, but not reckless. She brought back some interesting items from her forays.

It's too bad she will die so young and pretty. Demons will have her, no doubt. Care to browse my inventory?
New Translation:
那位紅髮女郎，艾琳，她是位高超的獵人──勇敢，但不魯莽。
她從冒險中帶回了不少有趣的裝備。

可惜的是，她紅顏薄命，終究會死在惡魔手上。要來看看我的貨嗎？

Text: Another dead body. This is fast becoming a common sight.
Old Text: Another dead body. This is fast becoming a common sight.
Old Translation: Another dead body. This is fast becoming a common sight.
New Translation: 又一具屍體。都快要習以為常了。

Text: I fear that someday I will get used to death.
Old Text: I fear that someday I will get used to death.
Old Translation: I fear that someday I will get used to death.
New Translation: 我怕有一天我會對死亡麻木。

Text: Then I would be no different than the monsters I fight.
Old Text: Then I would be no different than the monsters I fight.
Old Translation: Then I would be no different than the monsters I fight.
New Translation: 到時候我就跟那些怪物毫無區別了。

Text: Killed off one by one. Something is stalking these halls.
Old Text: Killed off one by one. Something is stalking these halls.
Old Translation: Killed off one by one. Something is stalking these halls.
New Translation: 一個一個地被殺。有什麼正潛伏在大廳裡。

Text: Why didn't the hunters retreat and regroup?
Old Text: Why didn't the hunters retreat and regroup?
Old Translation: Why didn't the hunters retreat and regroup?
New Translation: 為什麼獵人不撤退再集結呢？

Text: What was keeping them in this cursed city?
Old Text: What was keeping them in this cursed city?
Old Translation: What was keeping them in this cursed city?
New Translation: 是什麼讓他們留在這座詛咒之城？

Text: The pieces are forming a disturbing pattern.
Old Text: The pieces are forming a disturbing pattern.
Old Translation: The pieces are forming a disturbing pattern.
New Translation: 種種線索都指向一個令人不安的方向。

Text: Victor, is that you, old friend?
Old Text: Victor, is that you, old friend?
Old Translation: Victor, is that you, old friend?

Text: I have lured you to this place for a specific reason, Victor.
Old Text: I have lured you to this place for a specific reason, Victor.
Old Translation: I have lured you to this place for a specific reason, Victor.
New Translation: 我把你引來這裡是有原因的，維克多。

Text: Come down and I will tell you.
Old Text: Come down and I will tell you.
Old Translation: Come down and I will tell you.
New Translation: 下來吧，我再好好告訴你。

Text: Adrian, brother, what has become of you?
Old Text: Adrian, brother, what has become of you?
Old Translation: Adrian, brother, what has become of you?
New Translation: 艾德里安，兄弟，你到底怎麼了？

Text: The time of the hunters is over, Victor.
Old Text: The time of the hunters is over, Victor.
Old Translation: The time of the hunters is over, Victor.
New Translation: 獵人的時代已經過去了，維克多。

Text: This city will be their grave.
Old Text: This city will be their grave.
Old Translation: This city will be their grave.
New Translation: 這座城市將會是他們的墳墓。

Text: I can make you stronger than you can imagine, Victor
Old Text: I can make you stronger than you can imagine, Victor
Old Translation: I can make you stronger than you can imagine, Victor
New Translation: 我能讓你變得超乎你想像的強大，維克多。

Text: A single bite, Victor. That’s all it takes.
Old Text: A single bite, Victor. That’s all it takes.
Old Translation: A single bite, Victor. That’s all it takes.
New Translation: 只需咬一口，維克多。就這麼簡單。

Text: You are blind, Victor! Like I was before I received this gift.
Old Text: You are blind, Victor! Like I was before I received this gift.
Old Translation: You are blind, Victor! Like I was before I received this gift.
New Translation: 你被蒙蔽了雙眼，維克多！就像接受恩賜之前的我。

Text: Give in and I will make you see, old friend.
Old Text: Give in and I will make you see, old friend.
Old Translation: Give in and I will make you see, old friend.
New Translation: 放棄掙扎，我會讓你看見的，老友。

Text: This city holds great power, Victor.
Old Text: This city holds great power, Victor.
Old Translation: This city holds great power, Victor.
New Translation: 這座城市擁有強大的力量，維克多。

Text: Join me and we can take it for ourselves.
Old Text: Join me and we can take it for ourselves.
Old Translation: Join me and we can take it for ourselves.
New Translation: 加入我，我們可以一起奪取這股力量。

Text: We always knew this could happen, old friend.
Old Text: We always knew this could happen, old friend.
Old Translation: We always knew this could happen, old friend.
New Translation: 我們一直都知道會有這麼一天，老友。

Text: That we could become monsters ourselves, that we fall to the darkness.
Old Text: That we become monsters ourselves, that we fall to the darkness.
Old Translation: That we could become monsters ourselves, that we fall to the darkness.
New Translation: 知道自己可能會變成怪物，墮入黑暗。

Text: I came for my friend. What do you seek in Zagoravia, Irene?
Old Text: I am here for my friend. What do you seek in Zagoravia, Irene?
Old Translation: I came for my friend. What do you seek in Zagoravia, Irene?
New Translation: 我來是為了找朋友。妳來扎戈拉維亞是為了什麼，艾琳？

Text: Nothing in particular. Exciting place, isn't it? Adventurous, you might call it.
Old Text: Nothing in particular. Exciting place, isn't it? Adventurous, you might call it.
Old Translation: Nothing in particular. Exciting place, isn't it? Adventurous, you might call it.
New Translation: 沒什麼特別的事。令人興奮的地方，不是嗎？冒險吧，你也可以這麼說。

Text: Yeah, the nightlife seems to be booming. Seriously, why are you here?
Old Text: Yeah, the nightlife seems to be booming. Seriously, why are you here?
Old Translation: Yeah, the nightlife seems to be booming. Seriously, why are you here?
New Translation: 是啊，夜生活似乎很熱鬧。說真的，妳為什麼來這裡？

Text: No business of yours. A girl has to keep some secrets, you know.
Old Text: No business of yours. A girl has to keep some secrets.
Old Translation: No business of yours. A girl has to keep some secrets.
New Translation: 不關你的事。女人必須保守一些祕密，你知道的。

Text:
Feeling lonely, Vran? Come to chat? I have a story for you, then.

Have you ever seen the city you swore to protect being overrun by the enemy? Have you ever witnessed the agony in the eyes of your dying comrades? I doubt it; you hunters always roam alone, don't you?
Section: Act1 091 Sir Krum on hunters failure
Old Text:
Feeling lonely, Vran? Came to chat? I have a story for you, then.

Have you ever seen the city you swore to protect being overrun by the enemy? Have you ever witnessed the agony in the eyes of your dying comrades? I doubt it; you hunters always roam alone, don't you?
Old Translation:
Feeling lonely, Vran? Come to chat? I have a story for you, then.

Have you ever seen the city you swore to protect being overrun by the enemy? Have you ever witnessed the agony in the eyes of your dying comrades? I doubt it; you hunters always roam alone, don't you?
New Translation:
感到孤獨嗎，弗蘭？要來聊天？那我講個故事給你聽。

你可曾見過自己誓言守護的城市被敵人攻占？你可曾目睹過戰友臨死前眼中的痛苦？我想不曾吧。你們獵人總是獨來獨往，不是嗎？

Text: The hunters were supposed to save the day. Her Majesty was adamant, she was convinced beyond reason, that you would turn the tide of the war. Yes, your kind came here, but you bled and you died just like my men.
Section: Act1 091 Sir Krum on hunters failure
Old Text: You hunters were supposed to save the day. Her Majesty was adamant, convinced beyond reason, that you will turn the tide of the war. Yes, your kind came here, but you bled and you died just like my men.
Old Translation: The hunters were supposed to save the day. Her Majesty was adamant, she was convinced beyond reason, that you would turn the tide of the war. Yes, your kind came here, but you bled and you died just like my men.
New Translation: 獵人一直被期望著能扭轉敗局。女王陛下意志堅定，毫無理由地深信你們會力挽狂瀾。沒錯，你們是來了，但跟我們的人一樣，你們照樣流血，照樣死去。

Text: The story in a nutshell? My men died to give the hunters a fighting chance that they never took. I hear the voices of my men, whispering in my head, and they want retribution - can you give it to them?
Section: Act1 091 Sir Krum on hunters failure
Old Text: The story in a nutshell? My men died to give the hunters a fighting chance they never took. I can hear the voices of my men, whispering in my head. They want retribution - can you give it to them?
Old Translation: The story in a nutshell? My men died to give the hunters a fighting chance that they never took. I hear the voices of my men, whispering in my head, and they want retribution - can you give it to them?
New Translation: 簡單地說，我們的人陣亡才讓獵人有大顯身手的機會。我能聽到他們的聲音，一直在我的腦海中迴盪著，他們渴望復仇──你能完成他們的遺願嗎？

Text: You? Why are you parading around here instead of hunting monsters? Or have you tired of that?
Section: Act1 092 Sir Krum biting remarks on Victor
Old Text: You? Why are you parading around instead of hunting monsters? Or have you got tired of that?
Old Translation: You? Why are you parading around here instead of hunting monsters? Or have you tired of that?
New Translation: 是你啊？你怎麼不去殺怪，反倒在這裡閒晃？你累了嗎？

Text: The survivors are gathered around the war table.
Old Text: The survivors are gathered around the war table.
Old Translation: The survivors are gathered around the war table.
New Translation: 倖存者們聚集在桌子的周圍。

Text: There is tension in the air. There is also fear.
Old Text: There is tension in the air. There is also fear.
Old Translation: There is tension in the air. There is also fear.
New Translation: 空氣中瀰漫著緊張的氣氛，也夾雜著恐懼。

Text: There are not enough guards to hold the castle.
Old Text: There are not enough guards to hold the castle.
Old Translation: There are not enough guards to hold the castle.
New Translation: 沒有足夠的兵力來鎮守城堡了。

Text: Irene has been missing for a while now and they think that I have left them for good.
Old Text: Irene has been missing for a while now and they think that I have left them for good.
Old Translation: Irene has been missing for a while now and they think that I have left them for good..
New Translation: 艾琳已經失蹤了一段時間，而他們也以為我不辭而別了。

Text: The Queen still insists on continuing the fight. She asks them to do the impossible.
Old Text: The Queen still insists to continue the fight. She asks them to do the impossible.
Old Translation: The Queen still insists on continuing the fight. She asks them to do the impossible.
New Translation: 女王依然堅持繼續奮戰。這等於要他們完成不可能的任務。

Text: What they need now is a sliver of hope.
Old Text: What they need now is a sliver of hope.
Old Translation: What they need now is a sliver of hope.
New Translation: 他們現在所需要的是一絲希望。

Text: "At last you see. We will overcome the invasion."
Old Text: "Do you see it now? We will overcome the invasion."
Old Translation: "At last you see. We will overcome the invasion."
New Translation: 「你終於想通了。我們會戰勝這場侵略的。」

Text: "This is not an invasion! I know what's happening here. The city is a trap. A trap for hunters."
Old Text: "This is not an invasion! I now know what is happening here. The city is a trap. A trap for hunters."
Old Translation: "This is not an invasion! I know what's happening here. The city is a trap. A trap for hunters."
New Translation: 「這並不是侵略！我知道現在的狀況。這座城市是個陷阱，針對獵人而設的。」

Text: I am going to look for Irene. Do you know where she went?
Section: Act1 13 sir Krum after cut scene
Old Text: I am going to look for Irene. Do you know where she went?
Old Translation: I am going to look for Irene. Do you know where she went?
New Translation: 我打算去找艾琳。你知道她去哪裡了嗎？

Text: She is searching for something all over Zagoravia.  She left for the old tower in the Hunting Grounds but she did not return. I looked for her before the war council but I was unable to find her.
Section: Act1 13 sir Krum after cut scene
Old Text: She's been searching for something all over Zagoravia.  She left for the old tower in the Hunting Grounds but she did not return and I could not find her there before the war council.
Old Translation: She is searching for something all over Zagoravia.  She left for the old tower in the Hunting Grounds but she did not return. I looked for her before the war council but I was unable to find her.
New Translation: 她正在扎戈拉維亞到處找某樣東西。她已經去了狩獵場的舊哨塔，卻再也沒有回來。我在戰略會議之前找過她，但我沒有找到。

Text:
A crazy decision, Victor - to stay and fight. Try not to lose your mind like our beloved Queen and all the rest. They are doomed, all of them. No point in trying to save them.

But I will gladly sell you some potions, regardless.
Section: Act1 131 Alchemist on the decision to stay
Old Text:
A crazy decision, Victor - to stay and fight. Try not to lose your mind like our beloved Queen and all the rest. They are doomed, all of them. No point in trying to save them.

But I will gladly sell you some potions, regardless.
New Translation:
留下來奮戰是個瘋狂的決定，維克多。別像我們敬愛的女王以及其他人一樣失去了理智。他們全都沒救了，別白費力氣了。

話雖如此，但我還是很樂意賣你一些藥劑。

Text: You are looking for your delicious little girlfriend.
Old Text: You are looking for your delicious little girlfriend.
Old Translation: You are looking for your delicious little girlfriend.
New Translation: 你正在尋找你那鮮嫩的小女友啊。

Text: I'll help you find the doll.
Old Text: I'll help you find the flame haired vixen.
Old Translation: I'll help you find the flame haired vixen.
New Translation: 我會幫你找到那位小妞的。

Text: And now - the amazing jumping spiders!
Old Text: And now - the amazing jumping spiders!
Old Translation: And now - the amazing jumping spiders!
New Translation: 現在歡迎──神奇的跳躍蜘蛛！

Text: Using their terrifying demon powers to defy the laws of physics.
Old Text: Using their terrifying demon powers to defy the laws of physics.
Old Translation: Using their terrifying demon powers to defy the laws of physics.
New Translation: 牠們能利用駭人的惡魔之力違反物理法則。

Old Text: Choices, choices... which way to go, hmmm?
Old Translation: Choices, choices... which way to go, hmmm?
New Translation: 往東，往西……該走哪一條路呢？

Text: If you feel so inclined to take the west road, give my regards to the hangman, will you?
Old Text: If you feel so inclined to take the west road, give my regards to hangman, will you?
Old Translation: If you feel so inclined to take the west road, give my regards to the hangman, will you?
New Translation: 如果你真的那麼想走西邊那條的話，請代我向吊死鬼問好，好嗎？

Text: Haven't had the chance to HANG out with him for a while now.
Old Text: Haven't had the chance to HANG out with him for a while now.
Old Translation: Haven't had the chance to HANG out with him for a while now.
New Translation: 我好一陣子沒有機會和祂一起閒吊了。

Text: You know, I find you hunters a bit hypocritical.
Old Text: You know, I find you hunters a bit hypocritical.
Old Translation: You know, I find you hunters a bit hypocritical.
New Translation: 我說，我發現你們獵人都挺虛偽的。

Old Text: You claim to be the protectors of humankind but the truth is that all you care about is killing for loot and gold.
Old Translation: You claim to be the protectors of humankind but the truth is that all you care about is killing for loot and gold.

Text: Come on, Victor, follow the gold coins!
Old Text: Come on, Victor, follow the gold coins!
Old Translation: Come on, Victor, follow the gold coins!
New Translation: 來吧，維克多，跟著金幣走！

Text: Maybe there is even more treasure at the end of the golden trail or perhaps a big bad monster.
Old Text: Maybe there is even more treasure at the end of the golden trail or perhaps a big bad monster.
Old Translation: Maybe there is even more treasure at the end of the golden trail or perhaps a big bad monster.
New Translation: 或許在黃金路的盡頭會有更多寶藏，也或許是一隻大怪物唷。

Text: I think you're going to like this place, hunter!
Old Text: I think you're going to like this place, hunter!
Old Translation: I think you're going to like this place, hunter!
New Translation: 我覺得你會愛上這裡的，獵人！

Text: It has treasure, even more things to slay and a nice, colorful surprise at the end.
Old Text: It has treasure, even more things to slay and a nice, colorful surprise at the end.
Old Translation: It has treasure, even more things to slay and a nice, colorful surprise at the end.
New Translation: 裡面有寶藏、有肉靶，最後還有多采多姿的驚喜。

Text: <sinister>Or are you too scared to enter?<laughter>
Old Text: <sinister>Or are you too scared to enter?<laughter>
Old Translation: <sinister>Or are you too scared to enter?<laughter>

Text: Have you always been a hunter, Victor?
Old Text: Have you always been a hunter, Victor?
Old Translation: Have you always been a hunter, Victor?
New Translation: 你一直都在當獵人嗎，維克多？

Text: Doesn't it get old, doing the same things over and over - slaying monsters, looting chests, saving damsels?
Old Text: Doesn't it get old, doing the same things over and over - slaying monsters, looting chests, saving damsels?
Old Translation: Doesn't it get old, doing the same things over and over - slaying monsters, looting chests, saving damsels?
New Translation: 不覺得過時了嗎？一直重複做同樣的事──殺怪、打寶、救美女？

Text: Perhaps it is your time to try a new craft. Something exciting. Like... a pirate!
Old Text: Perhaps it is your time to try a new craft. Something exciting. Like... a pirate!
Old Translation: Perhaps it is your time to try a new craft. Something exciting. Like... a pirate!
New Translation: 或許你該考慮改行了。做點刺激的。比如說……當海盜！

Text: <singing>A pirate I was meant to be!
Old Text: <singing>A pirate I was meant to be!
Old Translation: <singing> A pirate I was meant to be!

Text: <singing>Trim the sails and roam the sea!
Old Text: <singing>Trim the sails and roam the sea!
Old Translation: <singing> Trim the sails and roam the sea!

Text: to the waters and the wild
Old Text: to the waters and the wild
Old Translation: to the waters and the wild

Text: with a faery, hand in hand,
Old Text: with a faery, hand in hand,
Old Translation: with a faery, hand in hand,

Text: for the world's more full of weeping
Old Text: for the world's more full of weeping
Old Translation: for the world's more full of weeping

Text: The woods are lovely, dark and deep,
Old Text: The woods are lovely, dark and deep,
Old Translation: The woods are lovely, dark and deep,

Text: But I have promises to keep,
Old Text: But I have promises to keep,
Old Translation: But I have promises to keep,

Text: And miles to go before I sleep,
Old Text: And miles to go before I sleep,
Old Translation: And miles to go before I sleep,

Text: And miles to go before I sleep.
Old Text: And miles to go before I sleep.
Old Translation: And miles to go before I sleep.

Text: Reach high, for stars lie hidden in your soul.
Old Text: Reach high, for stars lie hidden in your soul.
Old Translation: Reach high, for stars lie hidden in your soul.
New Translation: 目標要高，因為理想藏於心中。

Text: Dream deep, for every dream precedes the goal.
Old Text: Dream deep, for every dream precedes the goal.
Old Translation: Dream deep, for every dream precedes the goal.
New Translation: 夢想要深，因為有夢才有目標。

Text: The monsters just don’t belong here.
Old Text: The monsters just don’t belong here.
Old Translation: The monsters just don’t belong here.

Text: A hunter's job is often a grim and bloody affair.
Old Text: A hunter's job is often a grim and bloody affair.
Old Translation: A hunter's job is often a grim and bloody affair.
New Translation: 獵人的工作多半殘忍血腥。

Text: But every now and then you get a view like this.
Old Text: But every now and then you get a view like this.
Old Translation: But every now and then you get a view like this.
New Translation: 但有時還是會見到這樣的美景。

Text: Gives you a bit of perspective. Helps you remember what you're fighting for.
Old Text: Gives you a bit of perspective. Helps you remember what you're fighting for.
Old Translation: Gives you a bit of perspective. Helps you remember what you're fighting for.
New Translation: 讓你能轉換心境，想起奮鬥的目標。

Text: Beware that, when fighting monsters, you yourself do not become a monster...
Old Text: Beware that, when fighting monsters, you yourself do not become a monster...
Old Translation: Beware that, when fighting monsters, you yourself do not become a monster...
New Translation: 與怪物戰鬥之人，應當小心自己不要成為怪物……

Text: For when you gaze long into the abyss. The abyss gazes also into you.
Old Text: For when you gaze long into the abyss. The abyss gazes also into you.
Old Translation: For when you gaze long into the abyss. The abyss gazes also into you.
New Translation: 因為當你凝視深淵時，深淵也在凝視你。

Text: This spirit knows the burdens of those that hunt monsters. Perhaps he was a hunter long ago.
Old Text: The spirit knows the burdens of those that hunt monsters. Perhaps he was a hunter long time ago.
Old Translation: This spirit knows the burdens of those that hunt monsters. Perhaps he was a hunter long ago.
New Translation: 這個鬼魂竟然了解獵殺怪物所背負的重擔。也許祂以前是位獵人。

Text: This place bears the taint of undead.
Old Text: This place bears the taint of undead.
Old Translation: This place bears the taint of undead.
New Translation: 這裡被不死生物盤據了。

Text: The first time I faced a wraith I mistook it for an ordinary wandering spirit.
Old Text: The first time I faced a wraith I mistook it for an ordinary wandering spirit.
Old Translation: The first time I faced a wraith I mistook it for an ordinary wandering spirit.
New Translation: 我第一次碰見怨靈時，還誤以為是普通的遊魂。

Text: I still bear the scar from that mistake.
Old Text: I still bear the scar from that mistake.
Old Translation: I still bear the scar from that mistake.
New Translation: 我身上還留著當時的傷疤。

Text: Though they go mad they shall be sane.
Old Text: Though they go mad they shall be sane.
Old Translation: Though they go mad they shall be sane.
New Translation: 縱然他們發瘋必定還會清醒。

Text: Though they sink through the sea, they shall rise again.
Old Text: Though they sink through the sea, they shall rise again.
Old Translation: Though they sink through the sea, they shall rise again.
New Translation: 縱然他們溺沉必定還會浮起。

Text: Though lovers be lost, love shall not,
Old Text: Though lovers be lost, love shall not,
Old Translation: Though lovers be lost, love shall not,
New Translation: 縱然愛人會失去，愛卻不會，

Text: And death shall have no dominion.
Old Text: And death shall have no dominion.
Old Translation: And death shall have no dominion.

Text: The spirit is right. As long as the curse over Zagoravia remains, death will not claim these poor souls.
Old Text: The spirit is right. As long as the curse over Zagoravia remains, death will not claim these poor souls.
Old Translation: The spirit is right. As long as the curse over Zagoravia remains, death will not claim these poor souls.
New Translation: 鬼魂說得有道理。只要扎戈拉維亞的詛咒一日不除，死亡也無法帶走這些可憐的靈魂。

Text: They are bound to reform and rise as undead again and again.
Old Text: They are bound to reform and rise as undead again and again.
Old Translation: They are bound to reform and rise as undead again and again.
New Translation: 祂們會以不死之態不斷地站起。

Text: Welcome, welcome! This is my favorite place in Zagoravia. I call it "The cave of warm and fuzzy."
Old Text: Welcome, welcome! This is my favorite place in Zagoravia. I call it "The cave of warm and fuzzy."
Old Translation: Welcome, welcome! This is my favorite place in Zagoravia. I call it "The cave of warm and fuzzy."
New Translation: 歡迎，歡迎！這是我在扎戈拉維亞最喜歡的地方。我叫它「溫暖又舒服的小穴」。

Text: And what do we have here? This one looks special.
Old Text: And what do we have here? This one looks special.
Old Translation: And what do we have here? This one looks special.
New Translation: 看看是誰來啦？這傢伙看起來真特別。

Text: Ohh, they are multiplying. Aren't they cute?
Old Text: Ohh, they are multiplying. Aren't they cute?
Old Translation: Ohh, they are multiplying. Aren't they cute?
New Translation: 哦，它們正在分裂。不是很可愛嗎？

Text: Persistent, aren't you? If every time you kill one three more appear, this is bound to end up well for you.
Old Text: Persistent, aren't you? If every time you kill one of these guys three more appear, this is bound to end up well for you.
Old Translation: Persistent, aren't you? If every time you kill one three more appear, this is bound to end up well for you.
New Translation: 真頑強，不是嗎？每殺一隻就會分裂成三隻，你注定要死在這囉。

Text: You should consider retreating. Oh, you can't, can you?<laughter>
Old Text: You should consider retreating. Oh, you can't, can you?<laughter>
Old Translation: You should consider retreating. Oh, you can't, can you? <laughter>
New Translation: 你應該考慮撤退囉。哦，無路可退嗎？<laughter>

Text: Noooo! You slaughtered them all. Even the cute little ones... You MONSTER!
Old Text: Noooo! You slaughtered them all. Even the cute little ones... You MONSTER!
Old Translation: Noooo! You slaughtered them all. Even the cute little ones... You MONSTER!
New Translation: 不──！你把它們全殺了。就連小隻的你也殺……你這畜牲！

Text:
Forget about Irene. She was doomed the moment she set foot in this wretched land. Her beautiful body is now no more than worm food. I warned her and I am warning you: do not venture into the dark! 

Now, how can I help you in this foolish endeavor?

好了，你那愚蠢的努力，我該怎麼幫呢？

Text:
I always knew this city is a trap, Victor. But you got it wrong. It is not just a trap for hunters, it is a trap for every last one of us!

Now, did you plan your escape in advance as I did? No? Well then, what can I offer you today?
Section: Act1 151 (During Looking For Irene Quest) Alchemist why its not a trap for hunters

I always knew the city was a trap, Victor. But you got it wrong. It is not just a trap for hunters, it is a trap for every last one of us!

你有沒有像我一樣，事先做好了逃脫的準備呢？沒有？好吧，那我現在能為你提供什麼呢？

Text:
Seven stars in the still water,

And seven in the sky;

Seven sins on the King's daughter,

Deep in her soul to lie.

Old Text: I unsealed it many years ago to save myself from a mortal sickness.

Old Text: My skin withered, my hair started to fall, vile red pustules covered my entire body.

Old Text: For everyone, my complete and swift recovery was a miracle, yet I knew it was anything but.

Old Text: Gabriel was made Lord of Zagoravia.

Old Text: And all of Zagoravia paid the price that was mine to pay.
Old Translation: And all of Zagoravia paid the price that was mine to pay.
New Translation: 而整個扎戈拉維亞因此為我付出了代價。

New Translation: 接下來的故事你們都知道了。

Text:
This is my story, hunter. I doomed my kingdom. The demon invasion is my folly, the price of my pact with the dark powers.

So strike me down, end the curse, here and now! I am ready to pay for my sins.
Old Text:
This is my story, hunter. I doomed my kingdom. The demon invasion is my folly, the price of my pact with the dark powers.

So strike me down, end the curse, here and now! I am ready to pay for my sins.

This is my story, hunter. I doomed my kingdom. The demon invasion is my folly, the price of my pact with the dark powers.

So strike me down, end the curse, here and now! I am ready to pay for my sins.
New Translation:
這就是我的故事，獵人。我毀了我的王國。惡魔的侵略是我的愚蠢，與黑暗勢力簽下契約的代價。

所以，殺了我，結束這場詛咒吧！我願意為我的罪過付出代價。

Text:
The sins of a scared, dying young girl... Your death will not annul the pact, Katarina. One evil never cancels another.

We have all done things we regret. At least you had the courage to stand and face the consequences.
Old Text:
The sins of a scared, dying young girl... Your death will not annul the pact, Katarina. One evil never cancels another.

We have all done things we regret. At least you had the courage to stand and face the consequences.

The sins of a scared, dying young girl... Your death will not annul the pact, Katarina. One evil never cancels another.

We have all done things we regret. At least you had the courage to stand and face the consequences.
New Translation:
驚慌、垂死的小女孩所犯的錯……您的死不會解除契約的，卡特蓮娜。邪惡是不會相互抵銷的。

每個人都有自己後悔的事，至少您有勇氣承擔後果。

Text: So, what do you plan to do Victor Vran?
Old Text: What do you plan to do then, Victor Vran?
Old Translation: So, what do you plan to do Victor Vran?
New Translation: 那你打算怎麼做，維克多．弗蘭？

Text: Borimir knew of your dark pact, Your Majesty. An ancient spirit is a confused being, but he might find some clarity at the place of his passing. We can learn more from him there.
Old Text: Borimir knew of your dark pact, Your Majesty. An ancient spirit is a confused being, but he might find some clarity at the place of his passing. We can learn more from him there.
Old Translation: Borimir knew of your dark pact, Your Majesty. An ancient spirit is a confused being, but he might find some clarity at the place of his passing. We can learn more from him there.
New Translation: 波利密爾知道您的黑暗契約，女王陛下。雖然古老鬼魂有點神智不清，但祂或許能在自己的逝世之地找回一些神智。我們可以從祂那裡知道更多訊息。

Text:
We do not know where the old Tzar perished but we can point you in the right direction. The Volkovs' were the keepers of the annals of Zagoravia since the city's founding.

The whole family perished in the invasion but hopefully the archive is still intact in their home in the High Quarter.
Old Text:
We do not know where the old Tzar perished but we can point you in the right direction. The Volkovs house has been the keeper of the annals of Zagoravia since the city's founding.

The whole family perished in the invasion but hopefully the archive is still intact in their home in the High Quarter.

We do not know where the old Tzar perished but we can point you in the right direction. The Volkovs' were the keepers of the annals of Zagoravia since the city's founding.

The whole family perished in the invasion but hopefully the archive is still intact in their home in the High Quarter.
New Translation:
我們不知道老沙皇是在哪裡逝世的，但可以給你一個方向。沃卡夫家族自建城以來一直是扎戈拉維亞史冊的保管者。

他們整個家族都在惡魔入侵時喪生了，但希望在他們貴族區家中的文獻庫沒有受到破壞。

Text: I admit, I'm surprised, Vran. You did a noble thing going out there to look for Irene. I didn't expect a hunter to risk his life without some sort of reward.

Old Translation: I admit, I'm surprised, Vran. You did a noble thing going out there to look for Irene. I didn't expect a hunter to risk his life without some sort of reward.
New Translation: 不得不說，我很驚訝，弗蘭。你做了一件高尚的事，親身犯險去尋找艾琳。沒想到獵人也有無私的一面。

Text:
It was the Queen all along!

<angrily>A year I was looking for the cause of the curse and it was under my nose the whole time!
Section: Act1 23 Irene's story after she learns of the Queens guilt
Old Text:
It was the Queen all along!

<angrily>One year I was looking for the cause of the curse and it was under my nose the whole time!

<angrily>我花了一年去尋找詛咒的原因，沒想到答案一直就在我的眼前！

Text: We couldn't have known without the spirit's help. You couldn't have foreseen this.
Section: Act1 23 Irene's story after she learns of the Queens guilt
Old Text: We couldn't have known without the spirit's help. You couldn't have foreseen this.
Old Translation: We couldn't have known without the spirit's help. You couldn't have foreseen this.
New Translation: 如果沒有那位鬼魂的幫忙，我們也無法得知真相。妳不可能預料得到的。

Text: You don't understand! I thought... I thought I was responsible for all of it.
Section: Act1 23 Irene's story after she learns of the Queens guilt
Old Text: You don't understand! I thought... I thought I was responsible for all of it.
Old Translation: You don't understand! I thought... I thought I was responsible for all of it.
New Translation: 你根本不明白！我以為……我以為這一切都是因我而起。

Text:
A year ago I arrived here chasing a sect of demon worshipers. I tracked them to their lair and killed them as they were performing a malevolent ritual.

On the following night the demons attacked and it all began. I thought it was all my fault.
Section: Act1 23 Irene's story after she learns of the Queens guilt
Old Text:
A year ago I arrived here chasing a sect of demon worshipers. I tracked them to their lair and killed them as they were performing a malevolent ritual.

On the following night the demons attacked and it all began. I thought it was all my fault.

A year ago I arrived here chasing a sect of demon worshipers. I tracked them to their lair and killed them as they were performing a malevolent ritual.

On the following night the demons attacked and it all began. I thought it was all my fault.

一年前我來到這裡追捕一群惡魔教徒。我跟蹤他們到巢穴，趁他們在舉行邪惡儀式時把他們一舉殲滅。

結果隔天晚上，惡魔就開始侵襲了。我一直以為都是我的錯。

Text: One year I've been trying to fix this. Many times I thought of abandoning this cursed city, but I was never able to leave.
Section: Act1 23 Irene's story after she learns of the Queens guilt
Old Text: One year I've been trying to fix this. Many times I thought of leaving this cursed city, but I was never able to...

Text:
As if something was keeping you tied to this place, preventing you from running.

I think many of our fallen brethren felt this way. That is why Zagoravia is such an effective trap.

Old Text:
...as if something was keeping you tied to this place, preventing you from running.

我想我們的許多兄弟都有類似的想法。因此扎戈拉維亞成為了非常有效的陷阱。

Text: Don't dwell on it, Irene. Now that we know about the Queen's dark pact, we know the root of the curse. Now we can unravel the mystery of Zagoravia.

Text:
A hunter survives on skill above all, but good gear makes our job easier.

Frankly, your current equipment is mediocre at best. Take a look at some of my special weapons. I could be persuaded to part with them for the right price.
