獵人主要靠技巧存活，但好的裝備讓任務更輕鬆。

坦白說，你手上的裝備實在是平庸至極。來看看我的特殊武器吧。只要價錢合適，我可以忍痛割愛。

Text: <sarcastic>Have I told you how much I admire your hat, Victor?
Old Text: <sarcastic>Have I told you how much I admire your hat, Victor?
Old Translation: <sarcastic> Have I told you how much I admire your hat, Victor?
New Translation: <sarcastic>我是否說過我很欣賞你的帽子，維克多？

Text: It goes well with your clothes; it is distinctive and flashy, yet not entirely ridiculous.
Old Text: It goes well with your clothes; it is distinctive and flashy, yet not entirely ridiculous.
Old Translation: It goes well with your clothes; it is distinctive and flashy, yet not entirely ridiculous.
New Translation: 它與你的服裝簡直絕配；獨特鮮明，又不譁眾取寵。

Text: If I was a tough and dandy person I would've picked a hat exactly like yours.
Old Text: If I was a badass dandy person I would've picked a hat exactly like yours.
Old Translation: If I was a tough and dandy person I would've picked a hat exactly like yours.
New Translation: 如果我是雅痞猛男，我絕對會選擇跟你一樣的帽子。

Text: A man walks down the street with a hat like that; you know he's not afraid of anything.<laughter>
Old Text: A man walks down the street with a hat like that; you know he's not afraid of anything.<laughter>
Old Translation: A man walks down the street with a hat like that; you know he's not afraid of anything. <laughter>
New Translation: 敢戴這種帽子走在街上的男人；你知道的，絕對是無所畏懼。<laughter>

Text: And so, the brave hunter vanquished the horrifying beasts, all thanks to his fabulous hat.
Old Text: And so, the brave hunter vanquished the horrifying beasts, all thanks to his fabulous hat.
Old Translation: And so, the brave hunter vanquished the horrifying beasts, all thanks to his fabulous hat.
New Translation: 於是，勇敢的獵人擊敗了恐怖的野獸，全歸功於他超屌的帽子。

Text: Have you thought about adopting your own vigilante nickname, Victor?
Old Text: Have you thought about adopting your own vigilante nickname, Victor?
Old Translation: Have you thought about adopting your own vigilante nickname, Victor?
New Translation: 你有想過給自己取個稱號嗎，維克多？

Text: Something like... "Hatman"! Because of your awesome hat.
Old Text: Something like... "Hatman"! Because of your awesomesauce hat.
Old Translation: Something like... "Hatman"! Because of your awesome hat.
New Translation: 比如說……「屌帽俠」！因為你的帽子超屌。

Text: Hat-man. Hatman. Hatman! It just rolls off your tongue.
Old Text: Hat-man. Hatman. Hatman! It just rolls off your tongue.
Old Translation: Hat-man. Hatman. Hatman! It just rolls off your tongue.
New Translation: 屌帽男，屌帽人，屌帽俠！太順口了。
打倒那些石像鬼吧，屌帽俠！

Text: Go ahead, touch that pumpkin. I dare you!
Old Text: Go ahead, touch that pumpkin. I dare you!
Old Translation: Go ahead, touch that pumpkin. I dare you!
New Translation: 上啊，我賭你不敢碰那個南瓜！

Text: Come on, touch it. What's the worst that can happen?
Old Text: Come on, touch it. What's the worst that can happen?
Old Translation: Come on, touch it. What's the worst that can happen?
New Translation: 快啊，碰碰看。還能發生什麼更糟的嗎？

Text: No matter, I am sure you can deal with a single pumpkin.
Old Text: No matter, I am sure you can deal with a single pumpkin.
Old Translation: No matter, I am sure you can deal with a single pumpkin.
New Translation: 不要緊，我相信你可以對付區區一顆南瓜的。

Text: And once again, the man with the distinctive hat has emerged victorious!
Old Text: And once again, the man with the distinctive hat has emerged victorious!
Old Translation: And once again, the man with the distinctive hat has emerged victorious!
New Translation: 再一次，戴著獨特帽子的男人又獲得了勝利！

Text: The pumpkin lies defeated and ready to be cooked into a yummy-scrummy pumpkin pie.
Old Text: The pumpkin lies defeated and ready to be cooked into a yummy-scrummy pumpkin pie.
Old Translation: The pumpkin lies defeated and ready to be cooked into a yummy-scrummy pumpkin pie.
New Translation: 南瓜被擊敗了，準備被做成美味可口的南瓜派了。

Text: Ooh, some circus freaks. Perhaps they want to be friends?
Old Text: Ooh, some circus freaks. Perhaps they want to be friends?
Old Translation: Ooh, some circus freaks. Perhaps they want to be friends?
New Translation: 哦，幾個馬戲團怪胎。或許它們是想交朋友？

Text: Made it ma, top of the world!<laughter>
Old Text: Made it ma, top of the world!<laughter>
Old Translation: Made it ma, top of the world! <laughter>

Text: Listen to me, Victor, I'm about to tell you something very important.
Old Text: Listen to me, Victor, I will tell you something very important.
Old Translation: Listen to me, Victor, I'm about to tell you something very important.
New Translation: 聽我說，維克多，我要告訴你一件非常重要的事。

Text: Wait, this can't be right... All my children were daughters.
Old Text: Wait, this can't be right... All my children were daughters.
Old Translation: Wait, this can't be right... All my children were daughters.
New Translation: 等等，不太對……我的孩子全是女孩。

Text: In any case, I feel an intimate connection to you, Victor.
Old Text: In any case, I feel an intimate connection to you, Victor.
Old Translation: In any case, I feel an intimate connection to you, Victor.
New Translation: 不管怎樣，我感覺到我和你有著親密的連結，維克多。

Text: Perhaps I am your grandfather? Uncle? Second cousin twice removed?
Old Text: Perhaps I am your grandfather? Uncle? Second cousin twice removed?
Old Translation: Perhaps I am your grandfather? Uncle? Second cousin twice removed?
New Translation: 或許我是你的祖父？舅舅？遠房表叔？

Text: Let's just say you are the son I always wanted.<laughter>
Old Text: Let's just say you are the son I always wanted.<laughter>
Old Translation: Let's just say you are the son I always wanted. <laughter>
New Translation: 就當作你是我日以繼盼的兒子好了。<laughter>

Text: My, my, now this is interesting. Quite the longshot this plan of yours, isn't it?
Old Text: My, my, now this is interesting. Quite the longshot this plan of yours, isn't it?
Old Translation: My, my, now this is interesting. Quite the longshot this plan of yours, isn't it?
New Translation: 哎呀呀，越來越有趣了。你那計畫希望渺茫啊，不是嗎？

Text: Find a ghost and make it part with its secrets. And the Volkovs... Oh, I think you know all too well that name, don't you, my dear?
Old Text: Find a ghost and make it part with its secrets.
Old Translation: Find a ghost and make it part with its secrets.
New Translation: 找到鬼魂並讓祂說出祕密。還有沃卡夫……噢，我想你對那名字再熟悉不過了，不是嗎？

Text: Queen Katarina was right when she suggested that I search the Volkovs mansion for the information we need.
Old Text: Queen Katarina was right when she suggested that I search the Volkovs mansion for the information we need.
Old Translation: Queen Katarina was right when she suggested that I search the Volkovs mansion for the information we need.
New Translation: 卡特蓮娜女王的想法是對的，她建議我到沃卡夫府邸搜索需要的資訊。
沃卡夫──扎戈拉維亞史冊的保管者？

Text: Indeed they possess a treasure trove of written knowledge, but for far less benevolent reasons than the queen believes.
Old Text: Indeed they possess a treasure trove of written knowledge, but for far less benevolent reasons than the queen believes.
Old Translation: Indeed they possess a treasure trove of written knowledge, but for far less benevolent reasons than the queen believes.
New Translation: 確實，他們擁有文字記載的知識寶庫，但他們的目的跟女王認知的善行相去甚遠。

Text: Through manipulation and blackmailing, the Volkovs family name is known for having extreme influence in the kingdom and the protection of the crown.
Old Text: Through manipulation and blackmailing, the Volkovs family name is known for having extreme influence in the kingdom and the protection of the crown.
Old Translation: Through manipulation and blackmailing, the Volkovs family name is known for having extreme influence in the kingdom and the protection of the crown.
New Translation: 透過權謀和脅迫，沃卡夫家族在王國內因極大權勢和保護王室而眾所周知。

Text: In the hunters' circles though, they are known for hoarding priceless knowledge and forbidden rituals for sinister purposes.
Old Text: In the hunters' circles though, they are known for hoarding priceless knowledge and forbidden rituals for sinister purposes.
Old Translation: In the hunters' circles though, they are known for hoarding priceless knowledge and forbidden rituals for sinister purposes.
New Translation: 但在獵人的圈子裡，他們則因邪惡的目的收集無價的知識和禁術而出名。

Text: Ah, the residence of the late Lord Valeri.
Section: Act2 02 Banter Rich Quarter - Small House
Old Text: Ah, the residence of the late Lord Valeri.
Old Translation: Ah, the residence of the late Lord Valeri.
New Translation: 啊，已故的瓦勒里勳爵的大宅。

Text: He always threw the most exquisite parties. Lovely blood soup, superb black pudding.
Section: Act2 02 Banter Rich Quarter - Small House
Old Text: He always threw the most exquisite parties. Lovely blood soup, superb black pudding.
Old Translation: He always threw the most exquisite parties. Lovely blood soup, superb black pudding.
New Translation: 他老是舉辦精緻的派對。迷人的血湯，超讚的黑布丁。

Text: <sinister>His cook truly had an excellent taste.
Section: Act2 02 Banter Rich Quarter - Small House
Old Text: <sinister>His cook truly had an excellent taste.
Old Translation: <sinister> His cook truly had an excellent taste.

Text: It is said that once a piece of information falls into the hands of the Volkovs it forever remains theirs. All other bearers of said knowledge are rumored to wither and disappear.
Old Text: It is said that once a piece of information falls into the hands of the Volkovs it forever remains theirs. All other bearers of said knowledge are rumored to wither and disappear.
Old Translation: It is said that once a piece of information falls into the hands of the Volkovs it forever remains theirs. All other bearers of said knowledge are rumored to wither and disappear.
New Translation: 據說任何消息一旦落入沃卡夫家族手中，就會石沉大海了。謠傳凡是得知相關消息的人全消失了。

Text: The Volkovs are Vampires... that explains a lot.
Old Text: The Volkovs are Vampires... that explains a lot.
Old Translation: The Volkovs are Vampires... that explains a lot.
New Translation: 沃卡夫家族都是吸血鬼……這下我就明白了。

Text: It says here King Borimir fell to a conspiracy of envious nobles and was poisoned.
Old Text: It says here King Borimir fell to a conspiracy of envious nobles and was poisoned.
Old Translation: It says here King Borimir fell to a conspiracy of envious nobles and was poisoned.
New Translation: 這裡說波利密爾沙皇掉入嫉妒貴族的陰謀中，被毒殺了。

Text: This happened in an old chapel that should be somewhere in the Onion Quarter, the poorest part of the city these days.
Old Text: This happened in an old chapel that should be somewhere in the Onion Quarter, the poorest part of the city these days.
Old Translation: This happened in an old chapel that should be somewhere in the Onion Quarter, the poorest part of the city these days.
New Translation: 事情發生在一棟老舊的教堂裡，應該是在洋蔥區的某處，現今城市最貧困的地區。

Text: So much for the Volkovs clan I guess, at least in Zagoravia.
Old Text: So much for the Volkovs clan I guess, at least in Zagoravia.
Old Translation: So much for the Volkovs clan I guess, at least in Zagoravia.
New Translation: 我想沃卡夫家族到此玩完了，至少在扎戈拉維亞。

Text: You DO know they have footholds in quite a few cities, right?
Old Text: You DO know they have footholds in quite a few cities, right?
Old Translation: You DO know they has footholds in quite a few cities, right?
New Translation: 你知道他們在不少城市都有據點，對吧？

Text: Perhaps one day you will meet again.
Old Text: Perhaps one day you will meet again.
Old Translation: Perhaps one day you will meet again.

Text: It may be raining down there, Victor, but up here in heaven the sun shines all over the place!
Old Text: It may be raining down there, Victor, but up here in heaven the sun shines all over the place!
Old Translation: It may be raining down there, Victor, but up here in heaven the sun shines all over the place!
New Translation: 下界可能正在下雨，維克多，但天堂這裡可是陽光普照啊！

Text: Don't worry, I am not your god.
Old Text: Don't worry, I am not your god.
Old Translation: Don't worry, I am not your god.

Text: I am what god wants to become.<laughter>
Old Text: I am what god wants to become.<laughter>
Old Translation: I am what god wants to become. <laughter>

Text: And now for something completely different...
Old Text: And now for something completely different...
Old Translation: And now for something completely different...

New Translation: 是時候來點原質體驗了！

Text: You seem fascinated by the macabre, Victor.
Old Text: You seem fascinated by the macabre, Victor.
Old Translation: You seem fascinated by the macabre, Victor.
New Translation: 你似乎被死亡迷住了，維克多。

Text: It disturbs me to watch you like that, always so enthusiastic to enter a new cemetery or crypt.
Old Text: It disturbs me to watch you like that, always so enthusiastic to enter a new cemetery or crypt.
Old Translation: It disturbs me to watch you like that, always so enthusiastic to enter a new cemetery or crypt.
New Translation: 看你如此著迷使我感到不安啊，總是這麼興致高昂地踏入新墓地或墓窖。

Text: You'll get there, Victor. You'll get there.
Old Text: You'll get there, Victor. You'll get there.
Old Translation: You'll get there, Victor. You'll get there.
New Translation: 你會達到的，維克多，你會的。

Text: An ancient being roams the corridors of the Mausoleum. He is knowledgeable and powerful but I'm afraid he dislikes guests.
Old Text: An ancient being roams the corridors of the Mausoleum. He is knowledgeable and powerful but I'm afraid he dislikes guests.
Old Translation: An ancient being roams the corridors of the Mausoleum. He is knowledgeable and powerful but I'm afraid he dislikes guests.
New Translation: 有個古老生物在陵墓的走廊遊蕩。祂知識淵博、力量強大，但祂恐怕不喜歡客人。

Text: Come on, Victor, I dare you enter. You're not afraid, are you?
Old Text: Come on, Victor, I dare you enter. You're not afraid, are you?
Old Translation: Come on, Victor, I dare you enter. You're not afraid, are you?
New Translation: 來吧，維克多，我賭你不敢進去。你不是不怕嗎？

Text: Victor, I want you to meet the Broker!
Old Text: Victor, I want you to meet the Broker!
Old Translation: Victor, I want you to meet the Broker!
New Translation: 維克多，我要你見見仲介商！

Text: He has some steaming-hot promotions for you. Go ahead, talk to him!
Old Text: He has some steaming-hot promotions for you. Go ahead, talk to him!
Old Translation: He has some steaming-hot promotions for you. Go ahead, talk to him!
New Translation: 祂那有剛出爐的促銷等著你。去吧，和祂說話！

Text: I'm glad I'm finally out of this gloomy place.
Old Text: I'm glad I'm finally out of this gloomy place.
Old Translation: I'm glad I'm finally out of this gloomy place.
New Translation: 很高興終於能離開這個陰鬱的地方了。

Text: Nonsense, Victor! Zagoravia is so beautiful at this time of the year - and our tour has just begun!
Old Text: Nonsense, Victor! Zagoravia is so beautiful in this time of the year - and our tour has just began!
Old Translation: Nonsense, Victor! Zagoravia is so beautiful at this time of the year - and our tour has just begun!
New Translation: 胡扯，維克多！扎戈拉維亞每年的這個時候最美──而且我們的旅程才剛剛開始！

Text: Something is attacking me from above.
Old Text: Something is attacking me from above.
Old Translation: Something is attacking me from above.
New Translation: 有東西正從上方攻擊我。

Text: I could use this to my advantage.
Old Text: I could use this to my advantage.
Old Translation: I could use this to my advantage.

Text: Careful, those monsters may be too tough for you.
Old Text: Careful, those monsters may be too tough for you.
Old Translation: Careful, those monsters may be too tough for you.
New Translation: 小心，那些怪物對你來說可能太強了。

Text: <laughter>That wasn't fair to you, Victor. You are a big, strong hunter with such a fabulous hat.
Old Text: <laughter>That wasn't fair to you, Victor. You are a big, strong hunter with such a fabulous hat.
Old Translation: <laughter> That wasn't fair to you, Victor. You are a big, strong hunter with such a fabulous hat.
New Translation: <laughter>這樣對你不公平，維克多。你是個高大威武、帶著超屌帽子的獵人耶。

Text: You could've taken those by yourself, I am sure of it.
Old Text: You could've taken those by yourself, I am sure of it. NI!
Old Translation: You could've taken those by yourself, I am sure of it. NI!
New Translation: 你自己就可以搞定的，我很確定。

Text: Bravo, hunter! You have found a chest full of trash!
Old Text: Bravo, hunter! You have found a chest full of trash!
Old Translation: Bravo, hunter! You have found a chest full of trash!
New Translation: 幹得好，獵人！你找到了一個裝滿垃圾的寶箱！

Text: Let's play a little game, shall we? I bet you can't find four more chests hidden around here.
Old Text: Let's play a little game, shall we? I bet you cannot find four more chests hidden around here.
Old Translation: Let's play a little game, shall we? I bet you can't find four more chests hidden around here.
New Translation: 咱們來玩個小遊戲吧？我賭你找不到藏在這附近的其餘四個寶箱。

Text: That makes two chests found, three to go.
Old Text: That makes two chests found, three to go.
Old Translation: That makes two chests found, three to go.
New Translation: 找到兩個寶箱了，還剩三個。

Text: I'll bake you some pumpkin pie if you find them all.
Old Text: I'll bake you some pumpkin pie if you find them all.
Old Translation: I'll bake you some pumpkin pie if you find them all.
New Translation: 如果你全找到了，我就給你烤些南瓜派。

Text: Three! You really want that yummy scrummy pumpkin pie, don't you?
Old Text: Three! You really want that yummy scrummy pumpkin pie, don't you?
Old Translation: Three! You really want that yummy scrummy pumpkin pie, don't you?
New Translation: 三個！你就這麼想要美味可口的南瓜派，是嗎？

Text: <sinister>It's my speciality. People would just DIE to taste it.<laughter>
Old Text: <sinister>It's my specialty. People would just DIE to taste it.<laughter>
Old Translation: <sinister>It's my speciality. People would just DIE to taste it.<laughter>
New Translation: <sinister>那是我特製的。一般人嘗一口就掛了。<laughter>

Text: You are almost there, Victor! Just find the fifth chest and there will be pie!
Old Text: You are almost there, Victor! Just find the fifth chest and there will be pie!
Old Translation: You are almost there, Victor! Just find the fifth chest and there will be pie!
New Translation: 你快成功了，維克多！只差找到第五個寶箱就有派吃了！

Text: My pie is not a lie.
Old Text: My pie is not a lie.
Old Translation: My pie is not a lie.

Text: <sinister>It is just as tasty and real as you are.
Old Text: <sinister>It is just as tasty and real as you are.
Old Translation: <sinister> It is just as tasty and real as you are.

Text: You want your delicious pumpkin pie, don't you, hunter?
Old Text: You want your delicious pumpkin pie, don't you, hunter?
Old Translation: You want your delicious pumpkin pie, don't you, hunter?
New Translation: 你想要美味的南瓜派，不是嗎？獵人。

Text: I have some bad news - you won't get it!
Old Text: I have some bad news - you won't get it!
Old Translation: I have some bad news - you won't get it!
New Translation: 我有個壞消息──你得不到了！

Text: Turns out a rampaging maniac smashed each and every pumpkin in the city.
Old Text: Turns out a rampaging maniac smashed each and every pumpkin in the city.
Old Translation: Turns out a rampaging maniac smashed each and every pumpkin in the city.
New Translation: 冒出一個胡鬧的瘋子把城裡的所有南瓜砸爛了。

Text: Who would attack some harmless pumpkins, I wonder?
Old Text: Who would attack some harmless pumpkins, I wonder?
Old Translation: Who would attack some harmless pumpkins, I wonder?
New Translation: 我想不透，誰會攻擊無害的南瓜呢？

Text: Another thrall ambush. I'd wager their vampire lord wants to keep me away from something nearby.
Old Text: Another thrall ambush. I'd wager their vampire lord wants to keep me away from something nearby.
Old Translation: Another thrall ambush. I'd wager their vampire lord wants to keep me away from something nearby.
New Translation: 又是死徒的埋伏。我敢說它們的吸血鬼主人想讓我遠離附近的東西。

Text: Don't be so prejudiced, Victor! I'm sure the vampires would be glad to have you for dinner!
Old Text: Don't be so prejudiced, Victor! I'm sure the vampires would be glad to have you for dinner!
Old Translation: Don't be so prejudiced, Victor! I'm sure the vampires would be glad to have you for dinner!
New Translation: 別心存偏見，維克多！我確定吸血鬼們會很高興把你當晚餐吃掉！

Text: The poorest of the poor lived here. In the end this may have been an advantage for them.
Old Text: The poorest of the poor lived here. This may have been an advantage for them.
Old Translation: The poorest of the poor lived here. In the end this may have been an advantage for them.
New Translation: 這裡住的是最窮的窮人。結果這可能反倒救了他們。

Text: Poverty turns people into survivors. Maybe some of the denizens of the slums escaped death.
Old Text: Poverty turns people into survivors. Maybe some of the denizens of the slums escaped death.
Old Translation: Poverty turns people into survivors. Maybe some of the denizens of the slums escaped death.
New Translation: 貧窮讓他們成了倖存者。或許有一部分貧民窟的居民逃過了一劫。

Text: Behold! The Lord of the Pumpkins that explode!
Old Text: Behold! The Lord of the Pumpkins that explode!
Old Translation: Behold! The Lord of the Pumpkins that explode!
New Translation: 看啊！會爆炸的南瓜領主！

Text: Mind you, he might be a bit angry at you. He knows how much you hate pumpkins.
Old Text: Mind you, he might be a bit angry at you. He knows how much you hate pumpkins.
Old Translation: Mind you, he might be a bit angry at you. He knows how much you hate pumpkins.
New Translation: 提醒你一下，祂可能對你有點生氣了。祂知道你很討厭南瓜。

Text: Ah, the Scyther in the Rye - the young man lost his mind after his fatally sick mother jumped off a cliff.
Old Text: Ah, the Scyther in the Rye - the young man lost his mind after his fatally sick mother jumped off a cliff.
Old Translation: Ah, the Scyther in the Rye - the young man lost his mind after his fatally sick mother jumped off a cliff.
New Translation: 啊，麥田鐮刀手──這個年輕人在祂絕症的母親跳崖後，喪失了理智。

Text: He literally worked himself to death, yet he still wasn't able to afford to buy her medicine.
Old Text: He literally worked himself to death, yet he still wasn't able to afford to buy her medicine.
Old Translation: He literally worked himself to death, yet he still wasn't able to afford to buy her medicine.
New Translation: 從前祂累得要死要活，但仍然買不起母親的藥。
啊～又一段感人的扎戈拉維亞故事！

Text: Hey! Hey! I saw a survivor over there - quickly, up the hill!
Old Text: Hey! Hey! I saw a survivor over there - quickly, up the hill!
Old Translation: Hey! Hey! I saw a survivor over there - quickly, up the hill!
New Translation: 喂！喂！我看到那裡有個生還者──快呀，在山上！

Text: Oh, I'm sorry, just an undead.
Old Text: Oh, I'm sorry, just an undead.
Old Translation: Oh, I'm sorry, just an undead.

Text: It is difficult to distinguish the starved citizens of the Onion Quarter from walking skeletons.
Old Text: It is difficult to distinguish the starved citizens of the Onion Quarter from walking skeletons.
Old Translation: It is difficult to distinguish the starved citizens of the Onion Quarter from walking skeletons.
New Translation: 那些洋蔥區的挨餓居民和走動的骷髏還真難區別。

Text: Victor, while you've been busy I took my time reading some of these epitaphs.
Old Text: Victor, while you've been busy I took my time reading some of these epitaphs.
Old Translation: Victor, while you've been busy I took my time reading some of these epitaphs.
New Translation: 維克多，趁你忙的時候我花了點時間讀了這些碑文。

Text: Hear this one, it's quite amusing: "Here lies my wife, a harlot and a shrew. If I said I missed her, I should lie too."<laughter>
Old Text: Hear this one, it's quite amusing: "Here lies my wife, a harlot and a shrew. If I said I missed her, I should lie too."<laughter>
Old Translation: Hear this one, it's quite amusing: "Here lies my wife, a harlot and a shrew. If I said I missed her, I should lie too." <laughter>
New Translation: 你看這段，超好笑的：「這裡躺著我的妻子，一個潑婦淫娃。如果我說想她，我應該在說謊。」<laughter>

Text: Or this tombstone: "Vasiliy Dough. Pardon me for not rising."
Old Text: Or this tombstone: "Vasiliy Dough. Pardon me for not rising."
Old Translation: Or this tombstone: "Vasiliy Dough. Pardon me for not rising."
New Translation: 或是這段：「瓦西里．布舉。請恕我起不來了。」

Text: But this one is the best: "Don't gloat. You are next!" Short and sweet, isn't it, Victor?
Old Text: But this one is the best: "Don't gloat. You are next!" Short and sweet, isn't it, Victor?
Old Translation: But this one is the best: "Don't gloat. You are next!" Short and sweet, isn't it, Victor?
New Translation: 但最棒的是這段：「別幸災樂禍。你就是下一個！」簡單明瞭，不是嗎，維克多？

Text: Welcome to the Onion Quarter! Let me show you the sights.
Old Text: Welcome to the Onion Quarter! Let me show you the sights.
Old Translation: Welcome to the Onion Quarter! Let me show you the sights.
New Translation: 歡迎來到洋蔥區！讓我給你介紹一下。

Text: To your left you can see the magnificent slum inhabited by the deprived workers who built the city with their sweat and blood.
Old Text: To your left you can see the magnificent slum inhabited by the deprived workers who built the city with their sweat and blood.
Old Translation: To your left you can see the magnificent slum inhabited by the deprived workers who built the city with their sweat and blood.
New Translation: 在你的左邊，你可以看到雄偉的貧民窟，裡面住著窮困的工人們，他們以血汗築起了這座城市。

Text: Is that what you're fighting for, Victor?
Old Text: Is that what you're fighting for, Victor?
Old Translation: Is that what you're fighting for, Victor?
New Translation: 這就是你為之奮戰的東西嗎，維克多？

Text: <concerned>Isn't there a way to persuade you not to do this, Victor?
Old Text: <concerned>Isn't there a way to persuade you not to do this, Victor?
Old Translation: <concerned> Isn't there a way to persuade you not to do this, Victor?
New Translation: <concerned>有沒有辦法說服你不要那樣做，維克多？

Text: <mocking>It could be very, very dangerous…and I've grown to be quite fond of you.
Old Text: <mocking>It could be very, very dangerous…and I grew to be quite fond of you.
Old Translation: <mocking>It could be very, very dangerous…and I've grown to be quite fond of you.
New Translation: <mocking>那可能會非常、非常危險……我越來越喜歡你了。

Text: Between two worlds life hovers like a star, twixt night and morn, upon the horizon's verge.
Old Text: Between two worlds life hovers like a star, twixt night and morn, upon the horizon's verge.
Old Translation: Between two worlds life hovers like a star, twixt night and morn, upon the horizon's verge.
New Translation: 生命於兩界之間盤旋，如星於天際晨昏交替。

Text: <laughter>The ghostly Tzar found his death here, you know.
Old Text: <laughter>The ghostly Tzar found his death here, you know.
Old Translation: <laughter> The ghostly Tzar found his death here, you know.
New Translation: <laughter>幽靈沙皇發現祂的逝世之地了。
不知道你會發現什麼呢。<laughter>

Text: Lots of valuable goods stashed in this place.
Old Text: Lots of valuable goods stashed in this place.
Old Translation: Lots of valuable goods stashed in this place.
New Translation: 大量貴重物品被存放在這個地方。

Text: This was probably a safehouse for the local criminals.
Old Text: This probably was a safehouse of the local criminals.
Old Translation: This was probably a safehouse for the local criminals.
New Translation: 這裡可能曾是當地罪犯的藏匿處。

Text: Funny word - safehouse. No safe place in this city.
Old Text: Funny word - safehouse. No safe place in this city.
Old Translation: Funny word - safehouse. No safe place in this city.
New Translation: 真可笑，藏匿處。這座城市根本無處可藏。

Text: <sarcastic>You love spiders, don't you, Victor? I think she likes you as well.
Old Text: <sarcastic>You love spiders, don't you, Victor? I think she likes you as well.
Old Translation: <sarcastic> You love spiders, don't you, Victor? I think she likes you as well.
New Translation: <sarcastic>你喜歡蜘蛛，對吧，維克多？我覺得她也喜歡你。

Text: Perhaps you should put down your weapon and embrace her.
Old Text: Perhaps you should put down your weapon and embrace her.
Old Translation: Perhaps you should put down your weapon and embrace her.
New Translation: 或許你應該放下武器去擁抱她。

Text: What a tragic end to such a beautiful love story.
Old Text: What a tragic end to such a beautiful love story.
Old Translation: What a tragic end to such a beautiful love story.
New Translation: 美麗的愛情故事竟是如此悲慘的結局。

Text: Alas, these times of woe afford no time to woo.
Old Text: Alas, these times of woe afford no time to woo.
Old Translation: Alas, these times of woe afford no time to woo.
New Translation: 唉，在這悲傷的時刻也不便求婚。

Text: The fungi in Zagoravia do not usually glow in the dark.
Old Text: The fungi in Zagoravia do not usually grow in the dark.
Old Translation: The fungi in Zagoravia do not usually glow in the dark.
New Translation: 扎戈拉維亞的真菌通常不會在黑暗中發光。

Text: It looks like those have been tainted by otherworldly energies as well.
Old Text: It looks like those have been tainted by otherworldly energies as well.
Old Translation: It looks like those have been tainted by otherworldly energies as well.
New Translation: 看來這些東西也被異界的能量污染了。

Text: This chap was far scarier when he was alive.
Old Text: This bloke was way scarier when he was alive.
Old Translation: This chap was far scarier when he was alive.
New Translation: 這傢伙活著的時候更嚇人。

Text: He was a mime by trade. Believe me, death is an improvement.
Old Text: He was a mime by trade. Believe me, death is an improvement.
Old Translation: He was a mime by trade. Believe me, death is an improvement.
New Translation: 它以前是默劇演員。相信我，死亡是一種進步。

Text: What? Are we right back where we started?
Old Text: What? Are we right back where we started?
Old Translation: What? Are we right back where we started?

Text: That can't be right. Go and make another lap around the cave!
Old Text: That can't be right. Go and make another lap around the cave!
Old Translation: That can't be right. Go and make another lap around the cave!
New Translation: 不可能啊。再去繞著洞穴走一圈看看！

Text: <laughter>I can't believe you really did that.
Old Text: <laughter>I can't believe you really did that.
Old Translation: <laughter> I can't believe you really did that.

Text: You are so gullible, Victor, it is a wonder you made it this far.
Old Text: You are so gullible, Victor, it is a wonder you made it this far.
Old Translation: You are so gullible, Victor, it is a wonder you made it this far.
New Translation: 你太容易上當了，維克多，你能活到今天簡直奇蹟。

Text: Will you do another lap, just for me?
Old Text: Will you do another lap, just for me?
Old Translation: Will you do another lap, just for me?

Text: Ossuaries were used as mass graves in ancient times.
Old Text: Ossuaries were used as mass graves in ancient times.
Old Translation: Ossuaries were used as mass graves in ancient times.
New Translation: 藏骨堂就是古時候的亂葬崗。

Text: Plagues and wars filled them in a matter of months.
Old Text: Plagues and wars filled them in a matter of months at times.
Old Translation: Plagues and wars filled them in a matter of months.
New Translation: 瘟疫和戰爭在幾個月內就能把它們填滿。

Text: Makes you wonder, how much the dead outnumber the living.
Old Text: Makes you wonder, how much the dead outnumber the living.
Old Translation: Makes you wonder, how much the dead outnumber the living.
New Translation: 讓你不禁會想，究竟死人比活人多多少？

Text: And is this truly our world or theirs?
Old Text: And is this truly our world or theirs?
Old Translation: And is this truly our world or theirs?
New Translation: 而這真是我們的世界，還是祂們的？

Text: The chapel is set ablaze with fires that give no heat.
Old Text: The chapel is set ablaze with fires that give no heat.
Old Translation: The chapel is set ablaze with fires that give no heat.
New Translation: 教堂在沒有熱度的業火下熊熊燃燒。

Text: The forces of darkness have already worked their way into the sanctum.
Old Text: The forces of darkness have already worked their way into the sanctum.
Old Translation: The forces of darkness have already worked their way into the sanctum.
New Translation: 黑暗勢力已經侵入聖地了。

Text: I wonder if the spirit of the Tzar is still uncorrupted or am I just rushing into the next sinister trap?
Old Text: I wonder if the spirit of the Tzar is still uncorrupted or am I rushing into the next sinister trap?
Old Translation: I wonder if the spirit of the Tzar is still uncorrupted or am I just rushing into the next sinister trap?
New Translation: 沙皇的靈魂還未被污染，不知我是否只是闖入下一個陰險的陷阱？

Text: Mortal, I sense the taint, the demon powers even in you! Do not come any further.
Old Text: Mortal, I sense the taint, the demon powers even in you! Do not come any further.
Old Translation: Mortal, I sense the taint, the demon powers even in you! Do not come any further.
New Translation: 凡人，我感受到你體內惡魔之力的污染！別再前進了。

Text: Don't listen to him, Victor. Your powers have grown beyond his understanding. You must push forward to accomplish your goals.
Section: Act2 16 The Voice comments on Tzar Borimir
Old Text: Don't listen to him, Victor. Your powers have grown beyond his understanding. You must push forward to accomplish your goals.
Old Translation: Don't listen to him, Victor. Your powers have grown beyond his understanding. You must push forward to accomplish your goals.
New Translation: 別聽祂的，維克多。你的力量已經超出祂的理解範圍了。你必須勇往直前，完成你的目標。

Text: I, Borimir the First Hunter, banish the shadows from this holy place!
Old Text: I, Borimir the First Hunter, banish the shadows from this holy place!
Old Translation: I, Borimir the First Hunter, banish the shadows from this holy place!
New Translation: 我，初代獵人波利密爾，要把暗影逐出這神聖之地！

Text: Begone back into the Well of Worlds!
Old Text: Begone back into the Well of Worlds!
Old Translation: Begone back into the Well of Worlds!

Text: I shall suffer you no more, abominations! Your foul taint has tarnished my city for too long!
Old Text: I shall suffer you no more, abominations! Your foul taint has tarnished my city for too long!
Old Translation: I shall suffer you no more, abominations! Your foul taint has tarnished my city for too long!
New Translation: 我不再受你折磨了，邪魔！你已經玷污我的城市太久了！

Text: The wraiths are too strong for my fading powers! You will have to trust the steel in your hand and your heart to deal with the rest.
Old Text: The wraiths are too strong for my fading powers! You will have to trust the steel in your hand and your heart to deal with the rest.
Old Translation: The wraiths are too strong for my fading powers! You will have to trust the steel in your hand and your heart to deal with the rest.
New Translation: 這群怨靈對我衰退的力量來說太強了！你必須相信你手中的鋼鐵和你的內心，去對付殘存的怨靈。

Text:
Thank you for this, tainted hunter. I am Tzar Borimir, the first hunter. I had sworn to fight the demons in our world. It was I who built Zagoravia and established the Hunters Order to guard a secret that could destroy us all.

I built this city to hide and seal the Well of Worlds - a gateway to countless worlds beyond ours, populated by demons and cosmic horrors beyond imagination and comprehension.
Old Text:
Thank you for this, tainted hunter. I am Tzar Borimir, the first hunter. I had sworn to fight the demons in our world. It was I who built Zagoravia and established the Hunters Order to guard a secret that could destroy us all.

I built this city to hide and seal the Well of Worlds - a gateway to countless worlds beyond ours, populated by demons and cosmic horrors beyond imagination and comprehension.
Old Translation:
Thank you for this, tainted hunter. I am Tzar Borimir, the first hunter. I had sworn to fight the demons in our world. It was I who built Zagoravia and established the hunter’s Family to guard a secret that could destroy us all.

I built this city to hide and seal the Well of Worlds - a gateway to countless worlds beyond ours, populated by demons and cosmic horrors beyond imagination and comprehension.
New Translation:
感謝你的幫助，受污染的獵人。我是波利密爾沙皇，初代獵人。我曾發過誓要對抗我們世界中的惡魔。就是我建立了扎戈拉維亞，並創立了獵魔組織，來守住能消滅我們所有人的某個祕密。

我建立了這座城市來隱藏並封印異界之井──那是一個通往無數未知世界的入口，居住著惡魔和宇宙間超乎想像的恐怖生物。

Text: For generations my legacy has been passed down the royal lineage of Zagoravia. In time my own kin forgot my words and the purpose given to them. And now - NOW - one of my own blood has sealed a dark pact with the very forces I had sworn to fight.
Old Text: For generations my legacy has been passed down the royal lineage of Zagoravia. In time my own kin forgot my words and the purpose given to them. And now - NOW - one of my own blood had sealed a dark pact with the very forces I had sworn to fight.
Old Translation: For generations my legacy has been passed down the royal lineage of Zagoravia. In time my own kin forgot my words and the purpose given to them. And now - NOW - one of my own blood has sealed a dark pact with the very forces I had sworn to fight.
New Translation: 我的遺願已經由扎戈拉維亞的皇室血脈傳承了好幾代。最後我的子嗣們還是忘了我的囑咐和給予他們的使命。而如今──如今──我的後代竟然與我曾發誓要對抗的勢力簽訂了黑暗契約。

Text: But who are you? I sense the demon taint within you! Flee, and do not turn back, for the Well of Worlds will corrupt your thoughts and tempt your heart!
Old Text: But who are you? I sense the demon taint within you! Flee, and do not turn back, for the Well of Worlds will corrupt your thoughts and tempt your heart!
Old Translation: But who are you? I sense the demon taint within you! Flee, and do not turn back, for the Well of Worlds will corrupt your thoughts and tempt your heart!
New Translation: 但你是誰？我感受到你體內惡魔的污染！逃吧，不要回頭，因為異界之井會腐化你的思想、誘惑你的內心！

Text: I've been running away all my life. It is my time to stand and fight. Let me tell you my story…
Old Text: I have been running away all my life. It is my time to stand and fight. Let me tell you my story…
Old Translation: I've been running away all my life. It is my time to stand and fight. Let me tell you my story…
New Translation: 我的一生都在逃避。該是我挺身而戰的時候了。讓我告訴你我的故事……

Text: Once upon a time, there was a prosperous kingdom.
Old Text: Once upon a time, there was a prosperous kingdom.
Old Translation: Once upon a time, there was a prosperous kingdom.
New Translation: 很久很久以前，有一個繁榮的王國。

Text: Its citizens enjoyed a life of wealth, luxury and knowledge.
Old Text: Its citizens enjoyed a life of wealth, luxury and knowledge.
Old Translation: Its citizens enjoyed a life of wealth, luxury and knowledge.
New Translation: 其國民的生活豐衣足食、學識豐富。

Text: Until its greedy neighbors joined forces in a vile plot.
Old Text: Until its greedy neighbors joined forces in a vile plot.
Old Translation: Until its greedy neighbors joined forces in a vile plot.
New Translation: 直到它貪婪的鄰國組成了卑鄙陰謀的聯軍。

Text: Three armies surrounded the city and its fall was inevitable.
Old Text: Three armies surrounded the city and its fall was inevitable.
Old Translation: Three armies surrounded the city and its fall was inevitable.
New Translation: 三支軍隊包圍了城市，它的淪陷是必然的。

Text: The young prince, heir to the throne, was willing to do anything and everything to save the kingdom.
Old Text: The young prince, heir to the throne, was willing to do anything and everything to save the kingdom.
Old Translation: The young prince, heir to the throne, was willing to do anything and everything to save the kingdom.
New Translation: 年輕的王子，王位的繼承人，願意為拯救王國付出一切。

Text: In this most desperate hour, an old man whispered to him.
Old Text: In this most desperate hour, an old man whispered to him.
Old Translation: In this most desperate hour, an old man whispered to him.
New Translation: 在萬念俱灰之際，一位老者對他耳語。

Text: <old man voice>"Open yourself to powers beyond this world, for this world has forsaken you."
Old Text: <old man voice>"Open yourself to powers beyond this world, for this world has forsaken you."
Old Translation: <old man voice>"Open yourself to powers beyond this world, for this world has forsaken you."
New Translation: <old man voice>「這個世界已經遺棄你了，向異界的力量敞開懷抱吧。」

Text: <old man voice>"Seal your fate, my prince!"
Old Text: <old man voice>"Seal your fate, my prince!"
Old Translation: <old man voice> "Seal your fate, my prince!"
New Translation: <old man voice>「決定你的命運吧，我的王子！」

Text: Those words burned the mind of the prince as fire.
Old Text: Those words burned the mind of the prince as fire.
Old Translation: Those words burned the mind of the prince as fire.
New Translation: 那些話語像火一樣炙烤著王子的心智。

Text: He took the power he was offered and fought like a demon, summoning lightning and fire from the sky.
Old Text: He took the power he was offered and fought like a demon, summoning lightning and fire from the sky.
Old Translation: He took the power he was offered and fought like a demon, summoning lightning and fire from the sky.
New Translation: 他施展獲得的力量，像惡魔一樣戰鬥，從空中召喚閃電和火焰。

Text: He turned the tide and the invaders fled in fear.
Old Text: He turned the tide and the invaders fled in fear.
Old Translation: He turned the tide and the invaders fled in fear.
New Translation: 他反敗為勝，侵略者在恐懼中逃竄。

Text: He was a hero, a warrior of unseen power.
Old Text: He was a hero, a warrior of unseen power.
Old Translation: He was a hero, a warrior of unseen power.
New Translation: 他是個英雄，具有前所未見力量的戰士。

Text: But great power always comes at a great price.
Old Text: But great power always comes at a great price.
Old Translation: But great power always comes at a great price.
New Translation: 但強大的力量往往伴隨著巨大的代價。

Text: The children starved, for the crops would not grow.
Old Text: The children starved, for the crops would not grow.
Old Translation: The children starved, for the crops would not grow.
New Translation: 作物不再生長，孩子們飽受飢餓。

Text: His father died of an illness unseen.
Old Text: His father died of an unknown illness.
Old Translation: His father died of an unknown illness.
New Translation: 他的父親死於不明疾病。
他的國土在衰敗中淪喪。

Text: For the price of his power was the death and decay of everything around him.
Old Text: For the price of his power was the death and decay of everything around him.
Old Translation: For the price of his power was the death and decay of everything around him.
New Translation: 他力量的代價就是他身邊的一切都會死亡和衰敗。

Text: Even though he was the last of his bloodline, the prince left his kingdom, for if he stayed, his people would suffer and perish.
Old Text: Even though he was the last of his bloodline, the prince left his kingdom, for if he stayed, his people would suffer and perish.
Old Translation: Even though he was the last of his bloodline, the prince left his kingdom, for if he stayed, his people would suffer and perish.
New Translation: 即使他是最後的血脈，王子還是離開了他的王國，因為他若留下來，他的人民將受苦受難。

Text: Now he wanders the world alone, never staying in one place for long, lest his curse catches up with him.
Old Text: He now wanders the world alone, never staying in one place for long, lest his curse catches up with him.
Old Translation: Now he wanders the world alone, never staying in one place for long, lest his curse catches up with him.
New Translation: 現在他獨自在世界遊蕩，從不在一個地方久留，唯恐他的詛咒會跟上他的腳步。

Text:
I understand how you became tainted, hunter. Your past mistakes may be attributed to the foolishness of youth.

But are you any wiser now? Can you face demons and keep your hunter’s word?
Section: Act2 22 Tzar Borimir Starts The Trial
Old Text:
I understand how you were tainted, hunter. Your past mistakes may be attributed to the foolishness of youth.

But are you any wiser now? Can you face demons and keep your hunter’s word?
Old Translation:
I understand how you became tainted, hunter. Your past mistakes may be attributed to the foolishness of youth.

But are you any wiser now? Can you face demons and keep your hunter’s word?
New Translation:
我明白你是怎麼被污染的了，獵人。你過去的錯誤或許歸因於年輕氣盛。

但你現在更有智慧了嗎？你能在面對惡魔時堅守你獵人的誓言嗎？

Text: I’m far past amends and redemption. But my heart is true. What must be done to break a demon pact?
Section: Act2 22 Tzar Borimir Starts The Trial
Old Text: I’m far past amends and redemption. But my heart is true. What must be done to break a demon pact?
Old Translation: I’m far past amends and redemption. But my heart is true. What must be done to break a demon pact?
New Translation: 雖然談不上贖罪，但我是真心的。必須怎麼做才能破壞惡魔契約？

Text: There is a way. You must find the physical object that embodies the deal. Destroy it and the contract is void. The trouble is this pact lies in the demon world.
Section: Act2 22 Tzar Borimir Starts The Trial
Old Text: There is a way. You must find the physical object that embodies the deal. Destroy it and the contract is void. The trouble is the pact is in the demon world.
Old Translation: There is a way. You must find the physical object that embodies the deal. Destroy it and the contract is void. The trouble is this pact lies in the demon world.
New Translation: 是有個辦法。你必須找到契約的載體並摧毀它，契約就失效了。問題是契約在魔界裡面。

Text: Point me towards the gate to the demon world, Borimir! Tell me where to find the Well of Worlds!
Section: Act2 22 Tzar Borimir Starts The Trial
Old Text: Point me towards the gate to the demon world, Borimir! Tell me where the Well of Worlds is!
Old Translation: Point me towards the gate to the demon world, Borimir! Tell me where to find the Well of Worlds!
New Translation: 指引我前往魔界的大門吧，波利密爾！告訴我異界之井在哪裡！

Text: I will reveal the location of the Well to you, hunter, but not yet. If you aim to release Zagoravia from its curse in the demon world, then I suggest you make sure there is a city left when you return.
Section: Act2 22 Tzar Borimir Starts The Trial
Old Text: I may reveal the location of the Well to you, hunter, but not just yet. If you aim to release Zagoravia from its curse in the demon world, then I suggest you make sure there is a city left when you return.
Old Translation: I will reveal the location of the Well to you, hunter, but not yet. If you aim to release Zagoravia from its curse in the demon world, then I suggest you make sure there is a city left when you return.
New Translation: 我會告訴你異界之井的位置，獵人，但不是現在。如果你的目標是把扎戈拉維亞從魔界的詛咒中解放出來，那我建議你先確保當你回來的時候這座城市還在。

Text:
There are several demons currently in Zagoravia of immense power. Each one of them has the potential to annihilate the city and all survivors.

I beseech you to defeat these monstrosities first. Return victorious and I will entrust you with the secret of the Well of Worlds.
Section: Act2 22 Tzar Borimir Starts The Trial
Old Text:
There are several demons of immense power currently in Zagoravia. Each one of them has the potential to annihilate the city and all survivors.

I beseech you to defeat these monstrosities first. Return victorious and I will entrust you with the secret of the Well of Worlds.
Old Translation:
There are several demons currently in Zagoravia of immense power. Each one of them has the potential to annihilate the city and all survivors.

I beseech you to defeat these monstrosities first. Return victorious and I will entrust you with the secret of the Well of Worlds.
New Translation:
目前有幾隻強大的惡魔棲息在扎戈拉維亞。每一隻都有消滅這座城市和所有倖存者的力量。

我懇求你先擊敗牠們。等你勝利歸來，我便會將異界之井的祕密交託於你。

Text: Didn't you like that chap better when he recited nonsensical poetry to you?
Section: Act2 23 The Voice sarcastic remark on Tzar Borimir
Old Text: Didn't you like that chap better when he recited nonsensical poetry to you?
Old Translation: Didn't you like that chap better when he recited nonsensical poetry to you?
New Translation: 那傢伙唸些無意義的詩的時候，不是更討人喜歡嗎？

Text: Tad too arrogant for a thousand year old corpse, I would say.
Section: Act2 23 The Voice sarcastic remark on Tzar Borimir
Old Text: Tad too arrogant for a thousand years old corpse, I would say.
Old Translation: Tad too arrogant for a thousand year old corpse, I would say.
New Translation: 區區一個千年鬼魂也太囂張了，我覺得。

Text: Spiders. Why does it have to be spiders!
Old Text: Spiders. Why does it have to be spiders!
Old Translation: Spiders. Why does it have to be spiders!
New Translation: 蜘蛛。為什麼一定要是蜘蛛！

Text: Oh, look at all those spider eggs.
Old Text: Oh, look at all those spider eggs.
Old Translation: Oh, look at all those spider eggs.

Text: I wonder how many there are?
Old Text: I wonder how many there are?
Old Translation: I wonder how many there are?

Text: Let's count them! One, two, three, four, five, six, seven, eight, nine, ten...
Old Text: Let's count them! One, two, three, four, five, six, seven, eight, nine, ten...
Old Translation: Let's count them! One, two, three, four, five, six, seven, eight, nine, ten...

Text: fifty seven, fifty eight, fifty nine...
Old Text: fifty seven, fifty eight, fifty nine...
Old Translation: fifty seven, fifty eight, fifty nine...

Text: Ah, you made me lose count. Now I have to start all over again.
Old Text: Ah, you made me lose count. Now I have to start all over again.
Old Translation: Ah, you made me lose count. Now I have to start all over again.
New Translation: 啊，你害我忘了數到哪了。現在我又得從頭數了。

Text: One, two, three, four, five, six, seven, eight, nine, ten...
Old Text: One, two, three, four, five, six, seven, eight, nine, ten...
Old Translation: One, two, three, four, five, six, seven, eight, nine, ten...

Text: Four hundred forty seven, four hundred forty eight, four hundred forty nine, four hundred fifty, four hundred fifty one, four hundred fifty two and four hundred fifty three.
Old Text: Four hundred forty seven, four hundred forty eight, four hundred forty nine, four hundred fifty, four hundred fifty one, four hundred fifty two and four hundred fifty three.
Old Translation: Four hundred forty seven, four hundred forty eight, four hundred forty nine, four hundred fifty, four hundred fifty one, four hundred fifty two and four hundred fifty three.

Text: Let's see... <mumbling>four hundred and fifty three multiplied by eight...
Old Text: Let's see... <mumbling>four hundred and fifty three multiplied by eight...
Old Translation: Let's see... <mumbling> four hundred and fifty three multiplied by eight...

Text: That's a grand total of three thousand, six hundred and twenty four legs.
Old Text: That's a grand total of three thousand, six hundred and twenty four legs.
Old Translation: That's a grand total of three thousand, six hundred and twenty four legs.

Text: Vail! The ancient corruption walks once again.
Old Text: The ancient corruption walks once again... Vail!
Old Translation: Vail! The ancient corruption walks once again.
New Translation: 汎爾！遠古的穢物又出現了。

Text: I must follow his soul to find the phylactery.
Old Text: I must follow his soul to find the phylactery.
Old Translation: I must follow his soul to find the phylactery.
New Translation: 我必須跟蹤祂的魂魄來找到命匣。

Text: There it is. I have to destroy this phylactery!
Old Text: There it is. I have to destroy this phylactery!
Old Translation: There it is. I have to destroy this phylactery!
New Translation: 找到了！我得毀掉這個命匣！

Text: Oh, I've always wanted to meet Vail. His work is quite inspiring.
Old Text: Oh, I've always wanted to meet Vail. His work is quite inspiring.
Old Translation: Oh, I've always wanted to meet Vail. His work is quite inspiring.
New Translation: 哦，我一直想見見汎爾。祂的傑作真是振奮人心。

Text: You would never guess half the things you can do with a carcass, let alone with hundreds of them. This bloke has quite the imagination, yes.
Old Text: You would never guess half the things you can do with a carcass, let alone with hundreds of those. This bloke has quite the imagination, yes.
Old Translation: You would never guess half the things you can do with a carcass, let alone with hundreds of them. This bloke has quite the imagination, yes.
New Translation: 你永遠想不到你可以拿一具屍體做什麼，更別說幾百具了。這傢伙真是想像力豐富啊。

Text: Some sport you are! The poor bugger was on his back!
Old Text: Some sport you are! The poor bugger was on his back!
Old Translation: Some sport you are! The poor bugger was on his back!
New Translation: 你該動一動囉！這可憐的傢伙八腳朝天了！

Text: Yes, yes, sure, just waltz into its lair uninvited and start trashing the place!
Old Text: Yes, yes, sure, just waltz into its lair uninvited and start trashing the place!
Old Translation: Yes, yes, sure, just waltz into its lair uninvited and start trashing the place!
New Translation: 很好，很好，沒錯，輕鬆地闖入牠的巢穴，然後到處破壞！

Text: And so, our valiant hero has once again emerged victorious, slaying demonic spiders and defenseless stone columns alike, all in the name of better loot...
Old Text: And so, our valiant hero has once again emerged victorious, slaying demonic spiders and defenseless stone columns alike, all in the name of better loot...
Old Translation: And so, our valiant hero has once again emerged victorious, slaying demonic spiders and defenseless stone columns alike, all in the name of better loot...
New Translation: 於是，我們勇敢的英雄又獲得了勝利，以掠奪的名義，屠殺蜘蛛和手無寸鐵的石柱……

Text: Don't worry, if they don't sparkle, you should be safe.
Old Text: Don't worry, if they don't sparkle, you should be safe.
Old Translation: Don't worry, if they don't sparkle, you should be safe.
New Translation: 別擔心，如果他們沒閃閃發光，你應該是安全的。

Text: On second thought, those vampires seem more formidable than the monsters you've faced before.
Old Text: On second thought, those vampires seem more formidable than the monsters you've faced before.
Old Translation: On second thought, those vampires seem more formidable than the monsters you've faced before.
New Translation: 仔細想想，這些吸血鬼似乎比你之前對付過的怪物要強多了。

Text: Are you sure you are up to the challenge?
Old Text: Are you sure you are up to the challenge?
Old Translation: Are you sure you are up to the challenge?
New Translation: 你確定準備好接受挑戰了嗎？

Text: We wouldn't want you to end up like your buddy Adrian, would we?
Old Text: We wouldn't want you to end like your buddy Adrian, would we?
Old Translation: We wouldn't want you to end up like your buddy Adrian, would we?
New Translation: 我們可不想讓你落得和你兄弟艾德里安一樣的下場，對吧？

Text: Oh, look, a circus! I've always loved circus performances!
Old Text: Oh, look, a circus! I've always loved circus performances!
Old Translation: Oh, look, a circus! I've always loved circus performances!
New Translation: 哦，你看，馬戲團！我一直很喜歡馬戲團表演！

Text: In fact, Zagoravia is one big circus right now.
Old Text: In fact, Zagoravia is one big circus right now.
Old Translation: In fact, Zagoravia is one big circus right now.
New Translation: 事實上，扎戈拉維亞現在就是一個大馬戲團。

Text: All kinds of freaks and sights presented to the eager audience. In this case - me.
Old Text: All kinds of freaks and sights presented to the eager audience. In this case - me.
Old Translation: All kinds of freaks and sights presented to the eager audience. In this case - me.
New Translation: 各種怪人和場景都呈現在期盼的觀眾面前。在這裡──我就是觀眾。

Text: And your role is to play the clown, don't you think, Victor?
Old Text: And your role is to play the clown, don't you think, Victor?
Old Translation: And your role is to play the clown, don't you think, Victor?
New Translation: 而你的角色就是小丑，你不覺得嗎，維克多？

Text: I heard an entity called Apocalypse resides in this cave.
Old Text: I heard an entity called Apocalypse resides in this cave.
Old Translation: I heard an entity called Apocalypse resides in this cave.
New Translation: 我聽說有個叫天啟的東西在這個洞穴內。

Text: Can you smell it? Something stinks!
Old Text: Can you smell it? Something stinks!
Old Translation: Can you smell it? Something stinks!

Text: Maybe the conspiracy that you think surrounds Zagoravia?
Old Text: Maybe the whole conspiracy that you imagine for Zagoravia?
Old Translation: Maybe the conspiracy that you think surrounds Zagoravia?
New Translation: 也許是籠罩扎戈拉維亞的陰謀味？

Text: Oh, nevermind, it's only the sewer shaft over there!
Old Text: Oh, my bad, it is only the sewer shaft over there!
Old Translation: Oh, nevermind, it's only the sewer shaft over there!
New Translation: 哦，沒事，是那邊下水道的臭味！

Text: Are you lost, Victor? There is nothing interesting in this direction.
Old Text: Are you lost, Victor? There is nothing interesting in this direction.
Old Translation: Are you lost, Victor? There is nothing interesting in this direction.
New Translation: 你迷路了嗎，維克多？這個方向可沒什麼好玩的。

Text: Turn back and let's go see the circus!
Old Text: Turn back and let's go see the circus!
Old Translation: Turn back and let's go see the circus!
New Translation: 回頭吧，咱們去看馬戲團！

Text: Those nasty-nasty vampires can't get you now. Right?
Old Text: Those nasty-nasty vampires can't get you now. Right?
Old Translation: Those nasty-nasty vampires can't get you now. Right?
New Translation: 那些棘手的吸血鬼現在拿你沒轍了。對吧？

Text: Never have I set foot in a more unnatural place.  I’ve grown used to rot and decay, but this… ice and snow in this season?
Old Text: Never have I set foot in a more unnatural place.  I’ve grown used to rot and decay, but this… ice and snow in this season?
Old Translation: Never have I set foot in a more unnatural place.  I’ve grown used to rot and decay, but this… ice and snow in this season?
New Translation: 我從未到過如此詭異的地方。我已經習慣了腐朽和敗壞，但這……這個季節會下雪結冰？

Text: The cold is cutting through to my bones. Yet it is nothing compared to the chill of anticipating the demon that sucked the warmth out of this place.
Old Text: The cold is cutting through to my bones. Yet it is nothing compared to the chill of anticipating the demon that sucked the warmth out of this place.
Old Translation: The cold is cutting through to my bones. Yet it is nothing compared to the chill of anticipating the demon that sucked the warmth out of this place.
New Translation: 陣陣寒風刺入我的骨髓。但怎麼也比不上把這裡溫暖都吸走的惡魔寒意。

Text: Those frozen soldiers, they look so chic! I tell you, Victor, someone here has a taste for modern art!
New Translation: 那些冰封士兵，他們看起來好時尚啊！我跟你說，維克多，這裡有人具有現代藝術品位！

Text: Take care to get frozen in a more dynamic pose when you die, would you?
New Translation: 在你凍死前，記得擺個更動感的姿勢，好嗎？

Text: Ladies and gentlemen, welcome to the Gauntlet!
Old Text: Ladies and gentlemen, welcome to the Gauntlet!
Old Translation: Ladies and gentlemen, welcome to the Gauntlet!
New Translation: 各位女士、先生，歡迎來到鐵手套！

Text: Let's hear it for Victor Vran, a hunter of some renown, who will brave the Gauntlet and try to make it to the end!
Old Text: Let's hear it for Victor Vran, a hunter of some renown, who will brave the Gauntlet and try to make it to the end!
Old Translation: Let's hear it for Victor Vran, a hunter of some renown, who will brave the Gauntlet and try to make it to the end!
New Translation: 讓我們用掌聲歡迎小有名氣的獵人，維克多．弗蘭，他將在鐵手套中奮戰到最後！

Text: I can already hear the crowd cheering for you, Victor. Oh wait, are those crickets?
Old Text: I can already hear the crowd cheering for you, Victor. Or wait, are those crickets?
Old Translation: I can already hear the crowd cheering for you, Victor. Oh wait, are those crickets?
New Translation: 我已經聽見觀眾為你歡呼了，維克多。哦，等等，那些是蟋蟀的叫聲？

Text: Ladies and gentlemen, it looked close for a while, but Victor made it through the Gauntlet more or less intact.
Old Text: Ladies and gentlemen, it looked close for a while, but Victor made it through the Gauntlet more or less intact.
Old Translation: Ladies and gentlemen, it looked close for a while, but Victor made it through the Gauntlet more or less intact.
New Translation: 各位女士、先生，雖然千鈞一髮，但維克多幾乎毫髮無傷的通過了鐵手套。

Text: Thank you, thank you! He'll be here all week!
Old Text: Thank you, thank you! He'll be here all week!
Old Translation: Thank you, thank you! He'll be here all week!
New Translation: 謝謝，謝謝大家！他將在這裡表演一週！

Text: In times of old, this facility was dedicated to reeducating the most dangerous killers in the lands.
Old Text: In times of old, this facility was dedicated to reeducating the most dangerous killers in the lands.
Old Translation: In times of old, this facility was dedicated to reeducating the most dangerous killers in the lands.
New Translation: 在古時候，這裡是專門對這片土地最危險的犯人進行再教育的場所。

Text: <sinister>Murderers, rapists and madmen. They were all transformed in the reformatory. Transformed indeed.
Old Text: <sinister>Murderers, rapists and madmen. They were all transformed in the reformatory. Transformed indeed.
Old Translation: <sinister> Murderers, rapists and madmen. They were all transformed in the reformatory. Transformed indeed.
New Translation: <sinister>殺人犯、強姦犯和瘋子。他們都在感化監獄裡改變了。改變得徹徹底底。

Text: The sewers were constructed to reduce the threat of pestilence and disease.
Old Text: The sewers were constructed to reduce the threat of pestilence and disease.
Old Translation: The sewers were constructed to reduce the threat of pestilence and disease.
New Translation: 這些下水道是為了降低瘟疫和疾病的威脅而建造的。

Text: Unfortunately, they became the breeding grounds for rats that spread the Red Plague two decades ago.
Old Text: Unfortunately, they became the breeding grounds for rats that spread the Red Plague two decades ago.
Old Translation: Unfortunately, they became the breeding grounds for rats that spread the Red Plague two decades ago.
New Translation: 不幸的是，它們變成了老鼠的滋生地，那些老鼠在二十年前散播了紅色鼠疫。

Text: Let's find out what kind of rats live here now.
Old Text: Let's find out what kind of rats live here now.
Old Translation: Let's find out what kind of rats live here now.
New Translation: 讓我們瞧瞧現在這裡住著什麼樣的老鼠吧。

Text: Welcome, hunter, to the home of the Collector. I trust you've already met his pets outside.
Old Text: Welcome, hunter, to the home of the Collector. I trust you've already met his pets outside.
Old Translation: Welcome, hunter, to the home of the Collector. I trust you've already met his pets outside.
New Translation: 歡迎，獵人，歡迎來到收藏家的家。我相信你已經在外面見過他的寵物了。

Text: Exotic beasts, curios from faraway lands, pictures of cats; he collected them all.
Old Text: Exotic beasts, curios from faraway lands, pictures of cats; he collected them all.
Old Translation: Exotic beasts, curios from faraway lands, pictures of cats; he collected them all.
New Translation: 奇珍異獸、異國古董、貓咪的畫；他全都收藏。

Text: Really dedicated to his hobbies, the Collector is. I hear he's into collecting eyes right now.
Old Text: Really dedicated to his hobbies, the Collector is. I hear he's into collecting eyes right now.
Old Translation: Really dedicated to his hobbies, the Collector is. I hear he's into collecting eyes right now.
New Translation: 收藏家對他的愛好非常投入。我聽說他現在正在收集眼珠。

Text:
Apocalypse, the Demon Wraith, used to be held prisoner in this forsaken place, slowly draining all of its energies away to sustain its ever-burning wrath.

But it seems its master has already unleashed the hungering monstrosity.
Section: Act2 28 Tzar Bormimir reveals the Apocalypse demon left to attack the castle
New Translation:
惡魔怨靈，天啟，曾經被囚禁在這個遺忘之地，一點一滴耗盡了這裡的能量以維持其不斷燃燒的怒火。

但看來祂的主人已經釋放了這隻飢餓的怪物。

Text:
Apocalypse flew towards the castle. I fear that it is moving in for an attack against the survivors.

Make haste to castle Zagore, hunter. Save my legacy. Save Zagoravia!
Section: Act2 28 Tzar Bormimir reveals the Apocalypse demon left to attack the castle
Old Text:
Apocalypse flew away towards the castle. I fear that it is moving in for an attack against the survivors.

Make haste to castle Zagore, hunter. Save my legacy. Save Zagoravia!
Old Translation:
Apocalypse flew towards the castle. I fear that it is moving in for an attack against the survivors.

Make haste to castle Zagore, hunter. Save my legacy. Save Zagoravia!
New Translation:
天啟朝城堡飛去了。我擔心祂是要去攻擊倖存者的。

快回扎戈爾城，獵人！拯救我的遺產，拯救扎戈拉維亞！

Section: Act2 28-1 Banter in hub before battle

Text: At least there will be someone to patch me up after I'm done. Or bury my remains.
Section: Act2 28-1 Banter in hub before battle
Old Text: At least there will be someone to patch me up after I'm done. Or probably bury my remains.
Old Translation: At least there will be someone to patch me up after I'm done. Or bury my remains.
New Translation: 至少會有人在我大戰後幫我包紮，或者幫我收屍了。

Text: Over there! On the balcony! Help!
Section: Act2 28-1 Banter in hub before battle

Text: Thanks to your efforts Zagoravia may yet survive, hunter. As promised, I will reveal you the entrance to the Well of Worlds. It is hidden below my crypt, in the Royal Gardens.
Section: Act2 29 The Tzar reveals the location of the Well of Worlds (after battle)
Old Text: Thanks to your efforts Zagoravia may yet survive, hunter. As promised, I will reveal you the entrance to the Well of Worlds. It is hidden below my crypt, in the Royal Gardens.
Old Translation: Thanks to your efforts Zagoravia may yet survive, hunter. As promised, I will reveal you the entrance to the Well of Worlds. It is hidden below my crypt, in the Royal Gardens.
New Translation: 感謝你的付出，扎戈拉維亞才得以倖存。如我所承諾的，我會告訴你異界之井的入口。它就藏在皇家花園裡，我的陵寢下方。

Text:
The history of the Well is entwined with the history of Zagoravia and my own. My ambition was too great for this world and I opened the Well of Worlds, a portal that connects our reality to countless others.

When I realized my mistake it was too late to go back. I had to do something to protect our world.
Section: Act2 29 The Tzar reveals the location of the Well of Worlds (after battle)
Old Text:
The history of the Well is entwined with the history of Zagoravia and my own. My ambition was too great for this world and I opened the Well of Worlds, a portal that connects our reality to countless others.

When I realized my mistake it was too late to go back. I had to do something to protect our world.
Old Translation:
The history of the Well is entwined with the history of Zagoravia and my own. My ambition was too great for this world and I opened the Well of Worlds, a portal that connects our reality to countless others.

When I realized my mistake it was too late to go back. I had to do something to protect our world.
New Translation:
異界之井的歷史與扎戈拉維亞的歷史及我的過去有著緊密的聯繫。我以前對這個世界有著極大的野心，因此我打開了異界之井，那是一個連接我們世界與其它無數世界的傳送門。

當我意識到自己的錯誤時，一切都難以挽回了。我必須做點什麼來保護我們的世界。

Text:
I gathered the noblest souls of the realms. We swore to hunt corruption and this new purpose made us a family. The Hunters Order.

Together we founded Zagoravia as a fortress to stand guard over the secret of the Well of Worlds for the sake of humanity. My hunter brethren and I swore an oath to guard the Well and our world from all kinds of unnatural and otherworldly threats.
Section: Act2 29 The Tzar reveals the location of the Well of Worlds (after battle)
Old Text:
I gathered the noblest souls of the realms. We swore to hunt corruption and this new purpose made us a family. The Hunters Order.

Together we founded Zagoravia as a fortress to stand guard over the secret of the Well of Worlds in sake of humanity. My hunter brethren and I swore an oath to guard the Well and our world from all kinds of unnatural and otherworldly threats.
Old Translation:
I gathered the noblest souls of the realms. We swore to hunt corruption and this new purpose made us a family. The Hunters Order.

Together we founded Zagoravia as a fortress to stand guard over the secret of the Well of Worlds for the sake of humanity. My hunter brethren and I swore an oath to guard the Well and our world from all kinds of unnatural and otherworldly threats.
New Translation:
我召集了領土中最高尚的勇士。我們誓言獵殺穢物，而新的使命讓我們成為了一家人──獵魔組織。

為了人類，我們建立了扎戈拉維亞，作為守住異界之井祕密的堡壘。我的獵人兄弟和我誓言看守此井，以保護我們的世界免受各種非自然的威脅。

Text:
The demons used the Well to invade Zagoravia, so I bear as much guilt as Katarina for the current events, if not more. You can redeem us both, hunter!

Go now! Descend into the Well of Worlds and travel to the Demon World. Find the dark pact that binds Katarina and destroy it!
Section: Act2 29 The Tzar reveals the location of the Well of Worlds (after battle)
Old Text:
The demons used the Well to invade Zagoravia, so I bear as much guilt as Katarina for the current events, if not more. You can redeem us both, hunter!

Go now! Descend into the Well of Worlds and travel to the Demon World. Find the dark pact that binds Katarina and destroy it!
Old Translation:
The demons used the Well to invade Zagoravia, so I bear as much guilt as Katarina for the current events, if not more. You can redeem us both, hunter!

Go now! Descend into the Well of Worlds and travel to the Demon World. Find the dark pact that binds Katarina and destroy it!
New Translation:
惡魔利用異界之井入侵扎戈拉維亞，所以對於目前的情況，我承擔著與卡特蓮娜一樣，甚至更多的罪過。你可以救贖我們，獵人！

去吧！下去異界之井並前往魔界。找到束縛卡特蓮娜的黑暗契約並摧毀它！

Text: You're a resourceful man Victor, but you wouldn't last five minutes in the world of demons. Let me come with you.
Section: Act2 291 Irene Wants To Go To The Well Of Worlds
Old Text: You are a resourceful man, but you wouldn't last five minutes in the world of demons, Victor. Let me come with you.
Old Translation: You're a resourceful man Victor, but you wouldn't last five minutes in the world of demons. Let me come with you.
New Translation: 你是個足智多謀的人，維克多，但你在魔界撐不了五分鐘的。讓我陪你一起去。

Text: No. I've had enough people suffer the consequences of my decisions. I must do this alone.
Section: Act2 291 Irene Wants To Go To The Well Of Worlds
Old Text: No. I've had enough people suffer the consequences of my decisions. I must do this alone.
Old Translation: No. I've had enough people suffer the consequences of my decisions. I must do this alone.
New Translation: 不，我已經害夠多的人因我的決定而受苦了。這件事我必須獨自去做。

Text: Why are you doing this, Victor? Why would you risk your life for something that is not your cause?
Old Text: Why are you doing this, Victor? Why would you risk your life for something that is not your cause?
Old Translation: Why are you doing this, Victor? Why would you risk your life for something that is not your cause?
New Translation: 為什麼你要這樣做，維克多？為什麼要為與你無關的事拼命？

Text: Oh, I see. You are looking for answers, for purpose. You believe that whatever lies in here would help you ease your guilt and self-disgust.
Old Text: Oh, I see. You are looking for answers, for purpose. You believe that whatever lies in here would help you ease your guilt and self-disgust.
Old Translation: Oh, I see. You are looking for answers, for purpose. You believe that whatever lies in here would help you ease your guilt and self-disgust.
New Translation: 哦，我知道了。你在尋找答案、尋找使命。你相信這裡的東西能幫你減輕你的內疚和自我厭惡。

Text: Watch out! That one almost got you!
Old Text: Watch out! That one almost got you!
Old Translation: Watch out! That one almost got you!

Text: <sarcastic>Where do we go now? Where indeed?
Old Text: <sarcastic>Where do we go now? Where indeed?
Old Translation: <sarcastic> Where do we go now? Where indeed?

Text: If you ask nicely I would make a path for you.
Old Text: If you ask nicely I would make a path for you.
Old Translation: If you ask nicely I would make a path for you.
New Translation: 如果你客氣的問，我就給你指引明路。

Text: Ooh, the silent treatment - I like your brazen attitude!
Old Text: Ooh, the silent treatment - I like your brazen attitude!
Old Translation: Ooh, the silent treatment - I like your brazen attitude!
New Translation: 哦，不理我──我就喜歡你目中無人的態度！

Text: And now, I present to you - the Well of Worlds!
Old Text: And now, I present to you - the Well of Worlds!
Old Translation: And now, I present to you - the Well of Worlds!
New Translation: 現在為你介紹──異界之井！

Text: Everything that you strive for is on the other side.
Old Text: Everything that you strive for is on the other side.
Old Translation: Everything that you strive for is on the other side.
New Translation: 你為之奮鬥的一切都在另一邊。

Text: Go on, Victor. Touch the nice Well of Worlds and awaken it!
Old Text: Go on, Victor. Touch the nice Well of Worlds and awaken it!
Old Translation: Go on, Victor. Touch the nice Well of Worlds and awaken it!
New Translation: 去吧，維克多。觸碰異界之井，喚醒它！

Text: That's it, my good boy! We are writing history, you and I!
Old Text: That's it, my good boy! We are writing history, you and I!
Old Translation: That's it, my good boy! We are writing history, you and I!
New Translation: 就是這樣，好孩子！我們正在寫下歷史！

Text: The moment you have been waiting for all your life! Strike! STRIKE HARDER!
Old Text: The moment you have been waiting all your life! Strike! STRIKE HARDER!
Old Translation: The moment you have been waiting for all your life! Strike! STRIKE HARDER!
New Translation: 這是你等了一生的時刻！進攻！全力進攻！

Text: Be strong, Victor! Take your vengeance on the foul demons that cheated you and destroyed your life!
Old Text: Be strong, Victor! Take your vengeance on the foul demons that cheated you and destroyed your life!
Old Translation: Be strong, Victor! Take your vengeance on the foul demons that cheated you and destroyed your life!
New Translation: 堅強點，維克多！對這些欺騙你、毀掉你人生的惡魔復仇吧！

Text: You did it, Victor! I am so proud, my boy. Go through the Well into the Demon World. Seal your fate!
Old Text: You did it, Victor! I am so proud, my boy. Go through the Well into the Demon World. Seal your fate!
Old Translation: You did it, Victor! I am so proud, my boy. Go through the Well into the Demon World. Seal your fate!
New Translation: 你辦到了，維克多！我太驕傲了，孩子。穿過異界之井進入魔界。決定你的命運吧！

Text: You spoke one word too many! Now I know who you are.
Old Text: You spoke one word too many, voice! Now I know who you are.
Old Translation: You spoke one word too many! Now I know who you are.
New Translation: 有句話你說太多遍了！現在我知道你是誰了。

Text: Many times have I let my imagination drift into a demon world of my mind's devising.
Old Text: Many times have I let my imagination drift into a demon world of my mind's devising.
Old Translation: Many times have I let my imagination drift into a demon world of my mind's devising.
New Translation: 多少次，我幻想自己置身魔界。

Text: I have gazed upon mountains of fire and molten rock. I have listened to a choir of countless voices, locked in eternal agony.
Old Text: I have gazed upon mountains of fire and molten rock. I have listened to a choir of countless voices, locked in eternal agony.
Old Translation: I have gazed upon mountains of fire and molten rock. I have listened to a choir of countless voices, locked in eternal agony.
New Translation: 我凝視著火山和熔岩；我聆聽著被鎖在永恆痛苦中的眾聲合唱。

Text: As I pass through the gate, I find these washed away. What spreads before me is not a living hell, but a dying - if not already dead, world.
Old Text: As I pass through the gate, I find these washed away clean. What spreads before me is not a living hell, but a dying - if not already dead, world.
Old Translation: As I pass through the gate, I find these washed away. What spreads before me is not a living hell, but a dying - if not already dead, world.
New Translation: 當我穿過那扇門，我發現這些都破滅了。在我眼前的不是一個煉獄，而是一個垂死──還沒消亡的世界。

Text: Are the demonic contracts the last purpose of this ancient and incomprehensible world?
Old Text: Are the demonic contracts the last purpose of this ancient and incomprehensible world?
Old Translation: Are the demonic contracts the last purpose of this ancient and incomprehensible world?
New Translation: 惡魔契約是這個古老、不可思議的世界僅存的意義嗎？

Text: I feel the gate brought me where I desired to be, as close to the pact holder as possible.
Old Text: I feel the gate brought me where I desired to be, as close to the pact holder as possible.
Old Translation: I feel the gate brought me where I desired to be, as close to the pact holder as possible.
New Translation: 我感覺我被帶到了我想去的地方，離契約持有者很近。

Text: There he is, the keeper of the pacts.
Old Text: There he is, the keeper of the pacts.
Old Translation: There he is, the keeper of the pacts.

Text: He will not surrender Katarina's contract easily.
Old Text: He will not surrender Katarina's contract easily.
Old Translation: He will not surrender Katarina's contract easily.
New Translation: 牠不會輕易交出卡特蓮娜的契約的。

Text: Why have you come here, mortal? Why have you brought down this anger upon me?
Section: Act2 32 The Solicitor talks to Victor
Old Text: Why have you come here, mortal? Why have you brought down this anger upon me?
Old Translation: Why have you come here, mortal? Why have you brought down this anger upon me?
New Translation: 你為什麼來這裡，凡人？為什麼把怒氣出在我身上？

Text: I have come for the pact of Queen Katarina of Zagoravia, demon. The same pact that allows creatures from your world to invade ours.
Section: Act2 32 The Solicitor talks to Victor
Old Text: I have come for the pact of Queen Katarina of Zagoravia, demon. The same pact that allows creatures from your world to invade ours.
Old Translation: I have come for the pact of Queen Katarina of Zagoravia, demon. The same pact that allows creatures from your world to invade ours.
New Translation: 我是為了扎戈拉維亞的卡特蓮娜女王的契約而來，惡魔。也就是那個讓你們世界的生物侵略我們世界的契約。

Text: I have no quarrel with you, mortal. A pact is binding for both sides and the price must be paid, one way or another.
Section: Act2 32 The Solicitor talks to Victor
Old Text: I have no quarrel with you, mortal. A pact is binding for both sides and the price must be paid, one way or another.
Old Translation: I have no quarrel with you, mortal. A pact is binding for both sides and the price must be paid, one way or another.
New Translation: 我懶得和你爭辯，凡人。契約是雙方訂下的，無論如何都必須支付代價。

Text: Then destroy the pact, and end this.
Section: Act2 32 The Solicitor talks to Victor
Old Text: Destroy the pact then, and this all ends.
Old Translation: Then destroy the pact, and end this.
New Translation: 那毀掉契約，結束這一切。

Text: Alas, I no longer have the pact, mortal. It was bought back by the one who facilitated the deal. A powerful being, one of the very first vampires of your world.
Section: Act2 32 The Solicitor talks to Victor
Old Text: Alas, I no longer have the pact, mortal. It was bought back by the one who facilitated the deal. A powerful being, one of the very first vampires of your world.
Old Translation: Alas, I no longer have the pact, mortal. It was bought back by the one who facilitated the deal. A powerful being, one of the very first vampires of your world.
New Translation: 唉，契約已不在我手上了，凡人。它被促成這筆交易的人贖回了。一個強大的存在，他是一位你們世界上的吸血鬼真祖。

Text:
He came here not long ago and bought the contract for himself. In return, he promised his own immortal essence. While he holds the contract, the war between our worlds will rage on.

Undoubtedly, he thinks himself very clever. He believes he cheated me, as he will have to die to submit his essence. And a creature like him plans to live forever, of course.
Section: Act2 32 The Solicitor talks to Victor
Old Text:
He came here not long ago and bought the contract for himself. In return, he promised his own immortal essence. While he holds the contract, the war between our worlds will rage on.

Undoubtedly, he thinks himself very clever. He believes he cheated me, as he will have to die to submit his essence. And a creature like him plans to live forever, of course.
Old Translation:
He came here not long ago and bought the contract for himself. In return, he promised his own immortal essence. While he holds the contract, the war between our worlds will rage on.

Undoubtedly, he thinks himself very clever. He believes he cheated me, as he will have to die to submit his essence. And a creature like him plans to live forever, of course.
New Translation:
他不久前來到這裡，他答應用他不朽的靈髓作為交換，贖走了契約。只要他拿著契約，我們兩個世界之間的戰爭就不會停止。

毫無疑問，他自認為很聰明，以為騙到我了，因為他必須死了才能交出他的靈髓。而像他這樣的生物，當然打算永生不死了。

Text:
You mean the contract is with Gabriel, the advisor of the Queen? And that he is one of the first vampires? That explains a lot.

You gave me the last piece of the puzzle, demon. I shall return to my world and deliver you the soul of a vampire immortal.

你的意思是說，契約在女王的顧問加百列手上？而且他是一位吸血鬼真祖？這下我就明白了。

你送了我最後一塊拼圖，惡魔。我會回到我的世界，把吸血鬼不朽的靈髓送來給你。
