Text: His name is Gabriel. And I will seal his fate.
Section: Act2 33 Cutscene 5: The Name of the Beast
Old Text: His name is Gabriel. And I will seal his fate.
Old Translation: His name is Gabriel. And I will seal his fate.
New Translation: 他的名字是加百列。而我將決定他的命運。

Text:
How could we have been so foolish, so blind? The voice, whispering in our heads, twisting our desires, how could we not recognize him all this time?

Find Gabriel in his mansion beyond the industrial quarter, hunter. He has always fancied himself a sort of scientist and is very unlikely to have abandoned the expensive equipment he gained with my family's help.
Section: Act3 01 The Queen gives the location of the final Boss
Old Text:
How could we have been so foolish, so blind? The voice, whispering in our heads, twisting our desires, how could we not recognize him all this time?

Find Gabriel in his mansion beyond the Steam Quarter, hunter. He has always fancied himself a sort of scientist and is very unlikely to have abandoned the expensive equipment he gained with my family's help.
Old Translation:
How could we have been so foolish, so blind? The voice, whispering in our heads, twisting our desires, how could we not recognize him all this time?

Find Gabriel in his mansion beyond the Steam Quarter, hunter. He has always fancied himself a sort of scientist and is very unlikely to have abandoned the expensive equipment he gained with my family's help.
New Translation:
我們怎麼會如此愚蠢，如此盲目？那個在我們腦海中的耳語，扭曲我們慾望的聲音，我們怎麼會這麼久都沒認出是他？

去蒸汽區後方的加百列府邸尋找他吧，獵人。他自認是個科學家，不太可能會拋棄那些我們家族幫他獲得的昂貴設備。

Text: Seal your fate. The same words tricked me long ago, a naive young man facing a difficult choice.
Old Text: Seal your fate. The same words tricked me long time ago, a naive young man in a very difficult place.
Old Translation: Seal your fate. The same words tricked me long ago, a naive young man facing a difficult choice.
New Translation: 決定你的命運。這句話很久以前就騙了我，一個天真的年輕人面臨艱難的抉擇。

Text: Seal your fate! Never have those words left my consciousness and I have carried their burden ever since.
Old Text: Seal your fate! Never have those words left my consciousness and I have carried their burden ever since.
Old Translation: Seal your fate! Never have those words left my consciousness and I have carried their burden ever since.
New Translation: 決定你的命運！這句話在我的腦海中揮之不去，從那之後我一直背負著它的重擔。

Text: Gabriel brokered my own dark pact, and has done the same with Katarina in her moment of weakness.
Old Text: Gabriel brokered my own dark pact so long ago, and has done the same with Katarina in her moment of weakness.
Old Translation: Gabriel brokered my own dark pact, and has done the same with Katarina in her moment of weakness.
New Translation: 加百列促成了我的黑暗契約，還趁卡特蓮娜虛弱時對她做了同樣的事。

Text: A fate will be sealed today, one way or another.
Old Text: A fate will be sealed today, one way or another.
Old Translation: A fate will be sealed today, one way or another.
New Translation: 無論如何，今天有個命運要被決定。

Text: I see you're back from your little trip. How did it go?
Old Text: I see you're back from your little trip. How did it go?
Old Translation: I see you're back from your little trip. How did it go?
New Translation: 你旅遊回來了呀，好玩嗎？

Text: Where are you going in such a rush, hunter?
Old Text: Where are you going in such a rush, hunter?
Old Translation: Where are you going in such a rush, hunter?

Text: <sarcastic>Slow down or you may lose your head.
Old Text: <sarcastic>Slow down or you may lose your head.
Old Translation: <sarcastic>Slow down or you may lose your head.

Text: You know what? I was beginning to think we were bonding, you and I.
Old Text: You know what? I was beginning to think we were bonding, you and I.
Old Translation: You know what? I was beginning to think we were bonding, you and I.
New Translation: 你知道嗎？我最近開始覺得我們是好哥們。

Text: I watched over you, pointed out loot and kept you entertained, did I not?
Old Text: I looked over you, pointed out loot and kept you entertained, did I not?
Old Translation: I watched over you, pointed out loot and kept you entertained, did I not?
New Translation: 我看著你，提醒你戰利品在哪，一路逗你開心，不是嗎？

Text: Now I can't help but feel there is a certain negativity in the air between us.
Old Text: Now I can't help but feel there is certain negativity in the air between us.
Old Translation: Now I can't help but feel there is a certain negativity in the air between us.
New Translation: 現在，我不禁感到我們之間有一股不快的氣氛。

Text: Oh, I really am growing quite agitated by your behavior, Victor! You wouldn't like me when I am agitated!
Old Text: Oh, I really am growing quite agitated by your behavior, Victor! You wouldn't like me when I am agitated!
Old Translation: Oh, I really am growing quite agitated by your behavior, Victor! You wouldn't like me when I am agitated!
New Translation: 噢，我被你的態度搞得相當煩躁，維克多！你不會喜歡我煩躁的樣子的！

Text: Keep talking, Gabriel. That's how I recognized you.
Old Text: Keep talking, Gabriel. That's how I recognized you.
Old Translation: Keep talking, Gabriel. That's how I recognized you.
New Translation: 繼續說吧，加百列。我就是這樣認出你的。

Text: Who knows what other secrets you will tell me.
Old Text: Who knows what other secrets you will tell me.
Old Translation: Who knows what other secrets you will tell me.
New Translation: 誰曉得你還會告訴我什麼祕密呢。

Text: Oh...it replied to me, HOW SWEET!<laughter>
Old Text: Oh...it replied to me, HOW SWEET!<laughter>
Old Translation: Oh...it replied to me, HOW SWEET!<laughter>
New Translation: 哦……竟然回應我了，太開心了！<laughter>

Text: Well Vicky, those are some big words. I'll make you eat up your hat for them.
Old Text: Well Vicky, those are some big words. I'll make you eat up your hat for them.
Old Translation: Well Vicky, those are some big words. I'll make you eat up your hat for them.
New Translation: 好吧，維琪，既然你放話了。我會讓你為此吃掉自己的帽子。

Text: At first I thought about not talking to you anymore.
Old Text: At first I thought about not talking to you anymore.
Old Translation: At first I thought about not talking to you anymore.
New Translation: 我本來再也不想找你說話了。

Text: But I can't stay mad at you forever. We share this connection, you know.
Old Text: But I can't stay mad at you forever. We share this connection, you know.
Old Translation: But I can't stay mad at you forever. We share this connection, you know.
New Translation: 但我總不能一直對你生氣。我們之間有著羈絆，你知道的。

Text: Come to me and I will make it even stronger.
Old Text: Come to me and I am going to make it even stronger.
Old Translation: Come to me and I will make it even stronger.
New Translation: 來找我吧，我能讓羈絆變得更強。

Text: Just like your friend Adrian. Remember him?
Old Text: Just like with your friend Adrian. Remember him?
Old Translation: Just like your friend Adrian. Remember him?
New Translation: 就像你的朋友艾德里安一樣。記得他嗎？

Text: Bah! Do you know what this whole place is Victor? Do you know its purpose?
Old Text: Bah! Do you know what this whole place is Victor? Do you know its purpose?
Old Translation: Bah! Do you know what this whole place is Victor? Do you know its purpose?
New Translation: 欸！你知道這是什麼地方嗎，維克多？你知道它的目的嗎？

Text: You figured it out a long time ago, I know. To lure self-righteous bastards like yourself and then kill them!
Old Text: You figured it out a long time ago, I know. To lure self-righteous BASTARDS like yourself in here and then KILL THEM!
Old Translation: You figured it out a long time ago, I know. To lure self-righteous bastards like yourself and then kill them!
New Translation: 我相信你早就猜到了。這是為了誘殺像你一樣自以為是的傢伙！

Text: Oh, and it works, believe me, it works. You hunters come like flies lured to manure and before you realize it -SNAP- it's too damn late!
Old Text: Oh, and it works, believe me, it works. You hunters come like flies lured to manure and before you realize it -SNAP- it's too damn late!
Old Translation: Oh, and it works, believe me, it works. You hunters come like flies lured to manure and before you realize it -SNAP- it's too damn late!
New Translation: 哦，非常有效，相信我。你們獵人像蒼蠅撲屎般地自投羅網，而且還沒意識到就──啪──飛不走了！

Text: How long are you going to make me wait, Vicky?
Old Text: How long are you going to make me wait, Vicky?
Old Translation: How long are you going to make me wait, Vicky?
New Translation: 你要讓我等多久啊，維琪？

Text: Do you feel unprepared for our encounter? Let me help.
Old Text: Do you feel unprepared for our encounter? Let me help.
Old Translation: Do you feel unprepared for our encounter? Let me help.
New Translation: 你還沒準備好與我對決嗎？讓我幫你一把吧。

Text: Buy yourself some nice gear to make this more sporting, will you?
Old Text: Buy yourself some nice gear to make this more sporting, will you?
Old Translation: Buy yourself some nice gear to make this more sporting, will you?
New Translation: 給自己買些好裝備，讓這一切更有趣，好嗎？

Text: Spiders. Of course there are more spiders.
Old Text: Spiders. Of course there will be more spiders.
Old Translation: Spiders. Of course there are more spiders.
New Translation: 蜘蛛，當然還有更多蜘蛛。

Old Translation: It appears the vampires have found a way to breed the demonic arachnids.

Old Translation: The grim reality is that the bloodsuckers strive to dominate everything that gives them even an ounce of power.

Text: For if there is one thing a vampire lusts for even more than blood...
Old Text: For if there is one thing a vampire lusts for even more than blood, it is control.
Old Translation: For if there is one thing a vampire lusts for even more than blood, it is control.
New Translation: 因為，有東西比鮮血更令吸血鬼渴求的……

Text: Can you feel their souls, Victor? The miners, hundreds of them, disfiguring the earth with their pickaxes and drills.
Old Text: Can you feel their souls, Victor? The miners, hundreds of them, disfiguring the earth with their pickaxes and drills.
Old Translation: Can you feel their souls, Victor? The miners, hundreds of them, disfiguring the earth with their pickaxes and drills.
New Translation: 你能感覺到他們的靈魂嗎，維克多？數以百計的礦工，用鎬子和鑽頭破壞土地。

Text: Can you sense their greed? The greed that made them dig that deep.
Old Text: Can you sense their greed? The greed that made them dig that deep.
Old Translation: Can you sense their greed? The greed that made them dig that deep.
New Translation: 你能感受到他們的貪婪嗎？那個讓他們越挖越深的貪婪。

Text: For it is that same greed that drives us all. The miners lust for gold and silver.
Old Text: For it is that same greed that drives us all. The miners lust for gold and silver.
Old Translation: For it is that same greed that drives us all. The miners lust for gold and silver.
New Translation: 同樣的貪婪驅使著我們所有人。礦工貪圖金銀財寶。

Text: You were just like them, only you desired power.
Old Text: You were just like them, only you desired power.
Old Translation: You were just like them, only you desired power.
New Translation: 你和他們一樣，只不過你渴望的是力量。

Text: You signed your contract and still wield that same demonic power to this day.
Old Text: You signed your contract and still wield that same demonic power to this day.
Old Translation: You signed your contract and still wield that same demon power to this day.
New Translation: 你簽訂了契約，直到今日還使用著惡魔之力。

Text: Are we so different - you and I?
Old Text: Are we so different - you and I?
Old Translation: Are we so different - you and I?

Text: You are looking for me in all the wrong places, Victor.
Old Text: You are looking for me in all the wrong places, Victor.
Old Translation: You are looking for me in all the wrong places, Victor.
New Translation: 你找我都找錯地方囉，維克多。

Text: Why don't you just give up? Or better yet, become one with the blood, like your dear friend Adrian?
Old Text: Why don't you just give up? Or better yet, become one with the blood, like your dear friend Adrian did some time ago?
Old Translation: Why don't you just give up? Or better yet, become one with the blood, like your dear friend Adrian?
New Translation: 為什麼不放棄呢？或者乾脆成為一個吸血鬼，就像你的摯友艾德里安一樣？

Text: You took a sliver of power once. I can offer you a lot more.
Old Text: You took a sliver of power once. I can offer you a lot more.
Old Translation: You took a sliver of power once. I can offer you a lot more.
New Translation: 你曾經獲得了一些力量。我可以給你更多。

Text: Knock-knock. Who's there? It's me, Vicky, and I have come to DIE!
Old Text: Knock-knock. Who's there? It's me, Vicky, I have come to DIE!
Old Translation: Knock-knock. Who's there? It's me, Vicky, and I have come to DIE!
New Translation: 叩叩叩。是誰呀？是我，維琪，我來送死了！

Text: Some nerve on you, hunter, barging into my mansion uninvited.
Old Text: Some nerve on you, hunter, barging in my mansion uninvited.
Old Translation: Some nerve on you, hunter, barging into my mansion uninvited.
New Translation: 你好大的膽子，獵人，未經邀請就闖入我的府邸。

Text: I have to say the other hunters had the decency to die without dirtying my carpets with their mortal FILTH beforehand!
Old Text: I have to say the other hunters had the decency to die without dirtying my carpets with their mortal FILTH beforehand!
Old Translation: I have to say the other hunters had the decency to die without dirtying my carpets with their mortal FILTH beforehand!
New Translation: 我必須說，其他獵人很有禮貌，在用凡人的穢氣弄髒我的地毯前就死了！

Text: Let me make sure you don't get too far. Your smell will take forever to go away.
Old Text: Let me make sure you don't get too far. Your smell will take forever to go away.
Old Translation: Let me make sure you don't get too far. Your smell will take forever to go away.
New Translation: 我會讓你走不了多遠的，你的氣味會永遠地消失。

Text: Oh, I can't wait for this little reunion of ours, teacher and pupil face to face once again!
Old Text: Oh, I just can't wait for this little reunion of ours, teacher and pupil face to face once again!
Old Translation: Oh, I can't wait for this little reunion of ours, teacher and pupil face to face once again!
New Translation: 哦，我等不及我們這小小的重逢了，師徒的再次聚首！

Text: You are not a teacher, Gabriel. You are not even the evil genius you imagine yourself to be.
Old Text: You are not a teacher, Gabriel. You are not even the evil genius that you imagine yourself to be.
Old Translation: You are not a teacher, Gabriel. You are not even the evil genius you imagine yourself to be.
New Translation: 你並不是老師，加百列，你甚至不是自認為的邪惡天才。

Text: You may be centuries old, but in all these lifetimes, you've been one thing and nothing more.
Old Text: You may be centuries old, but in all these lifetimes, you've been one thing and nothing more.
Old Translation: You may be centuries old, but in all these lifetimes, you've been one thing and nothing more.
New Translation: 你或許上百歲了，但在這些漫長的歲月裡，你依然如故，一成不變。

Text: Enlighten me, Vicky. Pray tell, what am I?
Old Text: Enlighten me, Vicky. Pray tell me, what am I?
Old Translation: Enlighten me, Vicky. Pray tell, what am I?
New Translation: 說明白點，維琪。請告訴我，我是什麼？

Text: <laughter>That's a good one, Vicky. I promise you, you will be BEGGING me to suck your blood by the time I'm through with you.
Old Text: <laughter>That's a good one, Vicky. I promise you, you will be BEGGING me to suck your blood by the time I'm through with you.
Old Translation: <laughter>That's a good one, Vicky. I promise you, you will be BEGGING me to suck your blood by the time I'm through with you.
New Translation: <laughter>這答案不錯，維琪。我向你保證，在我了結你的時候，你會「乞求」我吸你的血的。

Text: Why, if it isn't my friend - the Mad Hatter.<laughter>
Old Text: Why, if it isn't my friend - the Mad Hatter.<laughter>
Old Translation: Why, if it isn't my friend - the Mad Hatter.<laughter>
New Translation: 喲，這不是我的朋友──瘋帽客嗎。<laughter>

Text: Please, make yourself at home. Care for some... DEATH!?
Old Text: Please, make yourself at home. Care for some... DEATH!?
Old Translation: Please, make yourself at home. Care for some... DEATH!?
New Translation: 請，把這當自己家。要不要來點……死亡！？

Text: So how do you like the place?
Old Text: So how do you like the place?
Old Translation: So how do you like the place?

Text: It's a bit overwhelming for your brutish persona, isn't it?
Old Text: It is a bit overwhelming for your brutish persona, isn't it?
Old Translation: It's a bit overwhelming for your brutish persona, isn't it?
New Translation: 對你這樣粗俗的人來說是不是不太自在啊？

Text: Well, yes, I do have my hobbies, being immortal and all.
Old Text: Well, yes, I do have my hobbies, being immortal and all.
Old Translation: Well, yes, I do have my hobbies, being immortal and all.
New Translation: 好吧，是的，我有許多嗜好，成為不朽的化身。

Text: Playing with living things, making dead things out of them, making them living again and so on.
Old Text: Playing with living things, making dead things out of them, making them living again and so on.
Old Translation: Playing with living things, making dead things out of them, making them living again and so on.
New Translation: 玩弄活物，弄死他們，再弄活他們，諸如此類的。

Text: <mocking>You, you defeated me, how can this be true?<cough>
Old Text: <mocking>Oh no, you, you defeated me, how can this be true?<cough>
Old Translation: <mocking>You, you defeated me, how can this be true?<cough>

Text: <mocking> You...you are truly amazing, I am no match for <cough>for your splendor, skills and fine hats<cough>
Old Text: <mocking>I, you...you are truly amazing, I am no match for <cough>for your splendor, skills and fine hats<cough>
Old Translation: <mocking> You...you are truly amazing, I am no match for <cough>for your splendor, skills and fine hats<cough>
New Translation: <mocking>你、你真是了不起，我比不上你，<cough>比不上你的光彩、技巧，還有超屌的帽子。<cough>

Text: <mocking>Have mercy, oh great hunter, and... <shouting>JUST BUY A NEW HAT, WILL YOU!<laughter>
Old Text: <mocking>Have mercy, oh great hunter, and... <shouting>JUST BUY A NEW HAT, WILL YOU!<laughter>
Old Translation: <mocking>Have mercy, oh great hunter, and... <shouting>JUST BUY A NEW HAT, WILL YOU!<laughter>
New Translation: <mocking>饒了我吧，偉大的獵人……<shouting>你能不能買一頂新帽子啊！<laughter>

Text: Vicky, you DO know I'm only toying with you, right?
Old Text: Vicky, you DO know I'm only toying with you, right?
Old Translation: Vicky, you DO know I'm only toying with you, right?
New Translation: 維琪，你知道我只是陪你玩玩，對吧？

Text: Merely having a good laugh at your expense.
Old Text: Merely having a good laugh at your expense.
Old Translation: Merely having a good laugh at your expense.
New Translation: 不過是拿你尋開心罷了。

Text: I could quench your life with a snap of my fingers but where's the fun in that?
Old Text: I could quench your life with a snap of my fingers but where's the fun in that?
Old Translation: I could quench your life with a snap of my fingers but where's the fun in that?
New Translation: 我用兩根手指就能捏死你，但那樣還有什麼意思呢？

Text: Tell me, did the Solicitor send you my way?
Old Text: Tell me, did the Solicitor send you my way?
Old Translation: Tell me, did the Solicitor send you my way?
New Translation: 告訴我，是誘魂者派你來的嗎？

Text: I hoped you'd kill him for me and it looks like he had the same bright idea.
Old Text: I hoped you'd kill him for me and it looks like he had the same bright idea.
Old Translation: I hoped you'd kill him for me and it looks like he had the same bright idea.
New Translation: 我本來期望你會殺了牠，看來牠也有同樣聰明的想法。

Text: Only one hitch in his plan, though. I don't plan on dying. Not today, not ever.
Old Text: Only one hitch in his plan, though. I don't plan on dying. Not today, not ever.
Old Translation: Only one hitch in his plan, though. I don't plan on dying. Not today, not ever.
New Translation: 不過牠的計畫有一個問題。我不打算死。今天不會，以後也不會。

Text: You may not have much time left in this world, but please, don't take your rage out on my things!
Old Text: You may not have much time left in this world, but please, don't take your rage out on my things!
Old Translation: You may not have much time left in this world, but please, don't take your rage out on my things!
New Translation: 就算你命不久矣了，但是拜託，別把氣出在我的東西上！

Text: These intricate devices took me decades to assemble. Breaking them is just rude.
Old Text: These intricate devices took me decades to assemble. Breaking them is just rude.
Old Translation: These intricate devices took me decades to assemble. Breaking them is just rude.
New Translation: 這些精密設備花了我幾十年組裝。把它們弄壞簡直粗魯！

Text: Stop trashing my machines and die already!
Old Text: Stop trashing my machines and die already!
Old Translation: Stop trashing my machines and die already!
New Translation: 不要弄壞我的機器，去死！

Text: You are seriously PISSING ME OFF!
Old Text: You are seriously PISSING ME OFF!
Old Translation: You are seriously PISSING ME OFF!

Text: Just look at the mess you made!
Old Text: Just look at the mess you made!
Old Translation: Just look at the mess you made!

Text: <angrily>I'll smash you like the little pest you are!
Old Text: <angrily>I'll smash you like the little pest you are!
Old Translation: <angrily> I'll smash you like the little pest you are!

Text: And by the way, your hat still sucks.
Old Text: And by the way, your hat still sucks.
Old Translation: And by the way, your hat still sucks.
New Translation: 對了，你的帽子還是很蠢。

Text: Send my regards to the Solicitor.
Old Text: Send my regards to the Solicitor.
Old Translation: Send my regards to the Solicitor.

Text: Can evil ever be truly defeated?
Old Text: Can evil ever be truly defeated?
Old Translation: Can evil ever be truly defeated?

Text: Or is it eternal, like a dark seed, always finding new ways to sprout and corrupt the world?
Old Text: Or is it eternal, like a dark seed, always finding new ways to sprout and corrupt the world?
Old Translation: Or is it eternal, like a dark seed, always finding new ways to sprout and corrupt the world?
New Translation: 或者它是永恆的，就像一顆黑暗的種子，總能找到新的土壤發芽，然後腐化這個世界？

Text: What I do know is the soul of the elder vampire now belongs to the Solicitor, bound by the pact signed with his own unholy blood.
Old Text: What I do know is the soul of the elder vampire now belongs to the Solicitor, bound by the pact signed with his own unholy blood.
Old Translation: What I do know is the soul of the elder vampire now belongs to the Solicitor, bound by the pact signed with his own unholy blood.
New Translation: 我只知道這個古老吸血鬼的靈髓現在屬於誘魂者的了，被自己不淨之血所簽訂的契約束縛。

Text: In the end, he fell victim to his own plot.
Old Text: In the end, he fell victim to his own plot.
Old Translation: In the end, he fell victim to his own plot.
New Translation: 最終，他淪為了自己計畫的犧牲品。

Text: Some kind of justice, to be sure.
Old Text: Some kind of justice, to be sure.
Old Translation: Some kind of justice, to be sure.

Text: Queen Katarina's pact was destroyed in the final fight.
Old Text: Queen Katarina's pact was destroyed in the final fight.
Old Translation: Queen Katarina's pact was destroyed in the final fight.
New Translation: 卡特蓮娜女王的契約在決戰中被摧毀了。

Text: A difficult task lies ahead of her - rebuilding Zagoravia and dealing with the consequences of her past decisions.
Old Text: A difficult task lies ahead of her - rebuilding Zagoravia and dealing with the aftermath of all bad decisions in the past.
Old Translation: A difficult task lies ahead of her - rebuilding Zagoravia and dealing with the consequences of her past decisions.
New Translation: 她面臨一項艱巨的任務──重建扎戈拉維亞，設法彌補她過去的決定所帶來的後果。

Text: She is not the only one who has to rebuild.
Old Text: She is not the only one who has to rebuild.
Old Translation: She is not the only one who has to rebuild.
New Translation: 她並不是唯一一個必須去重建的人。

Text: Even in death, Gabriel accomplished his goals, tilting the balance of power in the world for the worse.
Old Text: Even in death, Gabriel accomplished his goals, tilting the balance of powers in the world for the worse.
Old Translation: Even in death, Gabriel accomplished his goals, tilting the balance of power in the world for the worse.
New Translation: 即使死了，加百列還是完成了他的目標，把世界力量的平衡向不好的方向傾斜。

Text: The Hunters Order is all but vanquished. Bearing my curse, I am not the person to restore it.
Old Text: The Hunters Order is all but vanquished. Bearing my curse, I am not the person to restore it.
Old Translation: The Family, our order of hunters, is all but vanquished. Bearing my curse, I am not the person to restore it.
New Translation: 獵魔組織被擊垮了。背負詛咒的我，並不是適合去恢復組織的人。

Text: But I know the right hunter for the job...
Old Text: But I know the right hunter for the job...
Old Translation: But I know the right hunter for the job...
New Translation: 但我知道適合這份工作的獵人……

Text: Years ago my friend Lemmy Kilmister encountered this world during his many travels.
A world torn apart by war, its people suffering under the oppression of a cruel politician.
Lemmy decided something had to be done.
This is why he left his precious creation Snaggletooth to stand against this evil.
For years the mighty rebel kept The Führer at bay.
But something went bad and now Snaggletooth lies silent and lifeless.
This is when I called for the demon hunter Victor.
First I heard about him from one of the weirdos hanging in my pub.
A demon hunter might be just the man to stand against such evil.
This place looks dead. More desolate than the Demon World.
How can something made of metal move like it's alive?
It looks twisted. Good that it can’t get up here.
Come to think of it, I wouldn't mind a drink right now.
Yes, that's Lemmy. He asked to be left alone though.
Victor, there you are! Grab a chair, everything is on the house!
Over there, that magnificent grand bastard is Snaggletooth, the one I wrote you about.
That's Snaggletooth? I could swear something that looked just like him attacked me out there.
No way! Unfortunately, our rebel is dead as a rock. Just look at him.
Snaggletooth fought the evil masters in three worlds. Without him to stand against these demons, they will soon ravage other worlds as well.
This is where you come in: Carry on the fight of Snaggletooth and my dear friend Lemmy. Kill the masters! Bring them what they deserve.
It's never that simple, Lloyd. They always come back --
They're mortal, Victor. I've found out as much. They might have been human once, but no more.
Alright. I'll pay a visit to those masters and see what I find. But I will not promise anything.
It's dangerous to go alone, so you'd better take this! It's a journal with my findings and Lemmy's stories that I've collected over all the years.
"I saw the millions, the naked and the dead...I saw a thousand bombers..."
Fearmongering and lies gave total power to Führer. He used it to sow the destruction and atrocities that now make up this world.
Needless to say, Lemmy and the rebels were having none of this.
I remember white heat radiating from a reflective, chromed husk.
I remember flames of vengeance engulfing the Führer’s cronies.
A truly unbeatable force had been unleashed to bring him down – Snaggletooth himself.
Lemmy wanted to make sure that no fellow rebel will be ever forgotten.
At every site where a brother or sister in arms has fallen, a powerful Monument of Rock was erected, infused with the music that was the essence of their spirit.
Oddly enough, these monuments seem to attract monsters like nothing else in this devastated world.
Lemmy once worked in a factory.
They told him to cut his hair or get a hair net – said it was a hazard!
Forget art and all that bullshit.
In the words of Lemmy, if you can send that shiver down a kid’s back, then that’s what it’s all about.
I’ve seen a lot of politicians come and go and they are all the same mealy-mouthed bastards,
kissing frikkin babies and shaking hands with hard hats and shit and everybody knows that it’s a game and they STILL play it.
Those are Lemmy's words, not mine.
We’ve never had a good world, we don’t understand how to make it in a good world.
The only thing we’ve really learned is how to kill more people from further away. That way we don't have to see it.
There once was a funny little man with tiny hands who dreamt of building the biggest one.
And he had the insane idea of forcing the ones behind it to build it with their own hands.
His minions loved him for it.
This world is strange. Ravaged by war, but not the kind I know.
This machine of war looks man-made.
What deranged mind would create such a thing?
What was so powerful that it could destroy these armored machines?
You need thousands of soldiers to wage a war like this.
The demons couldn't invent such a war.
They brought it here from another place.
I pity the world where it came from.
If that world is still alive.
The secret stash of some unlucky deserter, probably.
Machines built for war, fighting endless battles with bullets and bombs.
Powerful enough to bring destruction of this scale, yet a coward, hiding behind machinery.
Only war can bring strength! Only war can bring progress! Only war can bring peace!
In its flames a new race will be born, a master race to bring justice to every world!
And as these new conquerors are born, we will shout together: We have the power!
Today we find ourselves beset by envious enemies on all sides!
For, they smell the weakness of our incompetent leaders, and they mistake this weakness to be the weakness of the people.
Well, I ask you; Are you WEAK?
Victor Vran! Do you like my playground?
Mein war machine is waiting for you!
You have never seen anything like it!
Now this, demon hunter, is a bomber.
You have never seen anything like it, I know.
It is going to kill you! <laugh>
"Cry 'Havoc!', und let slip the dogs of war".
Oh, that was not from your world, hunter!
Don't worry, mein dogs don't mind!
No heroes in mein world, Victor.
When you die here, you're just a statistic.
You can defeat mein lieutenants, hunter, but you cannot defeat mein latest creation, mein Warpig tank!
Brought to life by the very essence of Snaggletooth, this machine of war will crush you in an instant!
Snaggletooth machine? Lloyd won’t believe this!
When Führer encountered Snaggletooth for the first time, he recognized both a threat to his regime, and the potential to solidify his rule by iron fist.
Section: MH-01-03 World Wars Banters in The Furnace

Text: Immediately, thousands of war prisoners were shoved into these vaults to work on some kind of a secret project.
Section: MH-01-03 World Wars Banters in The Furnace

Text: This place is hot as hell.
Section: MH-01-03 World Wars Banters in The Furnace

Text: I bet it attracts fire demons.
Section: MH-01-03 World Wars Banters in The Furnace
MH-01-03 World Wars Banters in The Furnace
MH-01-03 World Wars Banters in The Furnace

Text: I really don't want to know what happened here.
Section: MH-01-03 World Wars Banters in The Furnace

Text: Bombs and bullets were sufficient enough to bring on thorough destruction, but the Führer wanted something more sophisticated. He wanted something with an edge.
Section: MH-01-04 World Wars Banters in The Garrison

Text: I can only say that his experimentations are... well, they better stay forgotten.
Section: MH-01-04 World Wars Banters in The Garrison

Text: Now, during the earlier days of the fight against Führer, a while before Snaggletooth was unleashed; Lemmy and the rebels operated from this very place.
Section: MH-01-05 World Wars Banters in Bedeviled Vault

Text: A lot of legendary songs were written here, under the rhythm of constant bombardments outside.
Section: MH-01-05 World Wars Banters in Bedeviled Vault

Text: The evil warpig! It's a giant man made machine! The Führer built it to mimic Snaggletooth.
Section: MH-01-06 Cut Scene - Lemmy gives you his Bass

Text: Hmm, that makes sense - trying to use that tremendous power Snaggletooth embodies... Hey, Victor, let me fix you a drink before you kick its pretender ass.
Section: MH-01-06 Cut Scene - Lemmy gives you his Bass

Text: Lemmy had to leave, Victor, and he won't be coming back, I'm afraid. He feels that you are able. And it is now up to you now, to finish what he started.
Section: MH-01-06 Cut Scene - Lemmy gives you his Bass

Text: So you think have found a way to best me, hunter?
Nein, what you have found is your own destruction!
The time of heroes und rebels is over!
The time of mein machines has come!
Look at mein tank! Mein tank is amazing!
Powered by the very essence of Snaggletooth, it is the most destructive creation in the universe!
Nein, this cannot be! Nein. Nein! Nein!! Aaaaaaaaaaarrrrrrgh!
Never gamble with Lemmy! I lost all my money to him before he left. Feel free to buy anything you want. Even if you don’t want it.
Section: MH-01-07 Side conversation with Special Vendor

Text: Did you see that, man?! A glimpse of light in his eyes! Just like in the old days!
Section: MH-01-08 Cut scene after defeat of Corrupted Warpig

Text: Snaggletooth is not as dead as I thought. Perhaps there is hope! ... Yes, there is hope!
Section: MH-01-08 Cut scene after defeat of Corrupted Warpig

Text: Good job dealing with that fanatic. You bet your life you don't need religion, that's what Lemmy always said. Hey, here is a drink.
Section: MH-01-09 Conversation with Lloyd after boss fight

Text: The Preacher banned all kinds of gambling, alcohol and music.
The only enterntainment these poor people living here would get were the rotting corpses in the sun, hanging from gallows, and the massacres of so-called rebels.
Now everyone's either gone or corrupted.
Lemmy and the Sheriff once sat down in a game of cards. The loser had to leave town.
Just as the Sheriff had been dealt the seemingly winning hand, Lemmy drew the one card that would undo the Sheriff – the ace of... the ace of...was it clubs?
Damn it, damn it, I can’t remember! I don’t play cards.
"You don’t need no golden cross to tell you wrong from right. The world’s worst murderers were those who saw the light."
Lies, manipulation and absolute power over the masses. That's the Preacher's religion in a nutshell.
Filling the people's minds with religious bullshit, that’s what the Preacher can do best.
There is only one god, faith healing, making people scared about hell, making them excited about desperate virgins waiting in heaven... You name it...
The native tribes had fought the Preacher and lost. The Sheriff and his Deputy tried to drive him out but met a grim fate.
In the end, under the guise of doing God’s bidding, he had poisoned people’s minds so much, that even death turned its bony back on this place, perpetuating those who outlived any decency.
<preaching>The Lord looks down upon us and peers deep into our wretched souls.
He sees sickness; he sees the works of the devil.
We have betrayed our loving father, betrayed him by permitting sinners to walk free, to stand between us and our savior.
<preaching>And I will strike down upon thee with great vengeance and furious anger those who attempt to poison and destroy my brothers.
And you will know I am the Lord when I lay my vengeance upon you.
<preaching>Conflict follows wrongdoing as surely as flies follow the herd.
And we shall punish each and every wrongdoer on this scourged earth in the name of our Lord, and lo, there will be peace in the herd, and the herd will follow in the word of the Lord!
The pagans, who resisted the one true Lord, are gone forever.
Soon all other sinners will follow them into damnation!
What evil corrupted this world, I wonder.
The path of God. "Only in the leap from the lion's head will he prove his worth."
At least they wear proper hats in this place.
Natives tried to protect themselves from demons and religion with these totems.
And restless dead below the ground.
Even criminals and desperados resisted the Preacher’s rule at first.
The legend goes that a vicious gang fought him and lost, slaughtered to the last man.
The Preacher was smart enough to recognize the threat that Snaggletooth would be for his order and sought to counter it early enough.
An army of undead workers was ordered to dig up this canyon for the precious mystical metal with which the mechanical beast Ograsmatron was built.
The tribe folk whisper that death had abandoned this realm in disbelief after the Preacher had asserted his “holy” order.

Those who would not serve as undead forever could escape persecution by drowning themselves in the waters of the slowly vanishing springs deep under the mountains, the only place where one could truly die.
Welcome to our holiest shrine, devil!
Section: MH-02-05 Wild West Orgazmatron Boss Fight

Text: This place of worship will be your doom!
Section: MH-02-05 Wild West Orgazmatron Boss Fight

Text: This is our new church, a place which my flock has built to defeat the blasphemous idol Snaggletooth!
Section: MH-02-05 Wild West Orgazmatron Boss Fight
MH-02-05 Wild West Orgazmatron Boss Fight

Text: The power of the Lord compels you, sinner!
Section: MH-02-05 Wild West Orgazmatron Boss Fight

Text: Bow your head and face HIS judgment – spare yourself mine.
Section: MH-02-05 Wild West Orgazmatron Boss Fight

Text: No, no, please don't kill me!
Section: MH-02-05 Wild West Orgazmatron Boss Fight

Text: Mercy, mercy, I don't want to go back, no, noooo!
Section: MH-02-05 Wild West Orgazmatron Boss Fight

Text: It's alive! Snaggletooth woke up again, but just for a few moments.
Section: MH-02-06 Cut scene after Orgazmatron defeat

Text: Don't give up, Victor! You can bring him back to life.
Section: MH-02-06 Cut scene after Orgazmatron defeat

Text: Now, once upon a time there was a Queen. The "Queen of the Damned" they called her.
Section: MH-03-01 Queen of the Damned Banters

Text: She kept her eternal beauty by bathing in blood. Only the screams of the tortured helped her sleep at night.
Section: MH-03-01 Queen of the Damned Banters

Text: This massive castle is where the Queen resides - if there is a Hell on Earth, this is the place.
Section: MH-03-01 Queen of the Damned Banters

Text: Every night she sent out her most loyal, evil servants to steal the remaining children from their mothers arms and to bring any rebelling citizens straight to her.
Section: MH-03-01 Queen of the Damned Banters

Text: No one who entered the Castle that way ever came back.
Section: MH-03-01 Queen of the Damned Banters

Text: The only thing the Queen loves is her riches.
Section: MH-03-01 Queen of the Damned Banters

Text: Lemmy once said: “Fame and fortune? I’ll be famous, but I’ll never be rich.
Section: MH-03-01 Queen of the Damned Banters

Text: If I had a million dollars one day, I’d spend it all on goodies.”
Section: MH-03-01 Queen of the Damned Banters

Text: Was the Queen ever happy, even at the height of her conquests?
Section: MH-03-01 Queen of the Damned Banters

Text: Nah, you can’t get a smile out of rich people with a frikkin crowbar!
Section: MH-03-01 Queen of the Damned Banters

Text: Rich people are usually miserable bastards, Lemmy always said that.
Section: MH-03-01 Queen of the Damned Banters

Text: Desire is the key to the soul. The burning flames of desire are in everyone, eating them from within.
Section: MH-03-01 Queen of the Damned Banters

Text: To satisfy the urges of their deepest desire, they will damn their souls, lay their world at my feet and crown me as their Queen.
Section: MH-03-01 Queen of the Damned Banters

Text: A band of bards has found their way into my realm, bringing along with them a most curious beast named Snaggletooth.
Section: MH-03-01 Queen of the Damned Banters

Text: The bards dare openly challenge my reign, not able to grasp the simplest facts of life. The strong will always rule over the weak, the rich will always own the poor.
Section: MH-03-01 Queen of the Damned Banters
MH-03-01 Queen of the Damned Banters

Text: A demon-infested, grim kind of home.
Section: MH-03-01 Queen of the Damned Banters

Text: Now, let me find this Queen and introduce myself.
Section: MH-03-01 Queen of the Damned Banters

Text: Those were crop fields long ago.
Section: MH-03-01 Queen of the Damned Banters
MH-03-01 Queen of the Damned Banters
MH-03-01 Queen of the Damned Banters
MH-03-01 Queen of the Damned Banters

Text: Hello, old friends! Did you miss me?
Section: MH-03-01 Queen of the Damned Banters

Text: The castle. The Queen of the Damned can't be far away.
Section: MH-03-01 Queen of the Damned Banters

Text: Let's see what is in this cellar.
My bet is on the usual - wine, demons and witches.
Time stopped flowing here long ago.
The ruling family would isolate themselves within their castle, lost in dark deeds, greed and search for immortality.
In between, the ordinary people would perish in riots, in plagues and in famine.
The rich never cared about the poor and this time was no different.
I have a feeling that the slaughtered in this place won't be mere animals.
The bloodless remains of the victims were often tossed back to the peasants, as there was nothing else left for them to fill their stomachs.
Giving their miserable lives or their young’s blood to serve me is their privilege.
My silky skin, my perpetual youth and my mystical powers – surely they are worth more than the lives of few peasants.
In the early days of the Queen's reign she summoned an aberration, an aberration that feasted on warmth, just as the queen feasted on greed, blood and suffering.
This whole place froze, the warmth was sucked out of the air.
The beast was eventually defeated by Snaggletooth, but its lair still carries the taint.
Some unholy ritual took place here.
Let's see what the succubi left behind.
The Queen of the Damned took the reins of the realm virtually without challenge.
Section: MH-03-04 Pathway to Queen of the Damned

Text: Insatiably hungry for riches and immortality, the nobles had condemned themselves through dark pacts.
Section: MH-03-04 Pathway to Queen of the Damned

Text: They practically rolled out the red carpet for her.
Section: MH-03-04 Pathway to Queen of the Damned

Text: That bitch, the Queen, preys on the peasants, herding them like cattle, bathing into their blood.
Section: MH-03-04 Pathway to Queen of the Damned

Text: Take the fight to her! Eat the rich, feed the poor!
Section: MH-03-04 Pathway to Queen of the Damned

Text: Do you like my domain, Victor?
Section: MH-03-04 Pathway to Queen of the Damned
MH-03-04 Pathway to Queen of the Damned

Text: I captured the soul of the beast Snaggletooth and you will be my next trophy!
Section: MH-03-04 Pathway to Queen of the Damned

Text: Some fresh blood would do wonders for the Royal bloodline!
Section: MH-03-04 Pathway to Queen of the Damned

Text: At last I have you in my parlor, Victor!
Section: MH-03-05 Queen of the Damned Boss fight

Text: So close now that I can feel the world that you came from!
Section: MH-03-05 Queen of the Damned Boss fight

Text: I will devour it as I devoured this one!
Section: MH-03-05 Queen of the Damned Boss fight

Text: Embrace me, Victor. Let us dance!
Section: MH-03-05 Queen of the Damned Boss fight
MH-03-05 Queen of the Damned Boss fight

Text: Are you this gentle with all women?
Section: MH-03-05 Queen of the Damned Boss fight
MH-03-05 Queen of the Damned Boss fight

Text: Does your blood look good on me?
Section: MH-03-05 Queen of the Damned Boss fight
MH-03-05 Queen of the Damned Boss fight

Text: I captured the essence of Snaggletooth himself.
Section: MH-03-05 Queen of the Damned Boss fight

Text: Like sin and blood, I am eternal!
Section: MH-03-05 Queen of the Damned Boss fight
MH-03-05 Queen of the Damned Boss fight

Text: With a final scream the vile queen burst into oblivion.
Free from her magic, the trapped soul of Snaggletooth returned to his body.
Lemmy's greatest creation, the rebel Snaggletooth lives again.
I have a new favorite place to get a drink. And a new friend.
I never had the chance to really get to know the man who started it all. And I never will.
Lemmy Kilmister. Born to lose, live to win.
I am the master of this place and I've got total power here but, alas, I'm powerless outside. But enough of this - what can I get you to drink, buddy?
Here are Lemmy's doodles. He loved to scribble the crap out of every piece of paper in this place.
Section: MH-04-01 Side Conversation Lloyd introduces Doodles
MH-04-01 Side Conversation Lloyd introduces Doodles

Text: I've got have something else for you here, something to help you along. Some of Lemmy's magic, a Motorpower you could say.
Section: MH-04-02 Side Conversation Lloyd offers Demon Powers 1

Text: I have something else for you, something to support you in your fight. Another of Lemmy’s grand Motörpowers.
Section: MH-04-03 Side Conversation Lloyd offers Demon Powers 2

Text: There you go. One more Motörpower for you.
Section: MH-04-04 Side Conversation Lloyd offers Demon Powers 3

Text: You know, Victor, like my pub here, Lemmy's music – Motörhead - is a universal thing. It goes for everybody. We don’t segregate our audience. Anybody who watches our thing and enjoys it deserves a place to see us.
I always preferred my low-tech mop over high-tech weapons. And I love the cocktail shaker, of course. The magic potions I brew can really blow you off your ass!

What is Rock & Roll? In the immortal words of Lemmy, Rock is about going out on a Saturday night, getting drunk, being sick down your threads and pulling a bird – although not necessarily in that order.
The Locus. This will be my base of operations. A bit cold and hostile but it should do.
Section: TAL-001 Victor enters the Fractured World for the first time and sees the only stable place which is going to be his foothold

Text: The Solicitor told me the first shard of the Astrolabe would be here.
Section: TAL-001 Victor enters the Fractured World for the first time and sees the only stable place which is going to be his foothold

Text: What is this light? As if it wants to be found.
Section: TAL-001 Victor enters the Fractured World for the first time and sees the only stable place which is going to be his foothold

Text: That is only the first shard of my precious creation; The Astrolabe. Follow its directions and you will find the rest. I will help you complete it.
Section: TAL-002 Victor has taken the Pointer - the first piece of the Astrolabe and receives instructions

Text: The Fracture is the emanation of chaos. Trust nothing but your intuition, Victor, or the Fracture will consume you and grind your essence like the rest of this hapless world.
Section: TAL-003 Victor enters the chaotic labyrinth of the Fracture for the first time

Text: How can I know where to find the Frame then?
Section: TAL-003 Victor enters the chaotic labyrinth of the Fracture for the first time

Text: You cannot. That's the charm of it.
Section: TAL-003 Victor enters the chaotic labyrinth of the Fracture for the first time

Text: Strange. As if the artifacts react to their reunion. I can't shake the feeling that the Pointer turned on its own, towards Ea.
Section: TAL-004 After fusing the Pointer to the Frame of the Astrolabe

Text: How can a place touched by chaos look so beautiful and ordered?
Section: TAL-005 Admiring the arcane beauty of the Hanging Gardens of Ea for the first time

Text: Beautiful but deadly, hunter. When the Astrolabe was shattered, the souls I used to power it took shape. They are still bound to it. But nothing you cannot handle.
Section: TAL-005 Admiring the arcane beauty of the Hanging Gardens of Ea for the first time

Text: Is this an illusion? The surface of the artifact changes. This image in the crooked brass looks like a ruined city. It led me to the right place once, it could do it again.
Section: TAL-006 Victor finds the next piece and after fusing them begins to realize that the artifact is indeed alive

Text: An entire world of ruins. What happened here?
Section: TAL-007 Shocked after seeing the endless plane of ruin that is the Cadaver City

Text: Nothing and everything - the Cadaver City is the emanation of the ruin mortals bring upon themselves in all worlds and all times. You should concentrate on your task if you want to avoid the fate of the fallen.
Section: TAL-007 Shocked after seeing the endless plane of ruin that is the Cadaver City

Text: A breath of fresh forest air, rustling of leaves. This is new. The artifact grows more creative in its messages.
Section: TAL-008 First strong illusion from the now-awakening Astrolabe

Text: The contrast is mesmerizing, from a lifeless husk of a city to a living forest!
Section: TAL-009 Entering the Amaranthine Forest for the first time

Text: A twisted imitation of life, nonetheless. Spare no time wondering, hunter. It must be completed.
Section: TAL-009 Entering the Amaranthine Forest for the first time

Text: The new shard fuses perfectly and... There it is, the vision, a cold spooky womb of a vast cavern closing around me. I'll never get used to this.
Section: TAL-010 Fusing the next shard into the Astrolabe

Text: I feel strange. What am I doing here? Who am I?
Section: TAL-011 Entering the Lethean Caverns for the first time

Text: Concentrate, hunter. Indeed, the waters of the river Lethe had drained long ago, but its essence of oblivion still lingers. Hold tight to the Astrolabe and it will remind you of your purpose.
Section: TAL-011 Entering the Lethean Caverns for the first time

Text: The Astrolabe cannot be completed here. You need stability to counteract the entropy of chaos. Return to the Locus, hunter.
Section: TAL-012 Finding the last shard of the first section of the Astrolabe

Text: The Astrolabe kindly rewards those who serve it, Victor.
Section: TAL-013 Victor returns with the first section of the Astrolabe completed and the artifact materializes a kind reward in front of him

Text: I thought it was meant to serve me.
Section: TAL-013 Victor returns with the first section of the Astrolabe completed and the artifact materializes a kind reward in front of him

Text: I promised no such thing. Your relationship is one of mutual interest. It craves to be completed and you need it for your own goals.
Section: TAL-013 Victor returns with the first section of the Astrolabe completed and the artifact materializes a kind reward in front of him

Text: The Astrolabe is a wise advisor. Follow its instructions. Without question. Farewell, mortal.
Section: TAL-013 Victor returns with the first section of the Astrolabe completed and the artifact materializes a kind reward in front of him
TAL-013 Victor returns with the first section of the Astrolabe completed and the artifact materializes a kind reward in front of him

Text: The artifact grows stronger by the hour. It has a warm, peaceful presence in my thoughts leading me in the right direction.
Section: TAL-014 Victor takes time to reflect on his situation and the connection with the Astrolabe

Text: The new shard fuses with the Astrolabe and I am filled with purpose and completeness. I glimpse a distant vision: myself as a demon. Then in the blink of an eye it's gone.
Section: TAL-015 The self-consciousness of Victor warns him for the crawling influence of the Astrolabe but is dismissed

Text: The glory of the Hanging Gardens brings me painful memories of my lost kingdom. It haunted me for years and I grew used to the lingering anguish. Soon it will be over. I must press on.
Section: TAL-016 The Astrolabe subtly begins projecting painful memories to later grant relief and pleasure to Victor

Text: This one is different: I see myself departing from my devastated homeland. But there is no discomfort, only the vibrant warmth of the shard.
Section: TAL-017 The Astrolabe rewards Victor with relief from the painful memories

Text: If it wasn't for the Astrolabe I would have wasted a lifetime hunting demons. I see the truth now. I'm no longer a prisoner of my past.
Section: TAL-018 The Astrolabe starts making Victor repelled by his past

Text: The Astrolabe in my hand pulses with my heartbeat. The routine is familiar: another shard, another moment of bliss. Then emptiness. I need to find more.
Section: TAL-019 Victor falls deeper into the influence of the Astrolabe

Text: Through my whole life I kept reminding myself of my past mistakes. Now I ask myself why. How can I help anyone if I don't help myself first?
Section: TAL-020 The self-consciousness of Victor is almost completely overwhelmed by his wish to compensate for his past and by the Astrolabe

Text: The only way to reach for the future is to let go of my past. The Astrolabe is here to guide me and I need nothing more in my heart.
Section: TAL-021 Victor has given himself in

Text: I should have run away years ago, run away from my past that makes me half a person. My only hope is the Astrolabe. My only hope...
Section: TAL-022 The Astrolabe completely changed the desires of Victor to match its own

Text: My hands are shaking with excitement. Don't drop the shard, Victor. What if it breaks? No, no, that can't happen.
I am glad you returned safely, Victor. How does your journey progress?
Section: TAL-024 The Solicitor tries to push Victor over the edge

Text: It's strange but I’ve never felt so free before. Free from guilt, free from grief. As if my past never happened.
Section: TAL-024 The Solicitor tries to push Victor over the edge

Text: I had hoped to hear that, Victor. The Astrolabe lets you focus on what is most important to you. Now you realize that you sacrificed too much in your exile, fighting the power of the demon. Follow your heart's desire, Victor.
Section: TAL-024 The Solicitor tries to push Victor over the edge

Text: Wait. Do I really need to run away from my past to feel better? Was everything I did so wrong? And this. The Astrolabe presence cuts sharply in my mind. What do you want from me?
Section: TAL-025 The self-consciousness of Victor has not abandoned him yet

Text: I am watching my own shaking hand fusing the shard in the urging Astrolabe. It promises happiness. Here it comes. Bliss. And more bliss. But this time it is different, tainted by my doubts.
Section: TAL-026 Victor reflects on his situation for the first time

Text: Had I gone too far? Did I reject my own self in favor of another Victor? I feel cold on the inside, only the spirit of the Astrolabe glows like a small sun.

Aaaa… Aaaaaa… Aaaaaargh! It’s over! Why it is over? The ecstasy threatened to erase my conscience and I barely managed to come back. My dearest tried to enslave me! I feel empty and betrayed. Who had I become?
Section: TAL-028 Victor begins to realize he has traded his own self for simple pleasures given by an object

Text: Father. I remember the day you died. The grief and desperation are no less even now. No! I do not need your false comfort, demon contraption. You are a tool, not my master.
Section: TAL-029 The one memory Victor never wanted to abandon brings him back

Text: The shard is back in its place and I still tremble from the effort I spent to resist its influence. It tried to take over me again. The panic engulfed me until I remembered who I was.
This is my own tale and the Astrolabe is nothing but my pen. It knows it and grows more vicious.
Section: TAL-031 Victor is ready for one last push against the Astrolabe

Text: I felt the agony of the Astrolabe as I held the shard an inch away from it. When I was sure the artifact was subdued, I let the piece join the rest. It lies calm and silent now but I already know where to find the last shard.
Are you looking for something, Victor?
Section: TAL-033 Victor confronts the Solicitor who plotted against him the whole time

Text: The last shard of the Astrolabe. You have it.
Section: TAL-033 Victor confronts the Solicitor who plotted against him the whole time

Text: Always so bothersome. Why couldn't you give in and succumb to the artifact? It would have made all of us so much happier.
Section: TAL-033 Victor confronts the Solicitor who plotted against him the whole time

Text: Your foul schemes end now, demon. Hand over the shard or face the consequences.
Section: TAL-033 Victor confronts the Solicitor who plotted against him the whole time

Text: I will not fight you, Victor. The memory of our last confrontation still lingers. If I cannot have The Astrolabe neither can you. I have thrown the shard into the depths of the Fracture. Now none of us shall have it.
Section: TAL-033 Victor confronts the Solicitor who plotted against him the whole time

Text: I still have my chance to find it, demon. You’ve lost yours.  The shard will be mine.
Section: TAL-033 Victor confronts the Solicitor who plotted against him the whole time

Text: Be my guest. It will be amusing to watch you fail.
Section: TAL-033 Victor confronts the Solicitor who plotted against him the whole time

Text: You must be careful what you wish for, as it might come true. My wish nearly cost me my soul. The Fractured Worlds taught me a lesson:. It is what you do that defines who you are.
The guardians of the mortal race.
When Zagoravia fell, they came in droves.
New Translation: 當扎戈拉維亞淪陷時，他們紛紛到來。
他們認為他們準備好了。
他們看起來自信滿滿，攻無不克。

Text: They carved a bloody path through the petty monsters,
New Translation: 他們在怪物群中殺出一條血路，

Text: deeper and deeper into the cursed city.
New Translation: 一步一步深入這座詛咒之城。
<emphasis>直到他們遇見了怪物的主人。

Text: I hunt demons for a living. It is a lonely trade.
New Translation: 我以獵殺惡魔為生。這是個孤獨的行業。

Text: At first you're the hero, the savior.
New Translation: 最初你是英雄，是救世主。

Text: But when the job is done, things quickly change.
Old Text: When the job is done, people quickly cool off.
Old Translation: But when the job is done, things quickly change.
New Translation: 但當工作完成後，狀況很快就變了。

Text: People realize you're as much a monster as the ones you hunt.
Old Text: They realize you're as much a monster as the ones you hunt.
Old Translation: People realize you're as much a monster as the ones you hunt.
New Translation: 人們意識到你和你獵殺的東西一樣是怪物。

Text: Some demons are mindless. Those are the easy ones.
Old Text: Some demons are mindless. The easy ones.
Old Translation: Some demons are mindless. Those are the easy ones.
New Translation: 有些惡魔是不會思考的。那些很容易解決。

Text: Others are fierce and cunning warriors, fearless and ancient machines of destruction.
New Translation: 還有一些是兇猛狡猾的戰士，無畏且古老的毀滅機器。

Text: The worst are the ones that talk.
New Translation: 最棘手的是會說話的傢伙。

Text: Words have power, and demons use them to bind you in ways that you may not understand.
Old Text: Whatever you say to a demon has power that binds you in ways that you may not understand.
Old Translation: Words have power, and demons use them to bind you in ways that you may not understand.
New Translation: 語言是有力量的，惡魔能利用語言以你無法理解的方式束縛你。
<red>禁咒在休閒模式下無法啟用。</red>

Text: (INACTIVE: Change to Normal mode and activate the required Hexes)
New Translation: （無法完成：請切換到普通模式再啟用要求的禁咒）

Text: INACTIVE: Change to Normal mode and activate the required Hexes
New Translation: 無法完成：請切換到普通模式再啟用要求的禁咒

New Translation: 你確定要切換到<game_mode>嗎？你可以隨時切換普通或休閒模式。

Text: Loot drops are reduced in Casual mode.
New Translation: 在休閒模式下物品掉落數會降低。

Text: Trade this with GebaN for special items.
New Translation: 用這個與Ｇ瘦交易特殊物品。

Text: Trade this with GebaN in the Cauldron of Chaos for special items.
New Translation: 用這個與混沌之局裡的Ｇ瘦交易特殊物品。

New Translation: 手把<number>失去連接。請重新連接手把或關閉此訊息以切換到<new_control_set>操作。

Text: Select Return to HUB from the in-game menu
You have unlocked Lloyd's Journal. Search for new entries throughout the world
Do you know that the gold which you bring here has some peculiar physical qualities? Perhaps it comes from the demon world.
Section: side: Alchemist 01 On why demons drop gold
Old Text: Do you know that the gold which you bring here has some peculiar physical qualities? Perhaps it comes from the demon world.
Old Translation: Do you know that the gold which you bring here has some peculiar physical qualities? Perhaps it comes from the demon world.
New Translation: 你知道你帶來的金幣含有某種奇特的物質嗎？也許它來自魔界。

Section: side: Alchemist 01 On why demons drop gold

Text: Never mind, what can I offer you today?
Section: side: Alchemist 01 On why demons drop gold
Old Text: Never mind, what can I offer you today?
Old Translation: Never mind, what can I offer you today?
New Translation: 別介意，今天我能為你提供什麼呢？

Text: I hope that contraption of yours isn't going to blow up the castle.
Section: side: Alchemist 011 Presenting the device to remake items
Old Text: I hope that contraption of yours is not going to blow up the castle.
Old Translation: I hope that contraption of yours isn't going to blow up the castle.
New Translation: 我希望你的怪發明不會把城堡炸掉。

Text: If I didn't know you I'd be insulted. Since we're friends I'll introduce you to my little baby - the Desolidifier! Oh, wait, this is not the right one. Ah, here it is - the Transmogrifier 10,000!
Section: side: Alchemist 011 Presenting the device to remake items
Old Text: If I didn't know you I'd be insulted. Since we're friends I'll introduce you to my little baby - the Desolidifier! Oh, wait, this is not the right one. Ah, here it is - the Transmogrifier 10000!
Old Translation: If I didn't know you I'd be insulted. Since we're friends I'll introduce you to my little baby - the Desolidifier! Oh, wait, this is not the right one. Ah, here it is - the Transmogrifier 10,000!
New Translation: 要不是我認識你，我會以為這是侮辱。自從我們成了朋友，我來介紹你看看我的寶貝吧──反固器！哦，等等，不是這個。啊，找到了──合成器10000！

Text: Oh yes, I've been trying to fix it ever since we fled here and now it works almost every time! It allows you to transfer matter and essence from one form to another, in other words, to change the way your equipment works or to create completely different, and much better items! The only drawback of this prototype is that it will consume a tiny bit of your gold every time you use it.
Section: side: Alchemist 011 Presenting the device to remake items
Old Text: I've been trying to fix it ever since we fled here and now it works almost every time! It allows you to transfer matter and essence from one form to another, in other words, to change the way your equipment works or to create completely different, much better items! The only drawback of this prototype is that it will consume a tiny bit of your gold every time you use it.
Old Translation: Oh yes, I've been trying to fix it ever since we fled here and now it works almost every time! It allows you to transfer matter and essence from one form to another, in other words, to change the way your equipment works or to create completely different, and much better items! The only drawback of this prototype is that it will consume a tiny bit of your gold every time you use it.
New Translation: 沒錯，自從逃到這裡，我一直試著修好它，現在差不多好了！它能讓你把物質與原質轉化為另一種，也就是說，能改變裝備運作的方式，或者能創造完全不同的、更好的物品！這個試作品唯一的缺點就是，每次使用時會消耗一點點的金幣。

Section: side: Alchemist 011 Presenting the device to remake items

Text:
A hunter should stay a hunter, right? Do what she is supposed to do! I am supposed to sell you all these gadgets and observe their effects in the name of science. Our fiery Irene is supposed to slay monsters and probably die a horrible death.

Why is she taking over my business, that's what I'd like to know?
Section: side: Alchemist 02 On Irene as vendor
Old Text:
A hunter should stay a hunter, right? Do what she is supposed to do! I am supposed to sell you all these gadgets and observe their effects in the name of science. Our fiery Irene is supposed to slay monsters and probably die a horrible death.

Why is she taking over my business, that's what I'd like to know?

獵人就該有獵人的樣子，對吧？去做她應該做的事！我才應該以科學的名義把這些裝備全賣給你並觀察它們的效用。我們那火爆的艾琳就應該去斬妖除魔，再悽慘的死去。

為什麼她要搶我的生意？真叫人納悶。

Text:
Did I hear you right, Victor? A spirit is sending you to fight demons? A spirit that only hunters can see?

Now, I might have a bottle with a spirit of my own for your condition...

Did I hear you right, Victor? A spirit is sending you to fight demons? A spirit that only hunters can see?

我沒聽錯吧，維克多？鬼魂派你去對抗惡魔？而且只有獵人能看見？

好吧，我好像有一瓶藥能治療你的症狀……

Text: It was a pleasure knowing you, Victor. Any last purchases?

Good job, Victor! Pardon me for asking, but whom did you talk to just after you dealt with Apocalypse?

Good job, Victor! Pardon me for asking, but whom did you talk to just after you dealt with Apocalypse?

幹得好，維克多！恕我冒昧，請問你解決天啟後和誰在說話？
 
等等，不要告訴我。深呼吸，放鬆。何不來看看我的貨呢？

Text:
A first vampire is a force to be reckoned with, Victor. To stand a chance in your fight, be sure to leave well prepared and fully stocked!

Have a look at my inventory, while I pack my things, just in case.

吸血鬼真祖的力量不可小覷，維克多。為了些微的勝算，做好萬全的準備再出發吧！

趁我收拾行李的時候，來看看我的貨吧，以防萬一。

Text: The voice in my head is ruining my concentration. Is he doing it on purpose?

Old Text: I am getting fed up with this.

Section: side: GabeN 02 Repeating lines of the trader demon

Text: You spare me and I will sell you some special goodies. An exceptional promotion, just for you!
Section: side: GabeN 02 Repeating lines of the trader demon
Old Text: You spare me and I will sell you some special goodies. An exceptional promotion, just for you!
Old Translation: You spare me and I will sell you some special goodies. An exceptional promotion, just for you!
New Translation: 你放我一條生路，我會賣你一些好東西。特別再給你折扣喲！

Text: Look for me in other places and I may offer you something else.

Old Text: Look for me in other places and I may offer you something else.
Old Translation: Look for me in other places and I may offer you something else.
New Translation: 在其它地方找我，我可能會賣你別的東西。

Text:
It gets to you, doesn't it? Seeing so many hunters fallen in their fight against the darkness.

We've lost too many members of the Order in Zagoravia. We must avenge them, you and I.
Section: side: Irene 01 On the fallen Hunters
Old Text:
It gets to you, doesn't it? Seeing so many fallen hunters perished in their fight against darkness.

We've lost too many members of the Order in Zagoravia, Victor. We must avenge them, you and I.
Old Translation:
It gets to you, doesn't it? Seeing so many hunters fallen in their fight against the darkness.

We've lost too many members of the Order in Zagoravia. We must avenge them, you and I.
New Translation:
看著這麼多獵人在與黑暗的抗戰中倒下。這讓你改變了心意，不是嗎？

我們在扎戈拉維亞失去太多組織成員了。我們必須為他們報仇。

Text:
During my last foray I met Tzar Borimir. I don't know what you did to the old spook, but he is much more lucid now. We had a nice little chat, hunter to hunter.

The Tzar seems to have some high hopes for you. But don't get yourself killed on his account.
Section: side: Irene 02 On Tzar Borimir after he finds rest
Old Text:
During my last foray I met Tzar Borimir. I don't know what you did to the old spook, but he is much more lucid now. We had a nice little chat, hunter to hunter.

The Tzar seems to have some high hopes for you. Don't get yourself killed on his account, Victor Vran.
Old Translation:
During my last foray I met Tzar Borimir. I don't know what you did to the old spook, but he is much more lucid now. We had a nice little chat, hunter to hunter.

The Tzar seems to have some high hopes for you. But don't get yourself killed on his account.
New Translation:
上次冒險的途中，我遇見了波利密爾沙皇。我不知道你對老沙皇做了什麼，但祂現在神智非常清醒。我們愉快地聊了一會，獵人之間的交流。

沙皇似乎對你有很高的期望，但可別因此害自己送了性命。

Text: We were so blinded by the hordes of demons coming from beyond our world. We failed to see that the real enemy is from our very own. Vampires. Show them no pity, Victor.
Old Text: We were so blinded by the hordes of demons coming from beyond our world. We failed to see that our real enemy is from our very own. Vampires! Show them no pity, Victor Vran.
Old Translation: We were so blinded by the hordes of demons coming from beyond our world. We failed to see that the real enemy is from our very own. Vampires. Show them no pity, Victor.
New Translation: 我們被來自異界的惡魔蒙蔽了雙眼，而忽略了真正的敵人來自我們的世界。吸血鬼。不要對他們心存憐憫，維克多。

Text: So, Gabriel is one of the first vampires. He's the one behind all of this and you're going to confront him.
Old Text: So, Gabriel is one of the first vampires? He is the one behind all of this and you are going to get him?
Old Translation: So, Gabriel is one of the first vampires. He's the one behind all of this and you're going to confront him.
New Translation: 加百列是吸血鬼真祖中的一位。他是這一切的幕後黑手，而你將要對抗他。

Old Text: Don't worry, I will be careful.

Text: Don't be careful. Be frightful! Make this creature of the past feel your wrath! Avenge our Order! Good hunting, Victor Vran!
Old Text: Don't be careful. Be frightful! Make this quaint thing of the past feel your wrath! Avenge our Order! Good hunting, Victor Vran!
Old Translation: Don't be careful. Be frightful! Make this creature of the past feel your wrath! Avenge our Order! Good hunting, Victor Vran!
New Translation: 不是要小心，是要變得可怕！讓這個古老生物感受到你的憤怒！為我們的組織報仇！祝你狩獵豐收，維克多．弗蘭！

Text:
Praise heavens! God has answered our prayers in this hour of need and sent you here. I'm Casimir, servant of His will and patriarch of Zagoravia. You bring hope to my people and hope is what we need in these dark hours.

My prayers will be with you.
Old Text:
Praise heavens! God has answered our prayers in this hour of need and sent you here. I'm Casimir, servant of His will and a patriarch of Zagoravia. You bring hope to my people and hope is what we need in those dark hours.

My prayers will be with you.
Old Translation:
Praise heavens! God has answered our prayers in this hour of need and sent you here. I'm Casimir, servant of His will and patriarch of Zagoravia. You bring hope to my people and hope is what we need in these dark hours.

My prayers will be with you.
New Translation:
讚美上天！上帝在這關鍵時刻回應了我們的祈禱，把你送到我們身邊。我是卡西米爾，上帝的僕人，扎戈拉維亞的牧首。你為我的子民們帶來了希望，正是我們在這黑暗時期最需要的。

我的祈禱將與你同在。

Text: The heavens blessed Irene with a brave albeit somewhat hasty heart. Be patient with her, my son. You two stand together against the darkness!
Section: side: Patriarch 02 on Irene, after first meeting with Victor
Old Text: The heavens blessed Irene with a brave albeit somewhat hasty heart. Be patient with her, my son. You two stand together against the darkness!
Old Translation: The heavens blessed Irene with a brave albeit somewhat hasty heart. Be patient with her, my son. You two stand together against the darkness!
New Translation: 上天賜予了艾琳勇敢、但稍微魯莽的心靈。對她保持耐心，孩子。你們要攜手對抗黑暗！

Text: Thank you for your donations, my son. Each piece of gold enters the church coffers and will be used to build new homes and a future for the suffering. Continue to fight the sinful temptation of possession and the heavens will bless you!
Old Text: Thank you for your donations, my son. Each piece of gold enters the church coffers and will be used to build new homes and a future for the suffering. Continue to fight the sinful temptation of possession and the heavens will bless you!
Old Translation: Thank you for your donations, my son. Each piece of gold enters the church coffers and will be used to build new homes and a future for the suffering. Continue to fight the sinful temptation of possession and the heavens will bless you!
New Translation: 感謝你的捐贈，孩子。每一枚金幣都會進入教堂金庫，被用於建造新的家園和應付未來的苦難。繼續抵抗身外之物的罪惡誘惑，上天會保佑你的！

Text: Remember, my son, our hope shines brighter in our darkest hours.
Old Text: Remember, my son, our hope shines brighter in our darkest hours.
Old Translation: Remember, my son, our hope shines brighter in our darkest hours.
New Translation: 記住，孩子，越是黑暗的時刻，我們的希望越是明亮。

Text: Beware of the false sense of strength that contraptions and weapons often give, my son. Those crude devices have their uses, but put your trust in your own heart and soul above all things.
Old Text: Beware of the false sense of strength that contraptions and weapons often give, my son. Those crude devices have their use, but put your trust your own heart and soul above all things.

New Translation: 孩子，當心裝備和武器帶給你擁有力量的錯覺。那些工具固然有其用處，但最重要的是相信你自己的內心和靈魂。

Text: I worry for the Queen, my son. She has not confessed to me for weeks and I feel the darkness could have crept inside her heart.

New Translation: 我很擔心女王，孩子。她已經幾週沒有來找我告解了，我覺得黑暗可能已經悄悄地侵入了她的內心。

Text: Godspeed, my son! Find Irene! No living soul should ever be left to the mercy of darkness!

Old Text: Godspeed, my son! Find Irene! No living soul should ever be left to the mercy of darkness!
Old Translation: Godspeed, my son! Find Irene! No living soul should ever be left to the mercy of darkness!
New Translation: 一路順風，孩子！找到艾琳！任何人都不該受到黑暗擺布！

Text: Tzar Borimir was a great man, my son. The ancient scripts that were held in the Cathedral tell of his deeds. In ancient times he followed God's good will and founded this city to act as a beacon of hope, casting away the shadows that held sway over the hearts of mortal men.
Section: side: Patriarch 08 on Tzar Borimir (After accepting the Trial)

Text:
Of all God's creations, vampires perplex me most, my son. Whilst demons are beyond redemption in their absent minded drive to sew evil, Vampires are of our realm. 

Where do they fit in the Creator's grand scheme? I am truly at a loss, my son.
Old Text:
Of all of our God's creations, vampires perplex me the most, my son. While demons are beyond redemption in their absent minded drive to sew evil, Vampires are of our realm.

在上帝的造物中，吸血鬼是最讓我困惑的，孩子。雖然單純追求邪惡的惡魔萬劫不復，但吸血鬼卻生在我們的世界。

他們在造物主的計畫中占據著什麼樣的位置呢？我真的想不透，孩子。

Text: Praise God, you returned, my son! Truly you are like Saint Borglas the Banisher, he who fought the unholy legions of the Enemy to bargain for the soul of the Maiden!

Text: Father, I'm as far from being a saint as anyone could be.

Text: We are glad you return unscathed. Stay and rest for a while, but tell us - how's the liberation of the city progressing? We believe the tide of battle will turn in our favor very soon.

Text: Thank you for all your effort...and your kind words, Victor. You helped me realize my sins and gave me hope that I will find atonement one day. A queen must be strong and you helped me be just that.

Stash away, sir!

Section: side: sir Krum 02 Comment during The Trail quest
Old Text: You don't really want to know that, Sir Krum.
Old Translation: You really don't want to know that, Sir Krum.
New Translation: 你真的不會想知道的，克魯姆爵士。

Text: I don't know what is in your past, but I’ve grown to respect the warrior I see before me here and now. Perhaps you are too hard on yourself, Vran.
Section: side: sir Krum 02 Comment during The Trail quest
Old Text: I don't know what is in your past, but I’ve grown to respect the warrior I see before me here and now. Perhaps you are too hard on yourself, Vran.
Old Translation: I don't know what is in your past, but I’ve grown to respect the warrior I see before me here and now. Perhaps you are too hard on yourself, Vran.
New Translation: 我不知道你的過去，但我尊敬現在站在我眼前的這位戰士。也許你把自己逼得太緊了，弗蘭。

Text:
It's good that Gabriel showed his true colors. It was he who convinced Her Majesty to stand her ground and call the hunters to Zagoravia, it was he who doomed all my men to death.

Could you do something for me, Vran?
Section: side: sir Krum 03 Before final battle
Old Text:
I'm glad that Gabriel showed his true colors. You know, he was the one who convinced Her Majesty to stand her ground and call the hunters to Zagoravia, dooming all my men to death.

Could you do something for me, Vran?
Old Translation:
It's good that Gabriel showed his true colors. It was he who convinced Her Majesty to stand her ground and call the hunters to Zagoravia, it was he who doomed all my men to death.

Could you do something for me, Vran?
New Translation:
很好，加百列終於露出了他的真面目。就是他說服了女王陛下堅守陣地並號召獵人來扎戈拉維亞，就是他把我們的人全害死了。

你能幫我做件事嗎，弗蘭？
